text: Straightforward with pricing, no hidden fees.  Very polite workers, safe and fast.  Would use again and recommend.

name: Emily Campbell
text: I have never in my life received such awful service. We have rescheduled my delivery 3 times and they keep not showing up nor contacting me. I have to reach out to them to even figure out that they aren’t delivering my package on said say. Also, I couldn’t seem to ever get anyone on the phone and when I did they were always giving me the run around. I would like at this point to just go get my package, but I CANNOT GET ANYONE ON THE PHONE!! Terrible, terrible service! I do not recommend them!!

name: Terry Starkey
text:
Great Delivery! The guys arrived ahead of time
(they did call and give me 45 minutes notice). They were pleasant and allowed me to check the Dresser out for any damage. Absolutley perfect! Thanks very much!

name: Chelsey Karr
text: Very appreciative of this company. They went out of their way to deliver tile we had ordered to our home in a timely manner. Can't speak highly enough about them.

name: Katlin Welborn
text: My dining table was unfortunately delayed by the manufacturer and the day before Thanksgiving was my last chance to get it! I called and spoke to the owner and he arranged for me to pick it up just a few hours after it arrived at their location! They were quick at loading it when we arrived and I was so thankful they allowed us to change the delivery plan to accommodate the holiday!

name: M Curtis
text:
While the manager called me by the wrong name several times, that is not a huge deal. I had to re-schedule delivery because I was out of town. I was told rudely she would have to call me back to do that. Once I finally heard back I was told a certain day and time, verified by my wife while phone was on speaker. I had to pay extra money for my child to stay in daycare because of the time of delivery. Nobody showed up at that time. After attempting to get the "manager" on the phone for one and a half hours, she informs me she messed up and got the day wrong. I then informed her how unprofessional this company is. The "manager" then went on to raise her voice and told me everybody makes mistakes! Now I have to get off work, again and pay extra child care cost.. again. And hope they show up this time for the delivery.

DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience.

We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Monica Wiley
text: They did a great job in moving my items into my new home. They were very friendly and careful with my items.

name: DEEPoSEAN_
text: Fast, courteous, and on time. Moved my couch into my apartment without any fuss. Driver/mover called ahead of time, to give me a time frame for arrival. Would recommend to anyone moving large furniture.

name: Mary Ann Burgdorf
text: I had ordered white glove delivery service for an extra $150. Two young kids arrived and had to ask me to borrow a knife to open the boxes. That’s different. No white gloves and they didn’t seem to know what they were doing. They got the bed together and were leaving so I went back to look at it. Stains on the side of the upholstered bed frame so I refused it. I saw them load the bed back in the truck like it was firewood. They were supposed to have open the boxes at their warehouse and inspected it for damages which apparently they did not do. I was scared having them in my house.

name: Zack Nabras
text: They lost my shipments I called Over 60 time  they  don’t answer Given you run around bad service do not waste your money on your time

name: Melissa McAbee
text: My shipment was delivered on the promised day and early in the delivery window; communication was brief but professional and all in all it was a very easy, quick delivery.  After several poor experiences with much larger moving companies I'm glad to find a local one that treated me and my shipment with respect.

name: harrisonkl
text: i think they are GREAT.  The office staff is very polite,caring and compassionate and the moving crews are careful and diligent while not wasting time.  I engaged Henderson Moving to help with a very complicated move.  I am moving my elderly Mother from a Condo at the same time I am moving from a place out in the country.  We are moving in together in the family home.  We are doing this in several small moves and everyone at Henderson has gone out of their was to be helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We really appreciate it!

name: sandra jones
text: Henderson Transport and Storage is the BEST! Very customer service oriented! They keep you informed and they call the day prior to delivery and about 30 minutes just before delivery. The guys have delivered several very big and very heavy items from wayfair, and they are so gracious and pleasant! Such good service is one of the reasons I look at Wayfair first, I know that Henderson Transport will do the end delivery!

name: Blair Gilliland
text: Still have not received my desk and hutch from Wayfair. It was scheduled to be delivered on Friday September 6, from 2-6 and never showed up. Called the number several times that day, throughout the weekend, and this week so far. No one ever answers it or returns my messages. The voicemail is a woman's voice. She says Uh a lot and pauses so I can tell this is a personal number and just a couple folks running a "business" which terrifies me. Especially after seeing these other poor reviews, I'm worried IF my desk shows up at all it will be damaged and I'll have to refuse it and order a new one. This is a seemingly hopeless process and I do not recommend this company!

name: David Champion
text: Horrible delivery experience. Was schedule for delivery on Friday September 13th between 6pm and 9pm. Waited around all afternoon and never received items. Never even received a phone call or anything. Tried calling office and what do you know, they are only open until 2 pm. So I called wayfair and they rescheduled delivery with Henderson. Here it is September 19th and still nothing. I will not order anything else from wayfair if it’s delivered to me via Henderson.

name: jason baugh
text: They delivered my sofa within 2 days. They called and gave us updates as to when they would arrive. They brought it in and sat it where I wanted it. I was very pleased.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Jason! We really appreciate it!

name: Joan Prance
text: I have never in my life been treated like the owner of this company treated me.  I was called Monday and the deliver was set up for Wednesday at 6.  I am moving into an apartment from a house.  I waited and waiting and nothing.  I looked back at my confirmation email and it said that the delivery window was between 6 and 10 at night.  I was livid.  I had to call my ex to pick up my daughter at church at 7:30 because they never got to my apartment.  My daughter came to me and I had to keep her up on a school night.  I waited until  10 and still no call.  When I finally got them to answer on Thursday, the lady was extremely rude.  She said that the truck broke down which is understandable.  She said that her guys called everyone, but I never received a call.  She then said that she would deliver it Saturday at 5.  My daughter has a recital at 7 and I am sure they will not be there at 5.  I ask if they could come any early and she said that there are 20 people ahead of me.  I am not happy.  This company is awful and ran by rude, rude people.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers and apologize for the inconvenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Mitch Duros
text: I was sceptical after reading some of the reviews. Best decision I could have made giving this company a chance. Owner personally came for a free estimate and explained earlier problems under the old management. All new management. All new movers, carefully vetted. They showed up on time! They were friendly and courteous! They were fast, but treated my belongings with TLC.  They got me moved in less time than expected, which saved me money! I hate moving, but if I have to move again anytime soon, Henderson is the only company I’ll call.

name: Killin' Time
text: Worst experience ever! Could not deliver as promised so I said I would come get it. Agreed to meet at 1. They called me that morning to confirm the 1:00 time. I confirmed. Drove an hour to get there only to find a locked up warehouse.  Tried calling and only got machine. How these people stay in business I will never know.  Sat in parking lot for an hour waiting. Had to leave and drive an hour back home with my package. I will be contacting BBB....

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience.

We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Alyson Antolick
text: Was not notified of cancelled delivery until 2 hours after expected. Although I was given a call day of at 730am to let me know it would be delivered that day. Reason for cancellation was "didn't have enough drivers" which to me you should line up drivers BEFORE setting your schedule. Seems like common sense to me, but I guess that's hard to find with Henderson Transfer and Storage. No thanks.

name: DR J.L. Phillips
text: They were polite but unable to help me. Thank you all the same.

name: Jessica Martin
text: I bought some furniture from wayfair and this company delivered and assembled it. They were very nice and did a great job. They were quick. The only bummer is that I was told they'd be here at 3 but didn't come until 6ish. I had to waste my day waiting but things happen I suppose. I would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Jessica, we really appreciate it!

name: Maria Whitten
text: Excellent service, delivery on Saturday and very punctual.

name: Ashley Curtis
text:
Our experience with this company had both its’ ups and downs. They called us on a Friday to say our furniture could be delivered Monday.  In the voicemail, the company rep kept calling my husband Michelle, when his name is Michael. When she realized halfway through the message that she made a mistake, she said’ “I think it’s supposed to be Michael and not Michelle...anyway...” No apology or anything. When we called to reschedule because we were out of town, the same rep said she would call us back with a new time and day. She never did. We called three times before actually getting someone on the phone. Same rep informed us it would be delivered Tuesday at 12/ noon. Okay. Great. So, Tuesday at noon rolls around, and no one is here. We waited until 1:30 before calling to check the status, to which we got nothing but the voicemail multiple times. When my husband finally got someone on the phone, the same rep informed us that our furniture was scheduled for delivery on Wednesday, not Tuesday. Clearly my husband was upset since we rearranged our schedules and paid extra to keep my daughter in daycare. So, she says our furniture will be delivered Wednesday at 12. Because we had issues with times, I decided to call to make sure it was set for 12, and the same rep, very rudely, began arguing with me about what she said the day before and the times. I was trying to get an estimated time, and she kept interrupting me, and she finally hung up. At this time, I was livid with the situation and called back. Here’s where the actual good part comes in. Said rep hands the phone to the company owner, who was extremely helpful. He listened without interrupting and sympathized with the situation. He informed me that delivery times are always approximately due to problems or delays with other scheduled deliveries and we would see our furniture between 12-4 on Wednesday. It was delivered before 12 the next day in great condition.

The reason why I am giving this company a 2 star instead of higher is solely bc of the rude and unprofessional receptionist.  She independently will run the company into the ground if she continues to act with other clients the way she did with us. I believe this company is a “mom and pop” family business, so I doubt she’ll be going anywhere. For future clients, be ready to deal with inconsistentency and an argumentative receptionist.

name: Bowbee Outdoors
text: No show for scheduled delivery. No notice, nothing. Now i have a empty living room until they deliver. Who knows when that will be, considering they do not contact you. Furthermore they told me it would be delivered on a saturday. Come to find out they arent even open. Dont see how it would be possible to run a business when your office is closed and your delivery drivers are enroute.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review of our business. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority and we appreciate and take seriously all customer concerns. We do not have your name or contact information, but we would like to speak with you. Please contact us at (256) 734-9334 so that we may better understand and ensure your satisfaction. Thank you.

name: Chris M
text: They are horrible.  They called once and didn't reach anyone so, they simply didn't call back for days and then 30 minutes before they arrived at my home, called from a private cell phone number and didn't leave a message as to who they were and didn't deliver the mattress.  Then went so far as to say they would deliver when it was "worth it" to drive to my address.  I will lodge a formal complaint with Costco.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: bethlambrecht
text:
Worst experience ever with this company who delivered my furniture that I purchased from Wayfair. Not only were they rude to my husband during the first delivery, we NEVER received a courtesy call 30 minutes prior to the first time, and the second time we got the courtesy call it was the minute they stepped onto my porch. They never gave me time to arrive home. It was not a 30 MINUTE courtesy call as the lady at the front desk promised as well as
Wayfair.

When I text the delivery personel halfway home, he said it's a front porch delivery, it's already there. Now, while I realize we only paid for front porch delivery, the last time they dropped off the loveseat, they sat it inside the front door, we did not ask them to unpack, nor did we pay for that. BUT, he was very unempathetic, and did NOT care at all.  The delivery personel's attitude was very, very poor.  It was blocking the doorway LITERALLY and we could not get in the front door.  I WOULD NEVER USE THEM AGAIN FOR ANYTHING.

I contacted Wayfair and they handled it professionally and apologized for Henderson moving and storage for the way they handled the delivery. They made it right.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Barry Stoner
text: An expensive piano was supposed to be picked up at a residence in Hanceville at 8:00 today Aug. 27, 2016 to be delivered this sat. morn to our Church in Cullman, City. We waited all morning long and as of 3:45 PM, still no piano.After several phone calls trying to track them down we discovered that the the piano wasn't picked up until 10 A.M.. They told the person in Hanceville that they didn't get back from a delivery in Tenn. until 3:00 A.M. this morning and that is why they were late getting there. If they plan on storing the piano in their truck this hot and humid weekend the heat can potentially cause the sounding board to crack and the piano would be ruined. Moving a piano is not a job for amateurs and judging by their failure to deliver as promised in a timely manner it appears that this company is not being run by professionals. I guess being on time and taking care of expensive merchandise is not a priority of this company. I called their office and got an answering machine and no cell phone to find out  the status of said deliver. I punched in their address found on the internet plugged it into the GPS and went looking for them to no avail. Needless to say our experience with this company is very frustrating and disappointing. It is now 4:00 P.M and I am going to Church one more time to see if their happens to be a moving truck off loading a piano.  If not, more to follow.

name: Simona Williams
text:
Negative four stars if that's possible. I have the same exact experience as the other reviews. No call to reschedule, when I was able to get the lady on the phone she was extremely rude, stating she had no idea how to contact the movers and they would give a thirty minute call prior to delivery. They said they would deliver at 10:30am. It's 4:10 and I'm still waiting for the call. To Make Matters worse leaving to go out of town. Can't get it reschedule until I
Come back. Ugh.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Mack Ott
text: Had a 4-hour delivery window scheduled for today. So far no delivery, no phone call or e-mail stating a change in delivery, and all calls to the office have gone to voicemail. Would avoid if possible in the future.

text: No one ever answers the phone. Always get a recorded message. Leave message but no return call. Must be a poorly run mom and pop business

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenient lack of response.

name: Edison McCoy
text:
Great customer service
And very knowledgeable about the job
Actually helped me set my place up in my new home

name: Roxann Raimondo
text: My family just moved back home here in PC Alabama..we of course aren't as young as we once were. We had a 26 ft Uhaul packed.. We decided we needed help. Jays helping hands are awesome. They arrived quickly and were so helpful, it was 104° and they still had a smile. Recommend them to anyone who needs help. Thanks guys 😊

name: Phylicia Burks
text:
Very pleased with the professionalism and the service. Made my very stressful move peaceful. Recommend Jays Helping Hand and I will be using them for my future move.
Thank you!

name: Drew Mcclintock
text: Great movers. Thanks Jay.

name: Tanyeitta Dowdell
text: Simply amazing, this was my first time using a moving company.. I called him yesterday after the previous company that I booked was a no show. He showed up within a couple of hours and took my furniture down and had me setup in my new space within 4 hours. Awesome service I would definitely be using him again!

name: Alex Hdz
text: Jay's Helping hand came to unload our house.  This guys are so professional and so polite.  It was an absolute pleasure to have them come and help

resp.text: Thanks a lot the pleasure was ours 💪🏾

name: Angela Reiff
text: Highly recommend this moving company! Jay and his associates helped my wife and I out when our original movers didn’t show. They were professional, quick and careful! Thanks Jay!

name: Tama Kingen
text:
I called Jay at the spur of the moment to move an item for me , they were right on it , very prompt and professional. I will definitely use them again, and great prices!!’
Thanks again Guys!

name: T Brown
text: Right on time, friendly and courteous. Very reasonable rates. Definitely would use them again. Trish Blount

resp.text: Thanks again for your business..

name: Ann Leverett
text: This place was a joke do not use them they flat out lied to me said they had a box truckand we be there at 830am to move 3dressers 2 beds washer dryer couch chair that was it for 100.00 i waited all day for them to come at 425 they call says ms Leverett jays here where you at i said you said u had a GPS it takes you right to my house very short rd dead end mind you.he said we on this road i look out the door i said all i see is a small white pickup truck he said thats us.i said u told me you had a box truck and that small truck will take 5loads with all stuff u already have on it.he said well im sorry my friend needed my truck so he says whats the main thing you need moved i said all of it i told you yesterday on the phone i waz to be moved out by 5 today.im hysterical a nervous wreck he was very rude and said im sorry we can get both beds and couch thats all.i was so upset i had no choice but let them move that cause lights were set to be turned off at 830 am next morning.so when it was over he charged me a 100.00 to move that one half load.thats the price he gave me to move everything and i told him that.he said i didnt know those were queen size beds what did it matter.u never ask u just ask what all i needed moved.liars cheaters scammers and very rude lets reohrase that the owner himself was.the helper really tried.

resp.text: We’ve never performed a move in a pickup truck, can you take this off my page? Please and thank you.

name: DeMarcus Slaughter
text: GREAT SERVICE I WOULD DEFINITELY BE HAVING THIS TEAM BACK OUT HERE FOR PLENTY MORE WORK!!!

name: lewis jefferson
text: The movers were on time. They were very polite and courteous. Very professional. I highly recommend.

name: Aceboogie 91
text: Very professional, did a great job communicating and was able to come at the last minute. Would highly recommend to all my friends and family

name: Curdrea Veasley
text: I used them a few times, very trustworthy and down to earth got my entire home moved in excellent timing..

name: Kwanesia Bass
text: Yes... things get there. But they were late (Which while not in his control does delay everything for me as the customer), my car wasn't able to be pulled as planned, a stand was broken, my washer & dryer was left (which in turn is costing me almost $400 to get moved when it should have been done), and a closet which was reminded to get cleared was left full. Extremely disappointed.

resp.text: Being late was out of my control considering the truck company was backed up....the stand you had was cheap processed wood an those are not meant to move once put together cause there easily broken...and if you would’ve be more forth coming about the amount of furniture you had when you called to get a quote over the phone I could’ve showed up with a big enough truck..although I don’t appreciate you tryning to make my company look bad I still appreciate your business and you have a blessed day..

name: Andi Andrews
text: Was awesome in helping me move!!! Friendly, on time, and completely professional!!! Pricing was amazing!!! Thanks Jay and James!!!

name: Ronnie Blount

resp.text: Thanks again for your business..

name: Dayana Chaney
text: Horrible, horrible, horrible. Pulled up in a car, lied saying he will be back, and ignored me then hung up in my face. Terrible service! Do not call them.

resp.text: I’ve already explained what happened on your friends comment both of you guys comments are a immature attempt to blemish my image, it didn’t take two people to comment on the same situation...

name: Jenni D
text: Folks are nice, place is clean, trucks are always good, AAA gets a great discount.  They guarantee the trucks and don't leave you hanging like the others.  And if you have to change your date they will do that for you free of charge, great company!

name: Paula Staver
text: Very friendly, personable staff- pointed in the right direction to get the truck weighed! Fast check-out.

resp.text: Hello Paula, thank you for the review. If you have any additional comments you would like to make, we would sure love to hear them! We appreciate any feedback, as well as your business.

name: The Philosopher 5
text: Nice people were friendly helpful and personable

name: Shirley “msann177” Johnson

resp.text: Shirley. Thank you for taking the time to rate our location and for choosing Penske

name: John Na
text: They are too much charge diesel, gage gose to  almost full but he said  3/4,  don't respected customer.  Very  no good,.

name: Jeremy Schill

name: Jennifer Washington
text: It's all night access.

name: Sandy Toomer
text: I met the manager for this location a while back and she has worked here for like 20 years.  A locally owned company that keeps employees 20 years! That says something to me. They get the OA News Best of the Best Award like every year it looks like.

name: Chuck Sedenquist
text: clean, well lit, and well maintained -- very convenient

name: Linda Cordell
text: I have been to new units here for years and these people are awesome they work very hard to do anything for you

name: Kenny Boyer
text: Curtious and clean. Well secured grounds.

name: William Paris
text: Great place and location

name: Barbara Sisson
text: We had a wonderful moving experience with Bolt Movers in Auburn. Price was reasonable and our 3 man crew Gabe, Jackson, and Chris were wonderful. We will request this team again for our next move. Moving is never fun for anyone. They were polite, respectful of us and each other throughout, hardworking, fun and made the most of a difficult heavy job and stressful time for everyone. They didn't smoke. The move took 13 hrs and they were great throughout. The Company is well run, process was smooth fr calling ofc to get info, scheduling the move, Billing, and the movers. It doesn't get better than this. Obviously screen their employees well. They are  extremely fortunate to have these 3 wonderful employees who did all the manual labor for us. HIGHLY recommend this company and especially these 3 movers.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ms. Barbara!

name: Tori Phillips
text: My experience with Bolt Movers was absolutely exceptional. The pricing was very fair and scheduling was a breeze. What made the service especially impressive were the two movers who came, Bailey and Sam. They arrived within the time frame and immediately got started. From carefully moving every piece of furniture and box into my apartment, to assembling my desk and bed, and even helping to determine the best placement for the furniture in each room, they remained professional and were even enthusiastic to help. The day of my move in was extremely hot, but they still worked hard and made sure everything was done. I cannot say enough how much I appreciate Bolt Movers for making this move a breeze.

name: Solita Finley
text: The team of guys ( Jackson and Dima) were exceptional! They were as professional as I could hope for and they really made my move very easy for my husband and I. Can’t tell you how much they were appreciated. Keep up the great work guys. I would recommend this company to anyone wishing to move with no worries 😀

name: Mecy Calloway
text: Bolt Movers are AMAZING!! They are very professional and efficient!! I was amazed at how quickly they were able to load and unload all of my belongings on and off the truck! I would highly recommend to those looking for movers! They will not disappoint! Thank you for providing exceptional service Bolt Movers!!

name: LeAnn Rikard
text: I had a late cancellation with another company who refused to work with my schedule and I called Bolt Movers less than a week before I had to move and they had no problem taking care of everything! Our movers Sam, Gabe Harrison and Gabe MacKenzie were so efficient and professional they had everything done in just over two hours. It saved us so much time and stress that always comes with moving! Highly recommend this company to anyone getting ready to move!

name: Laura McGilberry
text: Bailey, Dina, and Tyler were a great crew!   They were very professional and polite.  They were very careful with all of our stuff. We will be requesting them when our out of town move occurs.

name: Lynne Hammond
text: Bolt Movers did a great job with our local move that involved three stops!  Our movers, Blake and Bailey, were prompt, professional, friendly and very easy to work with!!  This is the second time I have called on Bolt Movers, and both times they did a great job!    I highly recommend this company!

name: Amy Potter
text: After more than one bad moving experiences, I was overwhelmed at how great the team from Bolt(Emory, Tyler, Benjamin and Blake) were. They were incredibly respectful of our furniture- antiques and of me. This was not an easy move with difficult unloading and they all remained so positive. I recommend them without hesitation and will be using them again when we move again in a year. My thanks to this team!

name: Blair Beard
text: Over the years we have moved several times and always used different moving companies. We’re so thankful that Tyler showed up at our doorstep to give us a free gift and tell us about Bolt Movers once our house was listed. Tyler was friendly and came with a wealth of knowledge and helpful tips. We set up the move with Mariah and man, she has great customer service and was quick to send an estimate for the move. The day before the move Mariah checked in to confirm time and addresses and then the next day Cliff, Ben, Jackson, John Scott and Cody arrived with smiles on their faces ready to get our belongings to the next destination. They were all so friendly and did a great job working together as a team. We are already planning to use Bolt Movers again when we make a bigger move several hours away.  Great company, with awesome customer service and friendly staff. Thank you Bolt Movers!

name: Twenty-One Acres
text: Unbelievably impressed by the two gentlemen who helped us move yesterday! They were prompt, quick on their feet, incredibly polite, listened carefully, super careful and thoughtful. I was just blown away by their performance! I look forward to using their services again! You won't be disappointed!

name: Klaudia Virkler
text: We are beyond pleased with our experience with Bolt Movers. They helped move our family from Alabama to South Carolina. They were efficient, hard working, respectful, and had a positive attitude throughout the move. They didn't let us lift a finger. Communication was excellent! They were also reasonably priced and worked with us to fit our needs in every aspect. We already recommended them to our friends and would recommend them to anyone! Thank you Patrick!

name: Leslie Grimes
text: Got a move set up in less than a week. Two young men were quick, friendly and efficient. Would use again.

name: Kailey Montz
text: Cody and Ben did a great job! They worked very quickly and efficiently and did so with a smile on their face. They also treated my toddlers who were trying to “help” with so much kindness and patience. Highly recommend Bolt!

name: SN
text:
I used Bolt, Auburn to relocate within Georgia for my 2 bedroom apartment. I was very skeptical at using them as they were not local and were out of state company. I called 4 other companies apart from Bolt, and their quote was based on the distance of move and the weight. Bolt on the other hand, was based on the hourly rate. I saw their quote to be the least and was about $500 to $600 cheaper than other quotes. So I decided to go with Bolt.
I called them a day before my move and made sure everything is planned as scheduled. The driver called me on the day of the move and they reached my place 7 min before their scheduled time. They started working and were done loading all my stuff within 2.5 hours. They also reached my place of destination on time and unloaded materials quickly without damaging anything. They also used blankets and packing materials to secure items within the truck.
I am very satisfied with them and will recommend them highly.

name: Jane Wilbrandt
text: Excellent service!! Very professional and took great care with my furniture!! Would recommend Bolt Movers for your moving/relocation needs!!!

name: William Maffett
text:
- After reading my post, it makes me sound like a homer, but this is an honest review of my wife and my experience with Bolt Movers. -

The provided Google 5 Stars - "Loved It" - is an accurate description for Bolt Movers.  My wife and I have moved 4 times over the past 2 years, and we can't say enough great things about these guys.  They have a down home quality and friendliness to their business that you just don't see anymore, mixed with a top level amount of professionalism that places them head and shoulders above the competition.  I can honestly say that we have had 2 other professional "big name" movers provide their services for our family, and none can hold a candle to Bolt Movers.

When the "big name" guys (not Bolt Movers) moved us into our 2nd floor apartment, they loaded the hand-truck and up the stairs it went.  The words "fragile" were regarded as more of an opinion than a recommendation or request, and definitely not a requirement.  This is not to say that others were necessarily careless with our items, but more that they were there to get the job done and get out.  This is understandable, and I didn't mind that at the time per say, but don't expect this attitude with Bolt Movers.

Stephen, Patrick, and Max carried each box by hand down 2 stories (yes, each box, by hand) to the truck to make sure that nothing was damaged.  And as if this wasn't enough, laughed and conversed the entire time like we've known each other for years.  You can instantly tell that Stephen and Patrick love their job.  I don't believe a smile left their face the entire time, except for the occasional strain of heavy lifting.  To me, it looks like some arduous hard work, to them, it was like a day in the park (or for them, at the gym).  Every time we've moved in the past, we have been reluctant to make requests as we know the amount of effort that goes into moving.  Stephen, Patrick, and Max couldn't have been more helpful, and I mean that in the most real sense.  They would double, triple, and quadruple check that you wanted items in certain places.  They wanted to leave my wife and I with as little work as possible.  Which during a moving process is an absolute nice to have.

Their price was extremely affordable and competitive.  They were willing to work around our schedule and make sure the job was complete when we needed it.  Like most, my wife and I were hesitant about using a non brand-name group, and I can honestly say, kudos to us.  We couldn't be more happy with the service we received.  All I have to say is give these guys a shot.  I highly doubt you will be disappointed.

I could keep going on and on with our experience, and I'm not normally a review writer, but we received excellent service from Bolt Movers (Stephen, Patrick, and Max) and I had to leave my thoughts for others.  While I hope to not be moving anytime soon, I definitely, wholeheartedly recommend these guys for anyone who does need moving services.

resp.text: Mr. Maffett, I cannot thank you enough for your kind words! You and your wife were a pleasure to work with! I just wish that I had a full size arcade Pac-Man system like yourself. Thanks again for your business!  - Patrick

The only real downside to using this company was their call center - it took me forever to finally get scheduled and confirmed, since if the phone rings for too long, the call gets forwarded to a call center in another state. That does me no good.
However, once confirmed, the movers were professional and on time, and their estimate for my move was spot on. They were also very fast and efficient. The only down side to the actual move was that they did not wrap the furniture before items were placed on the dolly. The items might have been wrapped once inside the truck, but that just made me nervous.
Overall, a very positive experience.

DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! Tell your family and friends as well. Here is my experience moving from Bham to ATL (you cannot make this stuff up). I have moved over 20 times and they are the worst movers I've ever used.
1) They brought the wrong sized truck so many items were left and had to be brought later. Some of which never came at all.

4) Worst of all, during the move the "lead guy" made inappropriate comments to my 15 year old daughter on 3 different occasions to the point where she felt uncomfortable and went out of her way to avoid him. The lead guy did this.

text:
These guys are real pros. The estimator was efficient and made sure there would be no surprises. (Also, for responding to a snail-mail solicitation letter, we were given a choice of a $100 discount or that amount in boxes and other materials. We chose the 2nd option and are glad we did!)

The day before the move they called a left a message listing names of the driver and other movers--and when they'd arrive. Those four guys exceeded our expectations. They were efficient and worked extremely hard. They were personable, funny, and easy to "spend a day with!" And they took great care with every item, including a large quantity of china and an antique pendulum wall clock.

One last thing: We're building a house, so almost everything had to be stored. Secure Moving is equipped to move you out, store your stuff in their OWN facility, and then move you in.

I highly recommend Secure Moving, Inc.

This was the biggest move we have ever done and Secure movers made it so easy!

Our dryer broke the day before the move and one of the companies owners heard us talking about it. He went to look at it and told us what it needed, he went and bought the part and PUT IT IN !! It was fixed!
Now that is not only going the extra mile, that is a good, good person! I can’t say enough but they were truly great! They came in below the estimated spread on price!

N

name: Charlene Leon
text: Great for moving and storage. Courteous and careful staff. Very clean facility! Would definitely use again. They took some of the stress out of a  stressful event for me!  I used them on several occasions for moving, and each time the guys were beyond kind and patient.

name: Cherie Stine
text: I am a big fan of Secure Moving and I would highly recommend them to my friends.  My final cost came in just under the estimate (they are experts at estimating!) and the move itself was executed perfectly.  The team that loaded my house was upbeat, friendly, energetic and fun.  They were absolute pros at wrapping furniture and protecting the house from damage.  I had three weeks between moving out of the old house and moving into the new and I used their services to store all my belongings.  I was relaxed during that time knowing they were going to be responsible from start to finish.  The team members that delivered my things to the new house were once again happy and full of energy.  Some of the guys were on the team that loaded three weeks prior and remembered things like "remember, you put the key in that drawer when we packed it?"  These guys honestly would stop to make sure furniture was centered or rugs were aligned with chandeliers.  It was like they were unpacking their own houses.  I hope I don't move again anytime soon, but if I do I will chose Secure moving over and over.  Impressed.

name: Kirstin Ahearn
text: You will be impressed with the professionalism of everyone at Secure Moving.  They do in-home estimates so no surprises on moving day! They also have a climate-controlled storage facility - which could be a life-saver during a long-distance or complicated move - or if downsizing.  Call them!

text: This company is the only moving company I have ever used that I was 100 percent satisfied with. They go out of their way to protect your home and belongings. Very polite and accommodating team. I would recommend them to anyone without hesitation.

name: Lindsey Morgan
text: I am so disgusted and appalled by my experience with this company, I just don't even know where to start with this review.  I will NEVER trust positive Google reviews ever again when researching companies.  I am still so mad I am shaking as I type this.  If I could give negative stars I would.  Now that I have had a night to think clearly about my experience with them yesterday, hopefully writing this review will help someone else not have to deal with the absolute complete hell I had to go through yesterday.  I hired this company to move my family.  I am a single mom of 4 and couldn't move us on my own.  The guys showed up and the loading process was slow.  There was frequent standing around, smoke breaks, one of the guys even asked me to go out and buy them food and I ended up feeding them from my fridge to try to speed the process up.  I did have a lot of stuff to load, but reaching out to multiple companies today to inquire about timing with the type of load I had, the time frame was half what took place at my house, almost like they were milking the clock.  Then when getting to my new home, the men were following me (we left old house at the same time) and they disappeared for over half an hour.  Upon arrival at my new home all hell broke loose!  They spent more time arguing, fighting, taking smoke breaks (cigarettes and marijuana - I thought I smelled it and it was later confirmed by one of the men) and on their phones complaining about their coworkers than actually unloading the moving truck.  It was so bad that myself and my children had to help unload the moving truck because these "men" were too busy threatening each other and their families.  They were yelling and screaming at each other in my driveway for over an hour, using profanity and racial slurs, all in front of my children and new neighbors!!  When we left to do the second load more time was spent because one of the men wouldn't get in the Uhaul they had rented and started walking down the road.  Then at the end of the day when everything was finally completed I felt like I was robbed when I paid.  Yes, the owner did give a two hour partial discount on time, but after thinking more over the night and about what happened the discount was no where near what it should have been after what myself and my kids had to go though.  It was hell to a point where the cops were almost called.  Two hours and stopping the clock on the one man when he started walking down the road is no where near enough, especially when part of the time I had to pay for was for them fighting.  I saw on a previous review the owner told a customer to get a conscience.  Now I am saying that to them.  What was supposed to be a happy and exciting day for me turned into me crying for half the day and dealing with absolute HELL and it is all this companies fault for their unprofessionalism and absolutely horrible actions!!!!

name: Derrick Knight
text: They were professional and showed up on time. Very efficient and completed move very quickly. I will definitely use their services again.

resp.text: Thanks!. Glad we could be of help!!

name: Brittany Snyder
text: Worse experience ever!!!!!! I will never use them again or refer them to my clients. We pretty much had everything in the garage to load and we took majority of the boxes over to our new place before they came. What was left was three beds to take apart, couch, and dining table. They didn’t have tools either!! Over all 6 hours for a job that should have been 4 if that. They movers were not no muscle men either. About 130 pounds. Not experienced at all. And didn’t put anything back together.  Shame on the owner for prolonging moves  and getting more money from  customers. All they do is rent a uhaul truck and get anybody to move. Never again !! And to top off everything else, they didn’t properly package our tv and broke it, damage on the walls!!

text: Muscle 4 Moving helped us move in December 2018. We had moved previously that year and we used a different company, so we were dreading the experience. None of my items were damaged and by the time everything was unpacked I felt home again. Thank you Armstrong Relocation, you really know how to provide a stress-free and professional moving service.

text: Larry Binder and his crew did an excellent job. They were on time, very polite, quick and efficient, and communicated with me and my wife every step of the way. It’s amazing to me how fast they are.

text: Great company - very professional both onsite guys and logistical communication was great. There was small damage caused to my equipment and they responded immediately and worked with me on making the issue right. Jim SanSoucie was great - Use these guys if you need moving assistance in Huntsville!

name: Kristin Sartelle
text: Outstanding!  Exceeded every expectation. They meticulously packed and carefully loaded our house for a cross state move. I was overjoyed when the truck arrived—on time—at our new house because I knew they would do everything possible to help me get things in the correct places...and they did!  I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Hi, Kristin! It is great to hear that we exceeded your expectations. Best of luck at your new residence!

name: Ric Schank
text:
Moved my elderly mom from Huntsville to Colorado. Looked at all reviews for long distance movers and found that Armstrong had the best consistent reviews. Had a virtual assessment and they came up with a Binding contract for the weight of my mother belongings. They packed about 3 dish packs, 8 picture boxes,two TV's and a few other boxes.I packed about 20 boxes. One bed, one loveseat, headboard,desk, dinning room table, couch and two occasional chairs. The apartment was a 2 BR
1400sf apartment. No washer dryer or refrigerator. The estimate was 7000 lbs which seemed high but I TRUSTED their evaluation based on the reviews. On arrival the driver stated that the weight was more like 4000 lbs. In my eyes that is a significant discrepancy. When asked for the final payment of 6900 dollars I mentioned this to the coordinator. The owner of the company called and said the estimate was Binding. I agreed that I had indeed agreed to a Binding estimate but it seemed wildly over inflated. His response was that I had signed the contract and I could have gotten other estimates. Really not the point but he seemed to be incapable of understanding my point. Therefore my 85 year old mom payed the bill. Otherwise the move was average. The Packers spent most of the time on their phones. The driver was prompt and coutrtious and took great care to wrap my belongings. Took a few days to wipe down all furniture and get the smell of smoke off furniture....not uncommon. Drivers shouldn't smoke in cabin but I don't know how that can be controlled. Just glad the move is over even though I feel badly for my mom that she overpaid for the move.

resp.text:
Hi, Ric!
We are sorry for your disappointment regarding the quote provided to your mother. I am more than happy to discuss the quote further as outlined in prior  phone conversation and on the provided documentation. Armstrong takes customer satisfaction seriously and strives to continually provide an exceptional experience. As it relates to on-the-job expectations, we will certainly share your feedback with our crew members. Feel free to contact me directly at 256.258.2204 to further discuss these concerns.

name: Jared Casdorph
text: Great people to work with

resp.text: Jared, thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are always so pleased to hear of another positive encounter with our team. Thank you for choosing Armstrong!

name: Joe Forrest
text:
Armstrong Relocation made several promises and they were true to their word!  They arrived on time, packed with great care, and responded positively to a few requests.  Their entire team was very professional and mindful of our needs!
I have used them on several occasions and will continue as long as they respond as they did this time!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much. Repeat customers are the highest form of compliment to us, and we are so pleased to hear that you had such positive experiences with us!

name: Mike Banks
text: A big thanks to Brad and the team at Armstrong for helping us with a last minute move and I do mean last minute!  They came through in a jam and helped us in their usual professional manner.  They have been helping us with our moving needs for many years and always meet our needs and expectations.  That is important as a commercial building manager. I need to have a moving specialist I can count on. Thanks to Brad and his team I have that.  Great work guys!  Mike, Samples Properties

name: Elizabeth Million
text: I moved from St. Louis Mo to Huntsville in January and Armstrong Relocation made moving so much less stressful! From start to finish it was a positive experience. The move coordinator made sure that I was ready and had all the information I needed before the driver arrived. I had never done a virtual survey and after doing one it was very accurate and easy. The driver was very helpful and polite. He answered all my questions and concerns. I would definitely recommend Arnstrong to my family and friends !

name: Kim Galkowski
text: Brad and his crew moved our center into a new facility. We had 8 + regular employees plus storage and items for temporary employees. Brad and his crew were very professional. They arrived at appointed times and were very efficient and careful with all of the equipment and furniture. I will continue to rely on Brad and his team any time I have a need for a move (as a matter of fact, I am getting ready to use him again to move some equipment).

name: Michael Burns
text: I have been using Armstrong for more than 18 years for my companies moves related to employee and manufacturing.  The communication with the team is always very professional and thorough.  Timing is always perfect and the teams that that arrive are dedicated and careful.   They have even handled the coordination with my moves in across the U.S. so that end to end I have been happy.  Problems cannot be avoided with as many moves as I have been involved with. But when there has been any problem it has always been corrected to my satisfaction.   That being said, as many moves as I have had in all those years I can only remember 2 problems.  That is an outstanding record.  I have recommended Armstrong to friends outside of work numerous times and they have been treated 100% as well as I am had been treated.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review.  We appreciate your dedication to our team servicing your move activities.  It is always and honor to work with you.

name: Kathy Cagle
text: I have used Armstrong Relocation for more than 10 years to move new hires and current co-workers relocating to other locations and have been 100% satisfied every time.  They are professional, timely and courteous to our relocating employees during a usually stressful time.  I have received numerous compliments and “thank you” notes from employees and spouses regarding the move experience with Armstrong Relocation.  We have made a multiple office moves and our IT staff requests them each time based on their performance and special care with IT equipment.  Definitely recommend them for all moves!

resp.text: It has always been an honor to work with you and the companies you've served.  Thanks for taking us with you along the way and continued support of our operation.

name: Amanda Richards
text:
My husband's employer contracted with this company to move our belongings from Arkansas to the Huntsville, Alabama area. They were terrible!

The morning of the move, they showed up several hours late. One of the men was exceptionally rude, refusing to speak to us even when addressed directly. He packed our garage, and, when they were preparing to leave, I opened the door to find that he'd left many items in there. Even his co-worker was displeased with his actions.

Our belongings were in storage for about two weeks while we closed on our new home. The men who unloaded them were very good- friendly, thorough, and careful.

Unfortunately, several items had been poorly packed and were broken upon arrival- a chair, bookshelves, fragile items. They had thrown our Christmas tree topper into a box, and then threw heavy tools on top of it. They wrote our tracking number directly *on* some of our furniture with black permanent marker!

Worst of all, they LOST a small trunk that contained heirlooms and family memorabilia. We didn't have room for it in our vehicle, and I was assured it would reach our new location safely. Well, it didn't.

When we called to report the missing and broken items, we received no compassion, no apology. No effort was made to find the missing trunk. The representative assigned to us was curt, and behaved as if we were wasting his time. He just emailed us a claim form, and told us to value the missing items for reimbursement.

How am I supposed to place a value on my children's locks of hair, the bible my great-grandfather gave me before he died, my high school yearbooks and photos, the stuffed Fox my oldest daughter slept with every night? They're literally irreplaceable!

We ended up with a check to replace the broken furniture. I would never, ever recommend this company to anyone. It was an absolutely infuriating and heart-breaking experience.

resp.text:
Amanda,
We take these matters very seriously, and unfortunately, we cannot verify anything about your identity from your name in our records. If you were an Armstrong - Huntsville customer, we would like to investigate this issue further. Please contact our agency president, Brad Murphy, at 256.772.6664.

name: Charles Kelly
text:
Over a 10 year period as Director of Administration for Radiance Technologies, I managed several small, local moves working through Brad Murphy at Armstrong Relocation. In 2012 we consolidated furniture, supplies and equipment from seven buildings in the Commercial Drive area and moved to an 83,000 sq ft building on Governors West. The move required 29 truck loads over a 2-3 week period and went off without a hitch. I would strongly recommend Armstrong Relocation to anyone for a turn key or a self-managed move as we chose in 2012.
Charles Kelly

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Charles.  Our companies did a lot of work together and we were proud to serve Radiance.

name: Wendy Tyler
text: From the first contact for an estimate, to the move coordinator to the crew - great company and group of people to work with. The movers were professional, competent and didn’t waste time. We will be moving again once we find a house and we will absolutely use Armstrong Relocation Huntsville for our next move.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words regarding our services.  We were honored to be chosen to service your moving needs.  We look forward to helping with the move to your next phase of life.

name: Cathy Elliott

Mr. Turner,
We appreciate your kind words about our crew and services.  Thank you for choosing Armstrong Relocation, Huntsville to support your relocation needs.

Would recommend to anyone needing a moving service you can count on.

Armstrong Relocation has done an excellent job on all the moves they did for me, my relatives, and my work.  I started using them in 2002 when the company I worked for moved to a new building.  Experiencing that very successful move, I continued to use them for my personal moves (2), relatives’ moves (2), had them added to the company I worked for relocation program to conduct the moves of new and relocating employees (too many moves to count!), and currently use them for the moves of employees at my current employer (2 so far).

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Elizabeth.  We hope to continue this long-standing relationship

text: Armstrong moved my family from Albuquerque, NM to Huntsville a few weeks ago. TOP NOTCH service was provided all the way through the move!  From the salesman who came and measured out my belongings, to the movers and the truck drivers, everything was an incredibly easy and frustration free process. My customers are very complimentary of the Armstrong workers and their attention to detail. I have used various "movers" over the years and I have to say, Armstrong is the best.

name: Richard Miller
text:
Poor after mover service
We purchased additional insurance before the move in case anything was damaged.  Our china cabinet was damaged.  The claims person at Armstrong fights tooth and nail to not pay the claim.  She delays and delays, denies and denies.  We are still fighting.  The  additional insurance is worthless and so is the customer service.

resp.text:
Richard, we’re sorry to hear about your damaged cabinet and claims process experience. As we spoke with you this morning, you should receive our agreed upon settlement next week and we apologize for the frustrating experience. Should you have any further questions as we move forward, you may reach me directly at 256.772.6664.

Sincerely,
Jenny Johnson, CEO

name: Patrice Simmons
text: Armstrong Relocation provides fantastic services.  They have so much to offer their clients including wonderful storage facilities while people are in transition.  Jenny and the team are great!  I will always use Armstrong for my relocation and storage needs.  I will refer everyone I know to them.

name: Christian Darabos
text: Easy to work with and problem-solving oriented, the head office people are great. I had a small claim for a damaged TV stand, they pushed it right through and sent me a check. Unfortunately, the communication between them and the actual movers, and the client and the movers could be better. Movers showed up with a truck too big for my driveway despite the "on-site estimate" and had to run up-and-down the driveway with all my stuff to load the truck. At the other end, movers rented a shuttle (U-Haul) that was too small and had to do two trips and take some furniture apart. Delivery too at least twice as long as necessary.

Would recommend!

Thank you for your kind words regarding our services. We are grateful you chose Armstrong Relocation / United Van Lines to assist with your moving needs.  Please consider us again for any future needs.

name: Amy Keegan
text: Moved a stuffed apartment in the Washington DC area to the Kansas City area. Couldn't have picked a better company. The people they have working for them are top notch. The packers did a great job of protecting what they packed in boxes and the driver had a great team on both ends to move me in and out. I was on a third floor walk up apartment and had the heaviest furniture imaginable (IKEA) and they were as careful with the first piece as the last piece. If I had to do it all over again I would make the call to this company again.

Rose,
We take these matters very seriously, and unfortunately, we cannot verify anything about your identity from your name in our records. If you were an Armstrong - Huntsville customer, we would like to investigate this issue further. Please contact our agency president, Brad Murphy, at 256.772.6664.

name: Daniel Brigman
text:
My family and I just completed our 10th move due to a professional transition out of state.  Not all of our moves have been pleasant and resulted in high stress, damaged goods and higher moving costs in the end.  However, my family and I have recently had a totally different experience with Armstrong Relocation & Companies.
In preparation for the move, three moving companies were contacted for quotes.  Brad Murphy came to our house on two separate occasions, the first to ascertain our moving needs and the second to adjust the initial quote to ensure the accuracy of our moving estimate.  The initial quote was actually reduced to reflect the adjustment in estimated weight.  The quote provided was a “not to exceed” amount, giving me and my family reassurance of no surprises at the end of our move.
From the initial planning stages throughout the entire process, we received world-class service and support from all employees at Armstrong Moving, particularly Brad Murphy with coordination of our move, Justin who oversaw the pick-up and delivery, and Michelle, the outstanding receptionist who left her post at the front desk on three occasions to help us load packing materials at the loading dock.  All employees consistently went beyond all expectations to support us prior to and during our move.  All of our household items, including very fragile materials and heavy shop equipment were moved with extraordinary care and arrived to our new home without one scratch or any damage.   All deadlines and schedules were accurately met with ongoing communications from representatives throughout our moving process.  I truly hope Brad Murphy and the Armstrong Relocation & Companies are available if another move is needed in the future.  Without hesitation, I will go the Armstrong way once again.   Thank you for a JOB WELL DONE!

D. Brigman,
Rentz, GA

name: Natasha Wright
text: If I could sum up their service in one sentence, I would say, "These people are very serious about moving." They did an excellent job of packing loose items and had a separate team come out and make wooden crates for my glass aquariums. The customer service representative in my area was a pleasure to work with and she helped me to retrieve some important documents when my belongings were in a storage vault. Very little damage was noted on any of the furnishings (I think a little is bound to happen); the worst of it was a ceramic pepper shaker which had broken, but then again I had packed it. I am very pleased with the movers, packers, and service representatives at Armstrong Relocation. My company chose these movers for me (I moved from northwest Arkansas to northern Alabama), but I couldn't imagine using a different company. I would highly recommend them if you value your possessions.

text: The guys were great, on time and worked efficiently. They weren't given the right addresses after I had given the addresses on two separate occasions. I had to wait around and tell them the correct address of storage unit and directions from where they were told to go. That wasn't good.

name: J W
text: They destroyed a brand new couch. Left tons of stuff at apartment. They said and I QUOTE " but you signed the completed form". Well I can't be in both locations to check your work. BEWARE HORRIBLE COMPANY.

name: C Elliott
text:
I have used Two Men and a Truck numerous times in the Birmingham, AL area.  Now that I live in Foley AL, I called Two Men in a Truck's Foley location to set up a local move.  I went in to the office and spoke with the manager  Katelyn who told me I would only need one truck and two men, based on the fact that I have a one bedroom apartment.  She also told me that a week day is a much cheaper rate.  So I agreed and scheduled a day off work and set up my move for a Wednesday.  I paid the deposit of $125.00 which I was told would come off of my balance due after the move.  Within 10 minutes of leaving the office, I received a phone call from Crystal out of Mobile, AL.  She told me that there would be no way that two men could move me with one load in under 8 hours and to save time and money I need to increase to three men.  After my hesitation but her persistence and pressure, I agreed (bumping my hourly rate up to $165.00 from $125.00 I originally agreed to).  So Wednesday my move day came.  I received a phone call from the driver who said "we are leaving the lot and we are 2 minutes away"  which is absolutely true the lot is approximately 3 miles from my storage unit.  They arrived, loaded me up (the truck was barely half full) and went to my new residence which is a 5 mile drive and unloaded.  They were finished in less than 5 hours.  I completed the transaction on the tablet the driver had and paid my balance due.  Within 5 minutes of paying and the movers leaving I once AGAIN received a phone call from Crystal out of Mobile, AL who tells me that the GPS in the truck miscalculated the time and distance and I owe an additional $185.00.  My total bill for a 5 hour local move ended up costing me over $1,100.  RIDICULOUS  !
I feel very ripped off by this company and by Crystal who twice contacted me to increase the amount of money I owe. I ended up paying for more than 5 hours plus the deposit (which got bumped up to $165) suddenly became travel costs and costs for the materials to wrap my furniture.  My receipt stated that the drivers came from Mobile, AL an hour's drive away.  Another rip off from this company.
Once I was in my apartment I realized that two pieces of my furniture were damaged.  Not one piece of my furniture was ever wrapped - even though I was charged for quilts and pads.  The young men that moved me were not professional in their moving abilities and how to take careful care of furniture and especially boxes marked fragile.
So after many many many phone calls I did have a headboard replaced, but my phone calls regarding my dining room table damages have been avoided.
This company is a poor reflection on Two Men and a Truck corporation.  This franchise is a money trap and so unprofessional.  It's a shame that the people in my area who have been displaced by a hurricane would be taken advantage of by a local moving company.  I will never use this location or franchise again and will make sure that I tell everyone I know in southern Baldwin County who need a mover to AVOID Two Men and a Truck Mobile, AL / Foley, AL

resp.text: We are sorry that you had a bad experience. With a satisfaction rate of 96%, this is not up to our standards. Please contact a member of our operations team at: 251-316-5977.

name: Margaret Thornberry
text: These young men were absolutely outstanding, they treated my stuff so carefully and were so helpful. They seemed to go above and beyond to make sure I was happy. Hopefully this is my last move for awhile but if I move again in the future I will definitely use these guys again.

Overcharged is only the beginning ; this is a time based service at $31.25 for every fifteen minutes and they do take their time . As an example ; I caught one of them coming out of the truck with one table lamp in his hand to take upstairs " ONE " the other hand was free and there was plenty of things he could have carried in the other hand .  I told both of the movers I was on a fixed income and price mattered  to me , and I
I was told not to worry they could get it done fast and in the time I needed them to ; that never happened .   I would never , ever, ever, recommend this group , and of course never use their services again .

name: Jeff P.
text: I would not use this business again. Looking back at the paperwork ,  now that I am at my desk, I was clearly overcharged as the driver did not arrive at the time represented on the paperwork.  Furthermore, BEFORE the delivery driver and helper started to move my items, I was asked, and felt a bit pressured, to initial and sign paperwork that acknowledged "A final walk through" and verification that my items had been removed from the truck.  Needless to say, I did not complete this portion of the paperwork until the move was complete.  During the delivery process, one of the movers lost control of his hand-truck and several of my desktops fell and ended up in the parking lot.  Lastly, while completing the initial paperwork on-site, the driver seemed to indicate that I should have received certain paperwork/quote ahead of time. This was not the case.

name: Kay Martin
text: This company delivered my items from Orange Beach, AL TO Monroe, GA on February 14-15, 2020. Upon leaving my son’s property, they ran into a newly installed security gate, about three weeks old, scraping it, jamming into the ground, damaging a post and the monitor, bending the metal on the gate, then left without a word. My son walked down to close the gate and discovered the damage. This company has said that they are not obligated to file insurance claims and felt they were not at fault AFTER the driver told them it happened!! After much talking, pleading this company sent my son a check for $500 for a $3200 gate. They finally agreed to hire a contracror to install, billing to be taken care of by Two Men and a Truck. The contractor worked for two days, demanded money from my son, left, never came back. NOW , the contractor says that the company will not pay him so he is threatening my son with a lien for $3200.  The contractor’s work was not correct and workers are now correcting his work. My son did not hire this man. SO my question is, why does the contract that I signed state that damages caused by workers will be corrected at no cost to me as mistakes do happen??  Contractually, Two Men and a Truck have not honored  the contract that I signed in good faith. These people have accused my son of lying about the damage, yet proof was provided to them that this was a new gate. White paint scrapes were on the metal. This treatment to a customer is unacceptable, unethical. .

name: Emily Anderson
text: Shout out to Devon and Cameron who did our move in just 1.5 hours. Very professional and hard working. If I ever move again I will most definitely request these two guys they are the dream team!

text: I used the two men and a truck in Gulf Shores Alabama.they moved me from the third floor of an apartment to the first floor of the same building apartment. Let me just say this. Trust me. Said almost $500 and they moved 12 pieces of furniture, they said my couches in Black soil, charged $100 for truck charge didn't even use it(their office is under 8 mins from our apartments), out of 3-4hrs 1.5 hrs was actual moving. I put in a complaint so the manager whom I thought was refunding me some money and was sending me a $50 gift card to longhorns. So me getting any money back apparently I was mistaken and as far as the longhorns goes it was probably one of the best steaks I ever had but even at the end of the meal I still had a god-awful taste in my mouth from two men and a truck. This was back around February March what just made me finally write something is I just saw where there office was for the first time and when I saw how close it was to our apartment I couldn't keep quiet about it anymore.

text: This was my first time using MoveDaddy, and I had a really great experience. David and Joshua were on time and professional the whole time. text: MoveDaddy and our moving team of Nick, David, Shep, & Seth did a fantastic job during our move. text: Buster at move daddy was amazing yesterday. Buster showed up right on time and was time conscious throughout the move. Buster even helped pack up my vehicle. text: Awesome crew. Christian, Izaak, Nick, Phillip, Spencer, and Andrew were literally running to load the trucks as quickly as possible. The guys were polite and professional and they made our move 100% hassle free.

text:
From start to finish Move Daddy exceeded our expectations. Easily the best moving service we have ever used. Moving is difficult. The Move Daddy Team of Zach and Spencer made it smooth, personal, and stress-free. They were a blessing!
It was clear when they arrived that their focus was on safety of our goods and our peace of mind. They had a 12+ hour day. Hard work. Exceptional attitudes throughout.
We Highly recommend this company and these movers.

text: My experience with MoveDaddy was one of the best of my many moves over my lifetime; as an Army brat and now retired Army officer. text: We were so thankful to have Zack and O'Brian help us with our move. They were professional and efficient. They made our moving process so easy and stress free.

text: Christian, Andrew, Spencer and Murph moved me just 8 short miles but it was brutally hot and it poured like crazy when they were trying to load in. Those poor guys were soaked, used moving blankets to cover the boxes and kept on working. No one complained and no one slacked off. 5th time I’ve used MoveDaddy and if I need movers again, I’ll be back. Have always had such a good experience with them and this one was no different. Thanks so much!

text: Excellent!! Super fast, great personality! Worked hard and had a great time helping. Nick and Seth (Buster) are highly recommended!!

name: Alice Van Dover
text: I called today to setup appointment for moving my mom and the price that was sent to me by email they will not honor the hourly rate that was quoted to me.  They said that their pricing will go up on 8/16/21.  That was not noted on the paperwork.  They need to honor the pricing that they email people.  Very bad business for them.  He told me to find another moving company to use.

resp.text:
It is true that our local moving rates will be increasing before the date of your move. We appreciate that Kylan made sure you were aware of the increase prior to scheduling your move. We are sorry that you took exception to the information.
We have made every effort to delay increasing our rates to the levels of our competitors. However, due to increased labor cost, and general expenses, we must raise our rates to a more comparable rate to remain financially healthy.
Often, a bad review is more a reflection of the person leaving it than those they are criticizing.

text: Awesome job! On time and worked hard! Great company. Excellent job David, Nick, Matthew and John!

I was working against the clock on my parents arrival at the community and they accommodated my need for getting certain rooms and furniture set up first. Shout out to Kylan for getting it all set up for me on a quick turnaround. I will be calling MoveDaddy again for another move in a couple of months.

today we used christian and charlie and they were beyond great , respectful , professional and efficient.  this is our 4 th move with move daddy. text: We had the best experience with movedaddy. Kylan was very responsive with emails. Mcmanus and John were prompt, careful and strategic about the move. everything went smoothly from the booking to the end result. Would highly recommend them.

text: There’s not enough to say about this company. My first interaction was with Jared on my way to my destination in Alabama via phone. He first told me that it may be a longshot to get help to unload my truck Because of how last-minute it was that I called, however he would do whatever he could to help me and he came through. Carlos and Jacob were sent to my rescue. These two individuals were extremely professional, well mannered, and cared for my items. Honestly without them I could not get it done. I will be using this company again this week for another truck unload. Keep up the good work.

text:
Kylan, Logan, Carlos, and Seth
We are so thankful and blessed to have been able to use this company. Each young man was respectful, professional, kind, helpful, generous, well-mannered, I could go on with nothing but positive encouraging words. Not one of them, not once stepped out of line, or were slacking at their duties.
There is always one in a group that stands out to work harder and faster then the others, that was not the case in this group. Everyone of them worked their tails off making sure the job was completed and we were happy along the way with the progress.

name: Robin Brown
text: I've used MoveDaddy twice now and both experiences were perfect!  Jacob and Phillip did an excellent job in our move! They were punctual, professional, polite besides the quick and perfect move itself! I would recommend them to anyone! (And I have!!) Excellent Service and reasonable prices!
