text: McManus and Murph were a huge help in getting my stuff moved to storage. They were on time and took their job seriously, and I appreciated it.

name: Rebecca Prisoc
text: 4th move with Move Daddy never a problem until now. 2 inexperienced movers took 8.85 hours & MAJOR damage to 3 different pieces of furniture. Called Kylan & was told MD isn’t responsible. Unprofessional movers never said anything about damages.  BEWARE.

resp.text:
Thank you for your patience as we address your claim. In the meantime, I would like to remind you that Movedaddy is only responsible for damage that occurs in our care, custody, and control. We are not responsible for damage that we discover prior to moving.

Additionally, your move totaled 7.5 hours, not 8.85. Of the total 7.5 hours, only 4.75 was spent loading and unloading your property. The remainder was spent driving to Jasper, your unload address, and returning from your unload address.

Furthermore, the men who serviced you are regarded by our customers as 5 star performers and mentioned by name in many of our reviews. They are neither inexperienced, nor unprofessional by any account other than yours.

Again, thank you for your patience, and look forward to correspondence from this office in the next 2-3 business days.

name: Ryan Holley
text: Chris and Izaak did an amazing job getting me moved from Pleasant Grove to Concord. Both were extremely professional and very careful with my property. Treated my things as if it was their own. I would definitely recommend this service and definitely Chris and Izaak to my friends and family.

name: Hunter Smith
text: Logan, Zack, Issac and Will are the most professional, efficient, and kindest movers I’ve ever come across. I’ve had to move twice in 2 months and they are absolutely incredible. Every single person I run into that is moving I recommend MoveDaddy. Ask for any of these 5 men and they will go above and beyond. I could not be happier with how effortless they made two of the most stressful moves ever. I am completely blown away. They should be given raises and bonuses as well. Great teamwork, great company, great prices.

name: Valerie Watson
text:
I've used MoveDaddy many times in the past few years, both for local and out of state moves. They have also helped me with small jobs such as taking things to a storage unit, packing or unpacking, and moving heavy pieces around the house. I have always enjoyed working with their crews. They have all been friendly, efficient, professional and careful with my possessions.

Most recently Nick and Christian helped me with a small move. I had not met them before but once again I was totally satisfied.They are professional, smart, hard working young men. They finished my job in less time than I expected and placed things exactly as I requested.

I also enjoy working with Kylan in the office. He schedules the crews and has always gone out of his way to accommodate my requests. I highly recommend MoveDaddy and will continue to call them for my moving needs.

name: Gayla Short
text:
David and Andrew were great
Very professional and knowledgeable

name: Jeanne Nappi
text: Nick and David did an outstanding job for us.  We moved from Birmingham to Jasper and the move went very smooth.  They were most helpful.  Great attitude.  Two outstanding young men.  Will use this company again if anything in the future comes up.

name: Jaccob Davis
text: Jacob and Isaac showed up on time and promptly went to work. They were very professional, and courteous. They handled my move with great care and I was very pleased with the service these young men provided. Great work. I would definitely use these guys again.

name: Kim Rhoades
text: Izaak and Christian were on time, respectful and polite.  They were professional and made everything go off seamlessly. We knew we were in good hands when we saw how quickly and efficiently they worked. Well done gentlemen. Thank you!

name: Jane Darbyshire
text: David and Phillip did excellent work moving my belongings to storage.   Great job.  Thanks guys!

name: Kara V
text: We used MoveDaddy for our local move from Fultondale to Kimberly. We have two small children and lots of furniture, etc. MoveDaddy did an excellent job getting us setup in the new place. They were quick, efficient, and courteous-extremely professional, and their hourly rate was very reasonable. I will not hesitate to use them again in the future. The day of our move Izaak, Chris, & Will showed up to get our things, and I recommend each of them very highly.

name: Tyler Watts
text: Good job!  On time, ran to and from the truck.  Great effort!  Fix the blinkers on the truck!

name: Martin Howell
text:
Super impressed with Move Daddy. (Our first time ever hiring a moving company.) They communicated great. Followed up with what they said they would do (paper work exactly as discussed). They showed up on time! The two movers, Chris and Izaak, we very professional, hussled and respectful (to us and our property).

We can say enough about the positive experience we had.

Note: Our move was a simple pickup from one place and drop off at another. It was a short 2 hour minimum job but they treated it as if it was a big job.

Great job Move Daddy and your team!!!

name: Anjum Swaroop
text: Jacob and Carols helped us move last week. They were professional, knowledgeable and extremely helpful. The service is reasonably priced and I highly recommend using them.

name: natalie heard
text: Logan  and Nick were fantastic. I was extremely  pleased with how they handled my belongings. They  made the move easy and stress free. Best  movers in the world, definitely worth every penny!

name: Angelique Davis
text: Izaak and Mark did a wonderful job helping with our move. They made everything easy and took a huge load off of me. Both boys were very professional and efficient in their work.

name: Abigail Hayes
text: Jacob & Aaron did an awesome job moving all of my items. They were very fast and efficient! I would not hesitate to use their services again and highly recommend Move Daddy!

name: Leslie Pickle
text: Truck #5- Jacob and Phillip were great!!! Very professional and helpful in making my move run smoothly. They did an excellent job and I would highly recommend them!!!!

name: Nancy Musser Haines
text: Hands down, the best movers we have ever used! Promptly at 8a, Christian, Spencer, Charlie, Andrew and Phillip showed up at our house in Homewood with 2 large trucks. They were amazing. Efficiently and carefully, they started in the attic on the third floor of the house and worked their way down carrying heavy boxes, Christmas decorations and furniture. They loaded 4 king beds with no problem. Three heavy beds had to be carried down 16 steps and two had to be carried up 15 steps at the new house.  When two trucks were loaded, they headed to The Preserve and unloaded quickly putting everything exactly where it went. After lunch, they headed back to the Homewood house and packed everything else that we wanted, including a swing set that they took down and put back up at our new house. They loaded 2 large, 200 lb each, patio umbrellas and a wooden porch swing with ease.They packed all of my potted plants, including the huge and heavy ones! Everything they did was seamless and done efficiently. I did not think our sectional would fit in the garage apt staircase and they assured me it would work, which it did! Not one piece of furniture was scratched or damaged! Amazing! For hours, these 5 guys ran up and down steps loading and unloading with incredible ease. All of this with a smile on their faces and being so respectful! When they left, all of the beds were up, all of our furniture was put together and everything was in the right place! I would hire these guys again in an instant! Worth every penny and more! I seriously can’t brag enough on each of these young men! Move Daddy is the company to use for efficient, professional and quality service!

name: Nancy Hubert
text: Jacob, Phillip and Jerrod were very ready and eager to help with anything and everything throughout the whole process (same for Kylan in the office). So easy to work with, always pleasant and polite. You can tell that they enjoy what they do and work well together. Recommend without a doubt!

name: Russ Brown
text: Jacob and Chris were courteous, professional, careful and customer focused.  Our local move was without a hitch.  Move was local and extremely cost effective.  I recommend Move Daddy in Birmingham without hesitation.  These two workers were outstanding!

name: Adam Johnson
text: My wife and I used Move Daddy to move from our two houses and into our forever home. Jacob and Christian worked for us Friday and Saturday. On Saturday Izaak and Chase joined us to finish the last two trips. The gentlemen were very professional, efficient and took great care of our belongings. If you are moving be sure you give Move Daddy a call. You will be happy you did!

name: Emery H
text: We had the pleasure of having Mark, Isaak, Christian, and Phillip move us yesterday.  These guys are professional, kind, super hard working, know what they are doing, enjoy their work, and hustle all day!  Mark and Isaak helped move my parents and they had a great experience too so we requested them when we booked our move. They know how to get this stuff done efficiently and safely.  We’ve used other companies and not had this kind of experience.  If you’re reading this, save yourself the stress and request these guys.

name: Nathaniel Cartmell
text:
Last Tuesday, Jenkins, Zach, and Angel helped on our move which involved one stop and six flights of stairs in total. They were top-notch. I have used a lot of different movers and this crew has provided the single best experience. I will likely call on them again for my next move.

The first thing that impressed me was how punctual the team was. They were outside at 8:00 am sharp (one advantage of having a location so close to central city).

The next thing that I noticed was how efficient they were. Jenkins walked through the apartment, asked about each item to be moved, and there and then formulated a plan to move each item in the right order. The entire crew then worked with purpose in clearing the apartment.

Also worth a mention is how respectful they were--not just in their bearing, attitude, and speech, but also in the way they treated our property. The move covered only a short distance, but the team did not take any shortcuts in transport, using the full range of blankets, pads, ropes, and other restraints to make sure the items did not move, scratch, or break during transport.

Finally, other than an hour break for lunch (for which we were not charged), the entire group worked diligently until the entire truck was unloaded.

name: Cody Jenkins
text: This is my second time using Move Daddy, this time the movers were Jenkins, Ryan and Zach. Once again,  excellent service. These guys were punctual, courteous, and respectful. They handled all of our items with care and they stayed moving the whole time, didn't drag around any. I will always choose Move Daddy for any future needs. Excellent service, would recommend to anyone. Thanks guys!

name: Deedra Moore
text: Our whole experience with Move Daddy was great!  They were very professional from the first call made to the last item moved.  Kylan took my call and took care of the booking.  We didn't need a full move.  We only needed movers to meet us at our destination to unload a UHaul.  I didn't know if that was even a service that Move Daddy provided.  Kylan was very helpful in taking care of answering all my questions and getting us booked.  McManus and Charlie were wonderful movers and so polite!  They took so much care in making sure we were happy with everything and handling our furniture with care.  They wanted to make sure everything was placed in the correct places even offering to move it for us if it wasn't placed just right.  They went above and beyond to make us happy.  We were very impressed with them and how mannerly they were.  If you are looking for a moving company, be sure to hire Move Daddy and hope you get McManus and Charlie as part of your moving team!

name: Mitchell Johnson
text: Jacob and Zach were right on time for the move that we made. They were both very courteous and helpful. Treated our belongings like it was their own and were as helpful as I could've expected. Thanks guys for your help!

name: Abby Killian
text: Christian & Phillip were amazing, they ran as if it was a race and just made our move easy. Huge weight lifted from my shoulders. Highly recommend.

name: Abigail Larson
text: Great experience! Have used this company before and will use again in the future. Christian and Harrison did a wonderful job!

name: Bryan Knox
text: Words can’t describe how absolutely HAPPY we are with the services they provided. Jacob and Luke went above and beyond, were wonderfully respectful, worked like Trojans and made the move a pleasant experience. We would hire them again in a minute!!!! It is so refreshing to see respectful young men work hard and take pride in a job well done.  Well done, gentlemen!

name: Gerald Maye
text: I've used this service on a few occasions since moving to Birmingham. They have always been extremely professional and accommodating. They are responsive to requests and deliver a high degree of service. I've also recommended them to some friends who have upcoming moves. I recommend them to anyone who needs a dependable moving company. Two thumbs up guys.

name: Jim Duren
text: Christian and Phillip with MoveDaddy are professional young men that are good at planning, executing, and following directions to make an in-town move successful. They worked diligently and expediently to make sure every detail was attended to make this transition to another home  a positive experience.  They were extremely organized, trained and their prior experiences helped made this move a big success!! Thank you Christian and Phillip!! You rock!! We will use you again!!

name: Victoria Patterson
text: The office was so professional! Gave me great advice and tips that no one else did!!! Made sense and the pricing was straight forward! No hidden agenda here! I had an excellent team! Jacob and Angel were THE BEST!!!! Straight forward, hard working, on time, professional and just straight out great! This company exceeded all expectations I had and I will say I’ve expected quite a bit! They stayed in constant contact and handled our items like it was their own. Not a fan of the commercials at all! Not at all. I must say I was shocked when I choose them. Having said this I will NEVER use anyone else! They just aren’t enough good words to say about these guys!

name: Eta Nu
text: MoveDaddy was professional from scheduling to payment.  The guys were respectfully and were swift but  took their time to make sure that everything was what I wanted.  I will be using them in the future. I even got a follow up call to see how I enjoyed the service.  They were ready to listen to my experience.

name: David Nabors
text: We used this service for the first time today.  Mark and David were great.  They were on time, had great attitudes, were very professional,  and hustled from beginning to end.  Made the entire process much easier than I had been dreading.  We will certainly call them the next time we need items moved for any reason.

name: Anna Murphy
text: My husband and I bought our first house, and it is an hour and a half from our previous home. So we new we needed to hire movers, given the size of the move. We had several people recommend MoveDaddy, and they did not disappoint! Jacob & Angel were very professional, communicated well, were very personable and made us feel at ease the whole day during the move! They were worth every penny, and if we ever move again, we will use them! Worth every penny!

name: BGEagle
text: Logan and Issac were assigned to our move as requested. They had moved us to storage seven months or so ago and they were really good. This time around, they were even better. They wasted no time and really hustled throughout the move. I would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone planning a move! They are both a credit to MoveDaddy.

name: Deborah Holley
text: Christian and Phillip were totally awesome!   They worked fast and got things done quickly. They were also careful and attentive to the things being moved. I am impressed with these two and how well they worked together. Great job!!

name: Andrew St. John
text: First time using MoveDaddy. Angel and Chris were quick, friendly, and super professional; always making sure if I wanted something in a specific spot or not when bringing pieces in or if there was anything else I needed them to take. Takes a lot to move heavy furniture up three flights of narrow stairs, so I’m very grateful for what they did. Definitely worth going with them for an easy, efficient move.

name: Carli Dalton
text: Logan, Chris, and Chase arrived right on time and had me moved in just 1 hour! They were extremely polite, respectful, and careful with all of my belongings. They were so accommodating and kind when we requested they wear shoe covers as to not track dirt on my white rug. I strongly recommend Move Daddy (especially Logan, Chris, and Chase)!

name: Diego Gonzalez
text: First time using a moving company. Christian and Phillip were very professional and wasted no time. I would definitely use this company again. For the price and service, they can’t be beat.

name: MARK TAYLOR
text: This is our first time using MoveDaddy. Our crew of Jenkins, Nick, Philip and Dontae were fantastic. Worked extremely hard, communicated well, were responsive, interacted well with each other, and careful with every piece of furniture that they moved...both from our previous home to our new home. And they moved as fast as they could have. Couldn't have been more pleased.

name: Sally Ann Nichols
text: Thank you so much to Jacob and Phillip who moved us to Birmingham all the way from Florida! They were SO quick loading and unloading and were very sweet and respectful! Also, thank you to Movedaddy for being so flexible with us as our closing date kept changing. You guys rock.

name: Terry C
text:
I can’t say enough good things about how MoveDaddy handled my recent move, specifically Christian and Phillip.  These young men were extremely professional, hardworking, energetic and respectful. They knew what they were doing and throughout the day they could be seen running back to the truck for another load!  Nothing was damaged and my items were handled with care.
This move was temporary and I’ll definitely use MoveDaddy for my next move and request Christian and Phillip again.  Thank you so much guys!

They worked very hard all day and I would highly recommend them for any moving job! Thanks so much to your company and especially those guys!! Laura B.

Christian and Mick are great movers.  Literally...moved  fast and very efficient at packing the truck to use every inch of space.

name: Randy Merritt
text: Very good experience with Chris and Izaak.  On time, hard-working, careful, and professional.  Everything was top-notch.  Would definitely recommend to friends

name: Matt
text: Jenkins and Zach did a fantastic job moving my mom today. Both were very hard working, professional, and flexible. Would definitely request those two again. Great job!

text: Christian and Izaak did an awesome job completing a move for one of my elderly clients. They were respectful, efficient and had great attitudes. I am impressed as usual with Move Daddy. 100% recommend!

text: Jenkins and Nick were amazing! I had a last minute need for help on a Saturday, and they were able to work me in. name: Carter Ward
text: Christian and Phillip did an excellent job helping us with our move! They were fast, efficient, and careful with all of our belongings. Not to mention a pleasure to be around. I would highly recommend these two and MoveDaddy!

text: Jenkins, Jacob, Christian, Tyler and Nick were outstanding!  Very friendly, careful and responsive.  They were right on time each day and handled every requests in a friendly and outstanding manner!  Highly recommended!

text: My husband and I moved last weekend. We did a lot of research on movers and chose MoveDaddy to help us. text: This is an exceptional moving company, very thorough and professional.  Mark did a great job in coordinating the move, on time and all procedures explained. text: We could not be more pleased with our recent move. Taylor and his coworker were very professional, courteous and on time.

text: Move Daddy is the best moving company we have ever used! Jenkins and Tucker were professional, on time, and did not stop working from the time they arrived, to the time they left. text: Dakota and Nick moved my son to Mobile.   I was so impressed how hardworking these men were!  They made sure everything went smoothly. text: Christian, Nick and Seth were all friendly and professional. They did a great job moving items out of an apartment and into storage. We had some items that needed to be disassembled and proved to be a bit of a challenge. They kept at it, worked hard and moved everything without damage. They even helped arrange things in the storage unit so I can access certain items easily.

name: Pete Black
text: The Movedaddy team was absolutely incredible!! Kudos to Mark (teamleader), David, Christian and Nick!! What a wonderful group of fellows to work with. If you are looking for a first class mover. Look no further than Movedaddy! You won't be disappointed.

name: Kayla Watson
text: Christian & Nick were very careful with all of our belongings. They made our move stress & worry free. Definitely recommend these guys!!! I would use again for sure. Thanks guys!

I would highly recommend to anyone considering moving!

name: fliza
text:
Chris and Mcneise did an amazing job. They were professional and handled my furniture with care. I would highly recommend them for your moving needs.
Thanks, Ken Johnson.

Jenkins was the team leader and was a delight..a great leader, positive, super hard working. We couldn’t have had a better experience..I highly recommend MoveDaddy!

text: Logan, Kylan, JR, Zack, David, Nick, Christian & Luke were the absolute best crew I could have asked form.  They we on time, polite, and energetic. Mark in the office was responsive to all of my needs before the move and even offered to have a crew come back out to rearrange anything we may need after the move.  I have hired a lot of moving companies in my life, but this was by far the best crew and move I have ever had.

text: My experience with MoveDaddy could not have gone better. Jacob and Logan are fine young men who did an outstanding job of moving my furniture from Mobile to Birmingham.

name: john mielke
text: MOVEDADDY is the only service I would use to move my stuff. Mark and Tucker were extremely professional. They got me set up fast.

name: Tyler Stone
text: Strickland and Nick were on time, professional, hard working, and had great attitudes during the 95 degree heat! I could not have asked for two better guys to help us move in a pinch. We would have been helpless with out nick and Strickland. If every mover had guys like these two, the world would be a better place. I’d give 6 stars because of them if I could.

text: My husband and I cannot say enough good things about our experience with Move Daddy. Our movers, Izaak Rhoades & Andrew Strickland, worked hard and were very respectful. They were very careful not to damage our belongings or our home. They are outstanding young men.

text: Great experience with Logan and David yesterday moving out of my son’s apartment. They were professional, efficient and courteous young men. Thank you!   Recommend highly !

name: Ashley Ellis
text: Kylan and Andrew were THE BEST!! So friendly and on time. They worked fast, but were very careful. Cannot day enough good, positive things about this company and their movers!! USE THIS COMPANY! 🙌🏻🙌🏻🤗

text: Kylan and Andrew did an amazing job moving our things. They showed up early and were very polite and energetic. They took extreme care not to damage any of our things or scratch the walls and floor. Outstanding job by Kylan and Andrew!

text: Mark, Zack, and David did excellent job on our move.  Would use MoveDaddy again.

text: Jack and Luke were awesome! Hustled the whole time, very polite and helpful, and even gave some excellent interior design insights! I Highly recommend MoveDaddy.

They even lifted the sleeper sofa over the kitchen island! Justin has over 4 years of experience with MoveDaddy and he made sure we were satisfied before he left. He hooked up our washer and dryer, put the doors back on the refrigerator (had had the tools and expertise to remove them in order to get the refrigerator through a narrow doorway at the old house) and set up our beds! text: They took their time moving. One mover broke a piece of glass to a table, and I heard him say, “that’s ok, we’ll milk the clock and make the best of it.” It’s been 4 days and I have heard nothing about the broken piece they said they would replace, after they told me I would hear from them within 24-48 hours. I would suggest any other moving company over this one

resp.text:
Mr. Moseley, as you know, you were told our office would contact you in 2-3 business days. Please refer to your copy of the move sheet and your copy of the damage report stating 2-3 business days. On the 3rd business day, we explained to you that the replacement was delayed due to business closures related to the current pandemic, and that we would continue working diligently to complete the replacement. We regretted that the accident occurred and expected the matter to be resolved the following Monday or Tuesday.
Despite your sense of urgency, we attempted to contact you every day for 6 days to schedule delivery. On Saturday, you returned our call, and on Monday we delivered your table. As a courtesy, we delivered the table to an address unrelated to your move, an hour round trip from our office.
Your claim that one of the men said, “that’s ok, we’ll milk the clock and make the best of it” is absurd nonsense. The 2 matters are unrelated, and no one stands to gain anything by making your move take longer than it should. If you would like your moves to take less time, consider reserving an apartment on the main level, and reserve your storage on the main level.
This move and your previous move conducted by the same movers both took 5 hours. Both moves took less time than we would expect. Perhaps their performance is the cause for you to use our service again. We are truly sorry for whatever happened to cause you to post such an untruthful and deceptive review, but we wish you the best and hope you get through it.

Update 08/06/2020 Dream Team Jenkins & Nick

I suggest you request Justin and Christian as they were professional and hard working men who were polite, mature and took great care of all my stuff. I will use them again for my next move.

name: Diane Wadsworth
text: Mark and Jr did a fabulous job.  They were pleasant and worked hard and fast.  When they needed help with the piano they called and the company sent another person to help.  Definitely would recommend this company for your moving needs.

name: Gina Temple
text: After my friends original mover cancelled 30 min after scheduled time to arrive we called Move Daddy.. Jared was absolutely wonderful setting up a same day move. They were there within a hour and a half. justin,Christian, and Mike were courteous and hard working the entire time. They are the absolute best movers we have ever dealt with and would 100% recommend them to anyone. Thank you so much for all of the personal attention and professionalism..

name: Daniel Murdock
text: I had a wonderful experience with Move Daddy, and I would highly recommend them to anyone.  The movers were clean cut, polite, professional, and efficient.  They took great care of my furniture, and they were patient as my wife and I kept changing our mind about the layout of the furniture.  They also did a great job with hooking up the washer/dryer.  Be sure to ask for Zach and Nick.  They exceeded my high expectations.  They really treated my furniture as if it was their own.

name: Ashlea Herrero
text: Highly recommend MoveDaddy!  Justin & Andrew were super polite & professional.  It was like watching master level professional jenga mixed with the strength of ninja warriors.  They made move day so much less stressful!!  Thank you both so much!

name: Robbin Collins-Lint
text: Alonzo and Kylan were awesome while moving my moms things from her home to storage. The guys in the office handled the arrangements professionally and were very nice. We needed it done within 2 days and it was. Highly recommend MOVEDADDY!!

name: Denise Morrison
text: Nick and Logan were awesome! We have moved over a dozen times, both local and across the country. This was absolutely the best movers by far. They had great attitudes, worked hard and treated our items and home with respect. They will have all our future business and we will definitely request the same crew because they were spectacular!

name: Laura Bass
text: We had an awesome moving experience with MoveDaddy. They came in a pinch and were really good. Justin, Nick, Tim, & Tobie were courteous , professional, fast, and very carefull with our furniture. They actually ran from the truck to the house to save time. Good price too! We would 100% recommend MoveDaddy and we will use them again.

name: Madi Cowan
text:
Fantastic experience with Move Daddy. Dekoda, Andre, and Cam were great! They made the move much less stressful. They were quick, skilled (impressive lifting, skill with a broom, and driving in tight areas), and just great personalities all around.

I've had bad experiences with movers in the past, and this was the polar opposite. Move Daddy came to us at great recommendation, and we'll gladly pass that along.

name: Andrew Bartlett
text: Alonzo and Jr did a fantastic job and were able to move us completely in 1 day when we were planning on having to move over 2 days. Very professional and would recommend them very highly for anyone considering hiring movers.

name: Edward Fulton
text: JR and Logan were the BEST!!!! Fast, efficient, took care of our things and were courteous and professional— I wish I could give more than five stars!!

name: Insurance By LaRose
text:
Mark and Wells provided the most efficient, professional, moving experience I have ever received! All though the day threw obstacles at us we, all stayed positive and overcame them. No damage was done, paid extra attention to specific items! Hands down the best service! Highly would recommend them 2!
P.S. they deserve to win the raffle by far! I threw a small curveball along the way and they handled it professionally and executed it without hesitation. Lastly, they were quicker than my initial estimate!

name: Yolande Turberville
text: Dustin and Super Stan did a awesome job packing up and unpacking all my furniture, boxes, and bags of things. They are excellent and quick @ loading and unloading. They also packed and unpacked my lawn furniture. I do not understand @ all why the person below me would rate Move Daddy a 1. I gave them a 5 because of what an awesome job they did and their great personalities.

name: Amy Gable
text: Justin and Jordan did a great job and made us feel like they really cared about making our move easy and stress-free. This is an excellent company with excellent service and values. Thank you Move Daddy! Highly recommend.

name: Ashley Eiler
text: Logan and Nicu were the most pleasant workers.  They ran for 12 hours straight.  Nothing but great attitudes.  They carried every single item carefully with great attention to making sure nothing was harmed.  We recommend them without reservation!!!

name: Robin Smith
text: I have used Move Daddy several times for moves and again, they did not disappoint. The move was excellent. Kylan and Nathan were professional, courteous and worked tirelessly. In spite of the fact that the move involved a 6th floor apartment to a 4th floor apartment down a long hall, they worked quickly, efficiently and without complaint. They also took extra care with the furniture and boxes and everything arrived without damage. I highly recommend Move Daddy and especially, Kylan and Nathan.

name: Tonya Jackson
text: Excellent experience!! Dakoda and Wells were professional and efficient!! They went above and beyond our expectations! I would definitely use MoveDaddy again!

name: Hunter Priest
text: I never thought moving gun safes could go so smoothly. Kylan, Mark, Nathan and Dekoda effortlessly loaded and unload 3 safes for me. Excellent work guys.

name: Moody High School
text: We shopped around and this was the only company that didn’t try to add more expenses to the move. They were super helpful from the beginning, and the movers arrived on-time and never stopped working all day. They made our moving day happen in one day and were awesome. Would highly recommend them and will use them again in the future.

name: Chris Ferguson
text: We used Move Daddy on 12/30 for our home move...arrived on time...worked their tails off!  Respectful to our family...POLITE!!!  MANNERS!!!  Logan and Tzaak did a fantastic job...THEY are the reason we have used Move Daddy for our past commercial and home moves!  Logan and Tzaak make the choice to us Move Daddy an easy one!  Price/quote VERY reasonable too!  Thank you MDaddy!!!

name: Barry Burton
text: Always running and moving fast! Great guys

name: Jennifer Argo
text: This is my first experience with Move Daddy and I would definitely use again and refer them to others.I called Move Daddy this morning and requested same day moving help if possible. One hour later Justin and Christian showed up at my house ready to work. They were courteous, friendly, professional, and very fast! They took great care in making sure no damage or marks occurred to walls or furniture. I will definitely request these two in the future the next time I need help moving furniture around.

name: Erin Cagle
text: They moved us today and it was a wonderful experience! They showed up on time at 8am ready to get the job started. We appreciated that they charge the same price to move on a Saturday as it would have been during the week. Justin and Tyler were very professional and very hard working! They went out of their way to make sure everything was exactly where we wanted it and even offered to help move furniture we already had in the house! Great service! We will use them if we move again!!

name: shane thomas
text: My move was Great and faster then i expected. Nick and his crew. was very careful with everything. Even a thousand pound gun safe they made look like paper.  5 stars Very pleased .

name: S Simpson
text: I could not be happier with the service that I received from Move Daddy.  Justin, Kylan and Caleb did a great job.  They arrived on time, everyone seemed to have a task and got to work.  The guys were very friendly, clean and easy to work with.  I highly recommend this company.

name: Ashlyn Delianides
text: BEST MOVING EXPERIENCE!! Amazing experience. Very respectful men helped move us from a third floor apartment building into a house and literally ran up the steps back to the apartment to get another load. Will absolutely use again! Thank you, Move Daddy.  It was the money absolutely well spent!!!

name: Monique Montenegro
text: Jared provided me with the most professional quote while I was shopping around.  I went with MoveDaddy and  received the best moving experience, EVER!  Zach and Leonard were my two movers and they were prompt, courteous, and fast.  We began the day in Birmingham, AL at 0700 and ended the day at 1300 in Memphis, TN.  Fantastic job!!

name: Megan Smith
text: We used MoveDaddy twice within 2 months and they made our move so easy! They could not be any easier to work with and their staff is so professional. Our movers included Jerald and Andy for the first move. The second move included Jerald, Jordan, and Chris. They were so efficient and helpful. We couldn’t imagine moving without them! There is no doubt we’d use them again.

name: Ryan Futral
text: Kylan & Izakk really blew me away today. These guys moved my entire house to storage with blazing speed without a scratch or knick on anything. Excellent job guys, I’ll be seeing you soon!

name: Gwen Childs
text:
Following a scheduled moving experience which was much less than stellar with another company, we found ourselves needing a mover the following day to move lots of furniture "forgotten" by the other company.
Wonderfully, MoveDaddy had a cancellation at the last minute and we were able to secure their services.  Andy and Matthew arrived promptly, calling to advise us of their impending  arrival. They were so friendly, energetic and worked so quickly but with consideration for our belongings.   This dynamic duo accomplished so much in 5 hours.  We heartily recommend the Move Daddy team of Andy and Michael.

name: Ross Williams
text: UNBELIEVABLE COMPANY! Jered and his guys went ABOVE AND BEYOND to get my 4 bedroom 3 bath house with a HUGE SAFE moved. Absolutely 5 STAR SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!! Thanks again guys!

name: Melvin Barnes
text: Highly recommended!   Both movers were prompt and did an excellent job with moving all of my heavy furniture with ease.  If I had to move again I would absolutely choose this company.

name: William Norman
text: Mathew, Andy and Junior did a great job with our move. It was a complicated move due to multiple pickup locations and some furniture going but some staying. They kept it all straight and did a fantastic job.

name: Misty Smith
text: Kylan and Andy were AMAZING and FAST! Great guys!

name: Lifting Man
text: We just completed our move from Alabama to Michigan with Move Daddy. Dakota and Mark were absolutely fantastic. It was 96 degrees in Alabama when they loaded the truck, and they kept running to and from the truck! We had a lot of very heavy furniture as well as a weight room, and they were great. Unloading was the same experience. This is the second time we have used Move Daddy, and we were very pleased each time. We can’t say enough about how professional and courteous Dakota and Mark were, we actually hated to see them leave!

name: Wes Edwards
text: Great moving experience thanks to Move Daddy! The ops manager was very responsive to emails and calls. The crew were all very polite and personable. They worked hard and moved us quickly. They were also very gentle with our belongings and treated the things they were handling with care and respect. Recommending to my friends and family for their future moving needs. Thanks Move Daddy.

name: Stefanie Blakely
text: Excellent experience with my move!!  Dustin and George were on time, friendly and extremely efficient.  My move took significantly less time than the company I hired the last time I moved & was far less expensive.  I would absolutely hire MoveDaddy again!

name: John Lehman
text:
My fourth time using Move Daddy, I’m yet again impressed with the professionalism, courtesy, and respectful demeanor of its work-crews.  Dekoda, Nathan, and Dejon, today’s crew, certainly  did not disappoint. They were prompt and worked exceptionally hard, maintaining all-the-while cheery dispositions.  Outstanding work-product at reasonable rates.

JRL

name: Jacob Farmer
text: Awsome . The manger is amazing

name: Joseph Caudill
text: MoveDaddy Rocks!  They had the best rates and incredible movers!  Not sure if you can request specific movers but if you can request Lloyd and Braden.  Let me tell you they hustled, were very polite, helped move additional furniture at our unloading location and just great guys!!  I can't say enough about them.

name: Kevin Ryan
text: The team was great. Really tock care of us and made adjustments as needed. Thanks Justin,  Michael,  Brent,  and Jack for your great work. Looking forward to work with you'll again.

name: John Montgomery
text: All of the guys were great! Friendly, and moved fast! I had to hustle to keep up with everything. Thank you Nick & Logan

name: William George
text: On September 26th Logan and Darius packed up my home into a POD.. they were great very professional and worked quickly.  Totally recommend using MoveDaddy.  When I got to my new home November 16th Dakota and Tyler un packed the POD and did a great job just as fast and professional.

name: Christi Phillips
text: Extremely accommodating company. Fantastic service. Andrew was more than helpful and very knowledgeable.

name: William Land
text: Lloyd and Austin were awesome when we moved some furniture around from one house to the next. They ran the whole time which helped save us money and did exactly what we asked. They even followed up on making sure  everything  was done right. I will definitely use them again and I am telling everyone what a great job they did. These two are fine young men and easy to talk to.

name: Sheylan Patel
text: Lloyd and Stan were great. They were incredibly fast in unloading the car and were easy to direct to get our stuff where it needed to go in the house. They were quite literally running into and out of the house with the boxes and finished unpacking a 16' truck in under an hour. It took us 15 hours to pack the truck. They were careful to avoid damaging the house as they brought in the furniture and none of my stuff was mistreated despite their hustle. Would definitely hire them again.

name: Elizabeth Pilkington
text: Dakoda and Andy were professional, courteous, and respectful! Will hire them again!

name: Nurse Bae
text: Kylan and Izaak were wonderful. They moved everything in a timely and efficient manner. They were very respectful of my belongings. The only complaint I have is that I thought they would arrive at 2pm but came at 10am instead. Apparently the time you chose is an estimate and they can come earlier or later. The early arrival greatly inconvenienced me. That is a company issue and has nothing to do with my awesome movers Kylan and Izaak. Even tho the times were off I would still use movedaddy again because of the young gentlemen.

name: mathew phillips
text: Move Daddy is a great company. My move was last minute and i was panicking. when the movers showed up they were NICE. FAST and STRONG. Nick was the lead man. He absolutely killed it.

name: Latanya Slau
text: Move daddy was AMAZING! Harper, Dustin and Stan moved me yesterday and they were awesome. They were very professional ( yes ma'am and no ma'am) and super fast. They moved me to a 3rd floor apartment with no problem. From now on I will be using them every time I move. Thanks guys!

name: Elise Deschenes
text: My MoveDaddy experience exceeded my expectations. Doug, Malcom and Tyler were all very courteous and moved my large furniture quickly and carefully. Definitely a company I would use again/recommend!

name: Rebecca Bryant
text: When moving we priced around and felt move daddy was going to be best for our budget. When the day arrived to move the guys arrived in thetime frame we were expecting them and they worked hard the entire time we had them. From start to finish they moved quickly and got the job done for us in less time they we were expecting!

name: Leslie Trucks
text: Thank you Dustin and Leonard for another great Move, you guys rocked it yesterday.   Highly recommend these guys to move you!    Very efficient and professional group of men that have done an awesome job for us and also for the people we have referred to them.

name: Nicole Odom
text: MoveDaddy movers Austin and Dustin moved my stuff two states over, and they did a phenomenal job! They were on time, efficient, had a great attitude, and kept all my furniture safe. All this at a price lower than competitors. I would definitely use them again!

name: wilsoly
text: If I could give them a zero, I would. We had the worst experience with this location! They refused to move items they charge extra for. Then did not move our furniture into our new house when we got there. They were slow to move things in, which I believe is why they charge by the hour. Please save yourself the headache and use someone else!!

name: Vickie Scott
text: The absolute best moving company!!!!!  We highly recommend them.  Tyler and Dekoda took great care of us.

name: Patrick Lynch
text: I contacted Move Daddy on Monday, scheduled my move for Wednesday and had everything completed, quickly, professionally, and with care.  Having multiple stops to contend with did not phase the movers, Dakoda and Kylan, a bit.  Their cooperativeness, attention to detail in the moving of the furniture, packing expertise and timelyness were outstanding.  With four stops, loading and unloading bulky furniture, these two guys were like super heros and completed the job in less than four hours.  I highly recommend Move Daddy for all of your moving needs, will use them again when needed, and will recommend them to my clients.

name: Cara Clark
text: Austin, Devon & Lloyd are fantastic! Incredibly hardworking and positive attitude even with challenges! I highly recommend this team for your next move. They were professional, courteous and efficient. Thanks, guys!

name: RUBY HUNT
text: Kylan,Nick, Christian move me today they did a great job for me. Thank you!

name: kelajay
text: Move Daddy is awesome! We had 3 guys helping me move and they were great!

name: Debbie Lange
text: I was married for 48 years when my husband suddenly passed away.  I needed to move to a smaller home and hired Move Daddy to assist in my move.  During our marriage we moved 9 times and this move, by far, was the most professional. My movers, Stan and Justin, kept asking if there was anything else they could do for me.  They wanted to make sure I was satisfied with the placement of the furniture and boxes before they left.  My bill was less than two other estimates I secured for the move. The Saturday after my move, Dustin and Matt came to my home to organize my garage. I am so grateful for Move Daddy during this new chapter in my life.

name: Michael Ray
text: These guys are fast! They picked up furniture at one house then went to an apartment to get more furniture and take it our house in about three hours (drive time was about an hour). They removed all of the stress of moving. Worth every penny!

name: Sam Bonner
text:
Highly recommended.

I will definitely use MoveDaddy for all my moving in the future, and I recommend you do too.

I don't know what Nick and Zack's job titles are, but it should be Moving Athlete, or perhaps Moving Champion. They moved us today and they absolutely killed it. Nick and Zack were on-time and worked incredibly hard, fast, and smart. They were both courteous and polite as well.

My MoveDaddy experience was so great, I'm actually disappointed that I'm not moving again anytime soon.

name: Dr. Tameka Lee
text: Toby, Justin, Jordan, and Michael These guys moved us in 2 trucks, 10 hours.  One full house to the new house.  They were on time, and they hustled the whole time.  I asked them to help position heavy items to places they would sit and they never complained.  Great experience.  Would highly recommend.

name: Chris Cato
text: I've had movedaddy dot-com move us twice and I had excellent service each time. They are conscious of their time and often are running to load boxes. I have been totally impressed by both moves. I had 4 guys on my last move expertly back 2 trucks up my steep driveway and finish unloading our furniture. Justin served both moves, and was helped by Jordan, Toliver and Zack this week.

name: Holly Smith
text: Stan, Dustin and Devon had us completely moved in 2.5 hours!!! They were wonderful, very efficient and took really good care of our household goods! Strongly recommend Move Daddy for your next move!

name: Tina Petrig
text: My experience with MoveDaddy was excellent from the first call with Jered.  The price was significantly lower than competitors.  The movers, Randy and Justin, were on time, efficient, courteous and careful with my belongings.  These folks take the stress out of moving.

name: Jonathan Moore
text: Something does not seem right about the review left by "Countess." Zack moved me last week, and I CANNOT say enough about this wonderful young man. He was polite, FAST, professional through and through. I've not met many young men of this caliber. Although I can't speak to Austin's  performance ( I had Stan) If they work at movedaddy I can only assume that he is great too!! Great job guys!

name: Conor Davis
text:
I'm not a big reviewer but I felt like I had to share. I own a business just down the street from them and have seen them driving through the neighborhood for years, first of all I have NEVER in the years I've seen their trucks multiple times a day had a negative thought about their driving.

So I hired them to do a small move for a friend who lives out in pinson so I was worried about price due to drive times. This is maybe the 7th time I've used movers, first with them. The guys got there before me and we're already a third of the way through the move before I even showed up minutes after them.

My friend who was moving was very stressed and the guys set her at ease. They grabbed everything, they would ask about anything that they had questions about, recommended we put a couple of loose pieces of art in the car for extra safety, and made sure everything was nicely packed in the truck. They were legit jogging back and forth from truck to house. And even pointed out a couple things that we missed that needed to go.

When they got to the next location they dove into the work. Again unloading fast (but safely) and putting each thing where they needed to go. Making sure that odd and important things were set aside or noted. On top of that the guys did a great job with my friends 4 kids and her mom that were at the house! The guys put them all at ease and engaged with them happily!

And the thing that I personally liked the most due to my line of work was how good they were with the family dogs. They were aware of the little one running around and were sure they were clear when doing anything. Justin and Tyler were HANDS DOWN the best moving crew I've used. And (I probably shouldn't mention this because they're bosses will see lol) because of their hustle it ended being a little cheaper than I expected. Seriously 12/10 service, will hire again.

name: Personal Chef, Phyne'sse
text: It is very disturbing to hear someone unhappy about a service they received from a company.  As a business owner I pride myself off of my many referrals to others from my current clients.  My reputation means EVERYTHING!  Unfortunately, this company does NOT believe that at all!  From the reviews of my respected client, Ms. Fleming, I would definitely NOT use this company or refer anyone else to use them.

resp.text:
Claims of racial discrimination made to us by Countess Fleming are not true. Claims of poor service are not true. Zach is a 5 star performer. Read our other google reviews that mention Zach by name. Countess Fleming wants a 100% refund so she can have a free move. No refund is due.

However, as a resolution and to firmly demonstrate that this is not a financial decision for us, we will donate the entire cost of the move, $1,600 plus an additional $1,000 for membership, to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute. Total donation to be $2,600.

name: S Young
text: Justin and Tyler moved our office.  They were quick, courteous, and had great attitudes. I would definitely recommend them for your next move.

name: Tammi Thomas
text: Dustin and Stan provided excellent moving service both days! YES, two days of moving and they never slowed down. Highly recommend these guys÷

name: Jerard and Becky Baker
text: We used Move Daddy for our move yesterday and could not be more pleased with them.  They arrived on time, the movers were friendly and professional.  They respect that they are charging you hourly and SERIOUSLY HUSTLE.  I literally saw them running back to their truck several times. They went way above and beyond the call of duty.  I hope we aren't moving anytime soon, but if we are we would NEVER use another company again.  They are the BEST!

name: Kevin Finnen
text: We could not have been more pleased with the service received.  These guys hustled for 3 straight hours.  We had 2 trucks and crews, and these guys did a fantastic job.  Thank you to Harrison, Israel, Chris and Jerald.

name: John Kramer
text: MoveDaddy move me for Georgia to Alabama.  The office was very professional and handle everything quickly.  There Quote from an inventory I provided was above the actual cost.  The payment was handled on my credit card w/o any problems.  Justin and Tyler showed up about 2-3 pm the day of the move and had my 2000+ sq. ft. house emptied in 3 hours.  They came to the AL home the next morning and unloaded even faster.  They really hustled in the extreme heat.  Great job!

name: Tom Walker
text: Great positive attitude, moved with haste. Mason and Toby worked very hard and really knew what they were doing. 10/10, would move again.

name: Angela Gunter
text: We used Movedaddy to move our corporate offices a few weeks ago and they were outstanding!!!  Justin & Tyler were on time, very courteous, and so careful with every item they moved.  They were running from building to truck always, and they were so careful being sure not to hit any walls or dirty the floors.  They made a "not so fun" day into a pleasant day with their positive attitude and attention to detail.  We highly recommend Justin & Tyler!!!! We ALWAYS use Movedaddy and they never disappoint.

name: Aaron Myers
text: Great guys hard workers Logan and Dekoda

name: Becky Anthony
text: On one of the hottest days of the years, these guys (Justin, David, & Damon) were moving like they were NOT being paid by the hour.  This is my second time using Move Daddy and I highly recommend them.

name: Heather McLeod
text: Zack, Brady and Acorye moved my household last week, and I couldn't have had a better experience. I thought my move was going to take all day because I was moving from a third floor apartment to a second floor condo. Boy was I wrong! They were lightening fast and had me completely moved in under five hours. I've never used a moving company before and was nervous trusting strangers with my things. However, everyone I spoke with from the office staff to the movers were helpful, kind and completely professional. I would not hesitate to use this company again, and I highly recommend them to everyone else.

name: Josh Sheppard
text:
Last month I moved from Birmingham to Atlanta and am so happy with the services provided by MoveDaddy. The movers, Andy and Joey, were not only friendly but fantastic at their job. They arrived on time, ready to go. I did basically nothing during the move while these guys made life easy, moving fast while still careful with my things. They arrived at our destination very quickly and unloaded everything quicker than one could expect, they were even jogging back to the truck to get the next thing!

The price was fair and did not change either. I’m happy I used them and would certainly use their services again!

name: karen lakanen
text: They moved me twice in past year. Amazing efficient and personable. Price great. They are always on time too!

name: Lori Mutert
text: Zack and Austin were awesome movers!!! They were quick and rocked it!!! I would recommend them to anyone looking for trust worthy guys who take care of your needs!

name: Francine
text:
MOVE DADDY HAS ALL THE RIGHT MOVES.
I am in Birmingham 6 years and have used this company 3 times... after the first move I realized I would never use another company if they we're available.... I am very picky about my possessions and personal home... add in nerves that nothing will be damaged and it doesn't make for the easiest person to please - well these young men are professional, courteous, fast, smart thinking and strong... The best thing I can say about Move Daddy and its employees is that they are honest and caring as well. Coming from someone who has moved thru 5 states and done every kind of move out there from u-hauls to big expensive corporate moves with my car on the truck, THIS company has exceeded my expectations each time. This particular move I had Zack, Nick & Jontez. They were thorough and even shared in my delight of me finally moving into my brand new home in Birmingham - we paid good money to move but it was worth every penny - not even a mark on my eggshell white walls..... the rates were very fair as well & Amy in the office was personable and a good organizer.
Blessings & many thanks!!!
Francine

name: Jordan Amacher
text: They damaged a lot of our furniture and when we told them, they fought with us and insisted that they didn’t damage anything! Definitely NOT using again.

name: Gary Eubanks
text: Justin, Leonard, and Casey moved us on Monday, June 19th. We could not have had a better experience. They were on time, polite, worked extremely hard and efficient, and were very careful with our "stuff". Great Job Guys. Would recommend to anyone.

name: Paige Larson
text: They were amazing today! Worked quick and were very friendly! Jordan, Justin and Jr. were the guys who helped me! Book with move daddy!

name: Sherrie Roberts
text: Wanted to say that Colin McLaughlin did an amazing job with our move!!!

name: Lila Simmons
text: we had a great experience with our movers kylan and joey from movedaddy. they were on time professional courteous and FAST! but also careful. they knew what they were doing. they made a very stressful time worry free for me taking care of everything and listening to me. i will definitely use move daddy again!

name: Allen Riley
text: Jenkins, JR, Tucker, and Nathan did a fantastic job.

name: Paul Elmore
text:
I started out feeling I was going to get miss informed like 2 Men and a Truck did me 3 years ago. Amy gave me an estimate over the phone ( and was very nice, and informative). Nick called when they left for my home to let me know they were on there way. Nick, Israel, Gerald, and Darrius hit the ground running, all very polite. They loaded both trucks working together, and continued to make sure they were getting everything I needed them to. After unloading and I was ready to pay my bill, The honesty and integrity of this company came out. I was excited to hear how reasonable my move was( shocked actually ). And the boss spoke to Nick and told him the reduced price because they were stuck in traffic...
I will use them when I find a new home to move to, and will feel that I want be taken advantage of. Thank you guys, Awesome hiring job.

name: Charles S
text: This is the second time I have used Move daddy to move and I can’t tell you how great these guys are! They made the usually stressful dreadful move into an easy stress free situation. The crew that helped today were friendly, helpful and quick. They made it known that they knew I was paying by the hour so they wanted to be as quick as possible for me. I recommend movedaddy to anyone. I know the cost is more than renting an uhual truck but it is well worth it in your time and your friends will appreciate you for not asking them to help you move or borrow their truck. I am very pleased! Thank you so much!

name: Catherine Phelps
text: I was very pleased with my Move Daddy experience, Justin and Nick was great and handled all of our moving needs. We will always recommend and use them again.

name: Tarek Pacha, DO
text: Book them with no reservation! I love this group of guys! The best moving experience I have had by far! Everyone from Jarrad ( the manager) to his staff Matt and Justin were all awesome. They handled our stuff like it was theirs. They literally ran to the truck and back yet they took their time with the delicate pieces. Matt and Justin did not leave until we were completely satisfied. Not a single wall was scratched. Short or long distance this is your company! They do business the way it should be!

name: Paul Clarke
text: Moved from Bhm to Opelika. These guys were fast, responsible and very respectful. They took great care of our furniture to ensure there were no scratches, dents or other issues. Anything we asked for, they were ready to get it done. We will definitely use them again.

name: Anna Grace Gatlin
text: Love this company great service! Theo and Logan are awesome

name: Aundrea Welch
text:
Matt and Kevin moved my stuff and they did an excellent job. They were courteous and  efficient on time. All of my furniture was wrapped and there wasnt any dents or scratches on it after the move. I have moved several times over the years and they did the best job.   I will use Move Daddy again.
Thank you,
Aundrea

name: Betsy Hughes
text: A HUGE thanks to Dustin, Devon, Leonard, Harrison, and Key for the excellent service we received during our move on Friday.  They were prompt, polite, careful, and fast. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Lori Ennis
text: Dekoda and Nathan were outstanding!

name: Todd Morgan
text: Move Daddy was fantastic. Great service. Great moving dudes. Very happy with our experience.

name: Allie
text: Highly recommend! Very professional and moved us in a timely manner.

name: Dori Evans
text: Andy and Jr. were Amazing!!! Super Polite & accommodating

name: T Savage
text: By far the most competent moving company we've used in Birmingham, and for that matter, anywhere we've lived in the U S. over the past 15 years (8 military relocations)!!!!! Five Stars!!!!! My wife and I were in a bind trying to find a company we were comfortable with handling our oversized antique furniture, wall art, and two 1,000 lb safes from our 4 bedroom home. The crew, Malcolm and Tyler, were stellar in every possible way and made the daunting process of moving our family so easy and stress-free that I will never hesitate to call these guys again for any of our moving needs. Go Movedaddy!!!!!

name: Tamlyn Neiber
text: Kylan & Jerald were AWESOME!! Very fast, and extremely careful, very  curious !! My   Fiancé  Has to have stuff move from his old location and will be requesting those 2  he said he’ll wait till they are available, after hearing me raving about them . I could not be happier with my experience!!!! Thank you!!

name: Craig Roddam
text: Zack, Nick, and Leonard did a fantastic job. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and politeness were 2nd to none. You will not be disappointed in using this group.

name: Tyler Brown
text: Great company also Theo is a hard worker and a cool guy

name: pedro martinez
text:
Short version:  top notch in every facet, highly recommend.
Long version: I have moved too many times to count, I dread it every single time.  I have seen some sorry movers in my day.  From the first phone call, MoveDaddy was different.  Relaxed and helpful on the scheduling, actual customer care in a time period that it is dead in America.  Rain was imminent on the scheduled day and I called them several times that week stressed out about it.  They said they would gladly move in the rain if we had to but could easily reschedule if needed.  They gave me the option of Friday afternoon or Saturday morning, no worries.  Sat morning came and two polite bright eyed men showed up right on time.  They were eager to get started and worked diligently to protect our things and move quickly.  They actually ran out of the truck back into the house to get another load, actually ran.  They had to move several awkward things, including a very heavy sofa over a rail to the bottom floor, did so with precision and care.  They moved artwork and TVs, all came out perfect.  They showed great respect and patience with my wife as to where she wanted things.  It was a hot long day and they still ran out of the house back to the truck for another load as the move was winding down.  Polite the whole time.  Their names were Matt and Justin.  Thank you gentlemen for making a potential very stressful day much much easier.

name: Jennifer Pochran
text: Highly recommend!  Zac, Hunter and Leonard did a fantastic job with my move and were easy and fun to work with.  I will definitely use them again!

name: notreace
text: If you are moving...USE THESE GUYS!!! They were super fast, responsive to my needs, and professional. I have moved a few times,even out of state and last move with Move Daddy was the best experience. The fear of the quote and expense was erased in less than five minutes of their arrival.  They move to get you where you and your stuff needs to be.  They are the best.  Thanks Jered, Justin and other guy that was was great.

name: Ellison
text: I had them pick up furniture from Richard Tubb's and deliver to my house.  They were on time and helped rearrange furniture that I could not.  They were careful of the doorways, paint and hardwoods.  EXACTLY what you expect from a moving company! The guys were polite, professional, and respectful.  I will definitely use them again. Thanks Jered!

name: Lisa Gaines
text: justin, jay edward, logan, and luke were amazing... moved quickly, moved carefully, and were the friendliest, most accommodating movers I’ve experienced. Great company, great guys, great customer service. Rare in this day and age, and worth EVERY reasonably-priced cent.

name: Doctor Aubie
text:
This is Andy Sokol writing a review for the recent move of Dodie Sokol.
This is THE ONLY COMPANY to use for a move. They are service oriented and made everything smooth and simple outside of the family boxing and throwing out 40 years of ‘stuff’. They. Offer hanging boxes for rent.
One call and everything was set.
They arrived on time and they worked and hustled.
Now, let me give credit to the ‘sweat’:
Jack, Luke, and Trey (Auburn bound)
These young men were:
Polite
Efficient
Careful
Hustled
Helpful
Organized
Delicate when needed
Smart on packing the truck
On time

If this review could give 10 stars, I would give it.

Kudos again to Trey, Luke, and Jack

Ps Jack maneuvered that truck like a captain on a cruise ship would dock a ship.
"Captain Jack"

name: Xiong Vivian
text:
Huge thanks to Justin Cam and Andre. You guys made our moving way more easier than our thought.

So I did a lot of movers google research in Birmingham area. Movedaddy drew my attention due to their high review. Moving is such a stressful thing and people normally will get so tired of all the hidden fees by moving company. My whole process with movedaddy company is very smooth. Price is also very reasonable too. I got their moving policy after I booked the service. The most important part is their service. They gave me a call before they head out and  brought over their moving dolly and cart to improve the whole efficiency. Impressive on how they handle all our items - super fast. We have a treadmill which is hard to get out of our room. They were helping us to dissemble it and made it out finally. I told them before hand we were booking for 2 hours service and they actually reminded us when time approached.

I will highly recommend movedaddy to someone who is looking for movers in Birmingham area. Worth paying few hundred to get professional help from a moving company.

name: Copeland Webster
text: Stan and Dustin did a awesome job. They were super fast and very polite. Great expiernce and made moving much easier!

name: Maghan Armstrong
text: Kylan and Joey went above and beyond...Always such a great experience using Move Daddy (this is our 2nd time) !   These guys stay so positive... moving days can be long and tough but they keep a smile on their face and never slow down.  Can not recommend them enough!

name: Jennifer Riha
text: I needed help moving a huge table. Called yesterday. The guys came today. Very grateful for the awesome job and fast service!!!

name: Connor Bauknight
text: Mark and Logan were extremely professional, diligent and quick in their work while moving me out of my apartment. Tetris pros.

name: W.H. White
text: EXEMPLARY CUSTOMER SERVICE from initial booking with Andrew and Jarrod in the office with whom I spoke on two separate occasions, respectively, regarding a move date reservation and confirmation.  I called around to several moving companies prior to Movedaddy and was less than impressed with the fact that I was not guaranteed arrival within a specific timeframe, not to mention the job date was more than a month out with other companies, namely those having a cartoon logo, sons, and transfer in their names. Other companies made me (and my family) feel like a number and insecure about booking with them. Movedaddy took special care and provided a very customer-centric approach to our relocation. Not only were they punctual, they were also very polite, respectful, and communicative with respect to determining the logistics of our move. We have heavy, oversized antique heirloom furniture and had packed over 200 boxes from our previous 4-bedroom house. Tyler and Theo provided the utmost and outstanding customer service by ensuring every piece of furniture and miscellaneous item was carefully, neatly, and brilliantly packed. My wife and I were so impressed, and frankly inspired, by how fit these young guys are, as they literally ran (sprinted) back to the truck non-stop to grab another item in this hot summer weather. Tyler and Theo are absolute beasts...thanks a million guys!!! We will always recommend Movedaddy to our friends and family. The one-star reviews from the Amacher family or any others representing less than 5-star ratings are obviously hateful, unappreciative, spiteful, etc., and should be absolutely disregarded. This company takes a very thorough approach when moving you and your family, from the management in the office to the gentlemen showing up to your home to handle all of your family's personal possesions. There is no doubt in my mind that they would handle any concerns professionally, especially if they were in the wrong. Thanks for all that you do!!!

name: Meg McMillan
text: Today Nick, Cody, and Mike moved our furniture.  They all three worked so hard and were absolutely wonderful and polite.

name: Matt Hadaway
text: The movers aren't even done yet and Im already reviewing! Awesome crew! Very fast and very careful!! They wrap everything, no dents, no dings, no scuffs! Moving this stuff like its nothing! Very professional guys and worth every penny!! Will definitely recommend!!! Call movedaddy!!!!

name: Elizabeth Redding
text: We had movedaddy move my mother yesterday and they did an outstanding job! Dustin and Nick were fast and carefull with all of her things. We are actually moving into our new home in a couple of weeks and will be using hen for our move as well.

name: Loren Smith
text:
On Saturday, July 29, the movers Zach and Ausitn may have been off of their game. I drove four hours from Memphis to assist my friend Countess with her move. Although Zach was a very nice young man with the best of intentions, he fell short of the 5 star rating that the owner suggest that he is.  Poor service on this date was evident. The movers took almost thirteen hours to move a two bedroom apt. into a house. I witnessed the slow pace myself.  By nightfall (9 pm), a replacement (and more efficient) crew had to come to complete the job. The owner should stick to the facts that the move was poorly executed. It happens sometimes.  If I had to use Move Daddy after the move I witnessed, I 'd be less inclined to do so.  Countess request for a refund has little to do with race and everything to do with poorly executed service. I was delighted to read about the owners donation to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute, but I'm confused because poor service does not equal racial disparity. Wouldn't it have been easier to simply give a refund to the customer.  The owners gesture shows how racist he really is...His 2600 dollar donation shows guilt and malice toward the customer.  Every great company has  bad days but how those missteps are handled, determines its value.

Loren Smith  M.Ed

resp.text:
Claims of racial discrimination made to us by Countess Fleming are not true. Claims of poor service are not true. Zach is a 5 star performer. Read our other google reviews that mention Zach by name. Countess Fleming wants a 100% refund so she can have a free move. No refund is due.

However, as a resolution and to firmly demonstrate that this is not a financial decision for us, we will donate the entire cost of the move, $1,600 plus an additional $1,000 for membership, to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute. Total donation to be $2,600.

name: Jacki Sullivan
text: Nick was something else. He was so polite and perfect. He really help me with furniture placement.

name: Stacie Hurst-Cotton
text: Professional, courteous, priced right, and speedy job! In the event we need movers again, we will call Move Daddy!

name: Craig Gamble
text: Lloyd and Stan did a great job told them what I needed some and left. A few hours later showed up and unloaded....easy move cause of those 2 guys!!!!

name: Cammie killough
text: Very pleased with this company!! Highly recommend Justin, he was very polite & got the job done in timely  manner!

name: Alison Scott
text: Had a great experience today with Rucker, George and Leonard. I would highly recommend these guys.

name: Terri Moore
text: Christian and JR were polite and efficient.  I will most definitely call MoveDaddy again!

name: t c
text: Andy, Cody, and Junior did a great job with my move!

name: Julie Howard
text: Justin and Tyler are the best!!  Hustled the entire 10 hours!!!  Will request them by name next time.

name: Amy Pate
text: Horrible company!!! They were supposed to show up at a certain time and never called to say they were running late, finally after calling 3 times over a 4 hour period the owner finally said they were not coming out. They completely stood me up and left me in a huge bind. The owner was very rude and not understanding of my situation as well!!!! DO NOT USE THEM!!!!

resp.text: We regret any occurrence whereby a persons' conduct is such that we must refuse to move them.

name: Jennifer Ludwick
text: Move Daddy team was incredible!  I don’t think the guys stopping running the whole time they were moving my belongings inside.  Super, professional, thoughtful and kept me informed the entire time.  We’ve had our share of horrible movers, so we were excited to find these guys!  Our team consisted of Christian, Kylan (might be spelled Kvlan), Toliver and Jordan; they were wonderful!!  We will definitely call them again for any of our moving needs and request this team!

name: John David Scozzaro
text: My crew was Matt, Dakota, and Josh. These guys worked fast, smart, and more importantly very careful. They were very polite throughout the process. Moving comes with a lot of stress and these guys took that stress away from me.

name: matt allison
text: Great job by Kaylan and Joey. This is my second time using MoveDaddy and they have movers who are professional and man they hustle. I will never use another moving company.

name: Samantha Gagliano
text: Zack, Casey, Randy did a fantastic job with our move today. Definitely will use them again.

name: Kate Weaver
text: Nick and Dylan went over and beyond to help me move into my new home and also helped my dad as well! The guys were awesome!

name: Maurice Davis
text:
I too was charged an exorbitant amount of money to move from a one bedroom to a two bedroom. Everything was packed. They only had to do the move. Load and unload. They brought in a very large/long truck. Because they had to pack a mansion later that day. (Only for that to be canceled!) But I mention this because....Having to load and unload that long truck with my belongings made my move time much longer!!!!! The extra walking through the truck, etc... I paid over $1,000. I think it was $1,300. It has been so long. I definitely felt cheated. The manager/owner drove up in a red corvette lol to have me sign the paperwork before the move. I think they told me they would only compensate me 20 cents on the dollar for any damage. Awful place.

Edit: maybe it wasn't a red Corvette. It was definitely a sports car!!! The year was 2012. I'd use my law degree/resources and see if I can find out myself the type of cars he has had registered in his name, but it isn't that serious.

Edit 2: uh I have a Finance degree and MBA. You purchased the rights to the company...logo and all. When you purchased his business, you purchased his history. To be honest, I would not have posted this review if I hadn't seen this happened to someone else. Instead of donating to the Civil Rights institute, you should've negotiated a settlement with that lady. Because people like myself...when they notice someone else has had a similar experience...just like the Cosby accusers, they will be more inclined to speak up and out about their experience. #MeToo

name: Jahnna Cole
text: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND MOVEDADDY Cahaba Heights! It was the best moving experience I’ve had to date. The guys were extremely efficient, on-time and respectful of my things. They did an excellent job and at a very fair rate. I would definitely use them again!

name: Robin Richardson
text: Great reliable company

name: William Angel
text: Very professional.  Movers were hustling the entire time.  Highly recommend.

name: Mary L Dearman
text:
Malcolm and Tyler came ready to move and were very professional.
I would definitely use Move daddy again!!

name: Lisa W
text: They were prompt, polite, efficient and energetic.   I thought they did a good job at a reasonable rate.

name: Spilt Tea Tarot By: ELT
text: Professional staff and quality service.

name: Brennan “TheRealBNasty” Lott
text:
WOW! What a mistake . I was on the phone with my mother when this Zach, character was being very disrespectful towards her . I am all for supporting smaller family owned, or community owned companies. But Movedaddy, is Not a Honest company. If you're looking for a quality and decent moving experience, I'd advise you look elsewhere. And if you end up being obligated to use the company, please dont leave these thugs around your family without a male presence. Because they will take advantage of the situation, leaving your family harassed and with an outrageous bill triple what was quoted .  I'm just glad that my family is safe.
Sincerely
A man who made the mistake of trusting what he thought would be a decent company around his family unattended.
Be careful who you leave around your family, it could have been a lot worse.

resp.text:
Claims of racial discrimination made to us by Countess Fleming are not true. Claims of poor service are not true. Zach is a 5 star performer. Read our other google reviews that mention Zach by name. Countess Fleming wants a 100% refund so she can have a free move. No refund is due.

However, as a resolution and to firmly demonstrate that this is not a financial decision for us, we will donate the entire cost of the move, $1,600 plus an additional $1,000 for membership, to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute. Total donation to be $2,600.

name: Andrew Jackson
text: Just had the best move experience of my life. The guys and move daddy dont mess around. No damage and did the job twice as fast as i expected. Props to dustin and cody.

name: Jay Savage
