text: Jered and the crew at MoveDaddy made our move very easy and affordable. Dustin, Justin and Dakota hustled from the time they arrived and were very careful with our belongings. I highly recommend MoveDaddy for all your moving needs. We will definitely use these guys again.

name: Elizabeth Allison
text: Fast, respectful, and handled our belongings with care. Awesome service!

resp.text: Thanks Elizabeth!

name: Anita Webster-Harris
text: MoveDaddy just completed my move from a first floor apartment to a third floor apartment in another complex it was a hard job to accomplish but I can honestly say these guys WORKED and they WORKED HARD!!!! I have never been more satisfied with a moving company and I have moved a lot! I recommend MoveDaddy 110% to EVERYONE, These young men were speedy, polite, patient and hardworking and I am so THANKFUL I chose them. The price was right, they were professional, great teamwork among them and if you are looking  for someone to get the job done right please call them! I started with 2 guys (SPECIAL THANKS TO DUSTIN AND KHYLER, YOU ROCK!!!!!!) But when it got late all of a sudden when I looked up it was about 6-7 guys marching in with my stuff..Lol... The additional crew came in to help finish the job and they were awesome! Many, many thanks from me and my family... Anita Harris

name: Stephen Amacher
text: Don't see how everyone has rated them so high.  One of the worst moving experiences we have ever had.

name: Countess Fleming
text:
##REPORTED to NEWS and BBB for  FRAUDULENT BUSINESS PRACTICES! Channel 6 receives more complaints about this company than any other.  Good reviews are done by employees and family members.

RESOLUTION has NOT been reached with this company!  FRAUDULENT business practices!  It does NOT take 14 HOURS ($1600) to move someone from a 2 bdrm apt 12 miles away. No packing involved!

1.  A refund is  DEFINITELY JUSTIFIED!  It is the ONLY resolution to the primary complaint; I was OVERCHARGED!  The company's workers intentionally "rode" the clock and took extended breaks and lunches that I paid for.  MoveDaddy's LACK of INTEGRITY and PROFESSIONALISM is palpable.
2. It is unacceptable to wait for compensation for the damaged furniture.  As a good faith effort, this part of the dispute should be addressed immediately and separately.
3. The donation to the Civil Rights Institute is NO CONSEQUENCE to this claim.  The fact that the owner, Richard McBee, offered to make a donation to an African-American entity is patronizing and dismissive.  This dispute is about POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE and POOR BUSINESS PRACTICES!  The owner's donation offer is indicative of his own internal conflict with being a racist.
The RESOLUTION is to refund me 8.5 hours that your were overcompensated due to your employees extended breaks and lunches.  Second part of resolution is to compensate me for damaged property. REFUND me my money!

## UPDATE## Active BBB Complaint.   This complaint is about MoveDaddy's POOR DELIVERY of CUSTOMER SERVICE and POOR business practices!! Richard McBee's employees were taking extended breaks, lunches and being preoccupied on their cellphones while on the clock resulting in a 14 hour move that should have taken 5 hours or less.   I am willing to compromise and compensate you for 5 hours at $118 per hour.  I am requesting a refund of the other 8.5 hours plus the cost of a damaged chair estimated at $595 for replacement.

The owner, Richard McBee, did not provide me with a resolution!  I asked for a refund or at least a compromise for the POORLY executed services I received. Instead of providing me with a comparable resolution, the owner donated money to an institution that has NOTHING to do with this business transaction.    POOR service on this date was evident!  The movers took almost 14 hours to move a two bedroom apt. into a house 30 mins away.  There was NO packing involved...just loading and unloading.  The owner's $2600 donation shows guilt and malice towards the customer.  I understand that companies have bad days.  How those missteps are handled determines the company's value.  Donating money to a non-affiliated business is NOT a resolution to my business transaction.

Please note: It is a nice gesture to donate money; however, the BHM Civil Rights Center has NOT received any donation from you or your company per company representative.

***UPDATE:  I have FILED a COMPLAINT with the BBB and BCA.

Do NOT hire this company!!  They charged me $1600! The move was absolutely horrendous!!. Zack (with the locks) stayed on his phone the entire time. It took them 14 hours to move me!!!   I was charged $1600 for a move from a 2 bedroom apartment to a house 30 mins away.  Zack was completely belligerent when asked to complete the job and get off his cellphone.   I had to threaten to call the POLICE in order to remove him from my property. This took 14 hours and the job still was never completed. The company had to call in another truck to help the other 2 workers. My furniture was not put together. My house was left in shambles. The manager/owner Jared was UNPROFESSIONAL and rude!  Incorrect hookup in laundry caused my washer to leak in the laundry room. This crew was quite inexperienced and rude. Second crew was called in to complete unpacking!  Second crew finished unpacking within 1.5 hours. They never completed putting items together.  They offered to come back the next day and charge me again. Overall, a HORRIFIC EXPERIENCE!!  Save yourself the time, energy and money. Choose a different company.

resp.text:
Claims of racial discrimination made to us by Countess Fleming are not true. Claims of poor service are not true. Zach is a 5 star performer. Read our other google reviews that mention Zach by name. Countess Fleming wants a 100% refund so she can have a free move. No refund is due.

However, as a resolution and to firmly demonstrate that this is not a financial decision for us, we will donate the entire cost of the move, $1,600 plus an additional $1,000 for membership, to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute. Total donation to be $2,600.

name: Donald Green
text: Justin showed up and moved it Daddy! Great Job!!

name: Melissa Amacher
text: Not sure how they got this rating.  They damaged our refrigerator and told us to prove it.

name: A L
text: DO NOT! DO NOT! DO NOT HIRE THIS COMPANY!  VERY UNPROFESSIONAL!

resp.text:
Claims of racial discrimination made to us by Countess Fleming are not true. Claims of poor service are not true. Zach is a 5 star performer. Read our other google reviews that mention Zach by name. Countess Fleming wants a 100% refund so she can have a free move. No refund is due.

However, as a resolution and to firmly demonstrate that this is not a financial decision for us, we will donate the entire cost of the move, $1,600 plus an additional $1,000 for membership, to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute. Total donation to be $2,600.

name: Jenica Gillies
text: The movers were nice and did a good job. We had 4 guys and 2 trucks. Phillip, McManus, John, and Matthew were very professional and very easy to work with. They really worked hard to get everything moved as fast as possible and took great care of everything. If something wasn't labeled, they asked where it went, instead of just putting it somewhere. They also took great care to not damage either home. They lifted furniture instead of sliding it and took care to not bump the walls and doorways. They all seemed trained on how to move heavy furniture safely. I'm thankful for the movers we got and I highly recommend them to anybody getting ready to move.

name: Mary Lindsey
text: This company is horrible. My furniture is scratched and many items were damaged. Do NOT use this company any. They such and are rude. They even used my bathroom which I don't mind, but they clogged my toilets. Everything was a mess and I will never be using them again.

name: Andy Safiano
text: Of the 15 moves we have have gone through in the last 30 years, this one has been by far the worst.  Giving them 1 star because I can't do less.  Their packers were extremely unprofessional, took them 4 days for a job that should not have taken more than 2, and our belongings were thrown into boxes that are mis- labeled.  When it was time to deliver, they could not tell me when this would happen and their customer service leaves a lot to be desired!  STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY IF YOU HAVE A CHOICE.

name: Sarah Calvelage
text: Coleman moved a large piano to my home. They were prompt with service and made sure to take care not scratching my floors or damaging the fort on the way through. I would recommend them to anyone and will use them again myself.

name: Jeff Connaughton
text:
My moving experience with this company has been disastrous. First they left a third of my furniture behind. I’m still waiting on the “overflow” portion of my furniture almost two weeks after what was a two week late delivery of the first portion. What’s worse, thirteen items of furniture were damaged in transit. You literally have to try to damage that much of my belongings. Then the driver told me in person and repeatedly by phone that I would be contacted by a furniture repair person. Not true. I have to file a claim. I will update this review when I finally receive the rest of my stuff and after the claims process. But I would strongly advise against using Coleman for anything.
Update 12/10/20:  I submitted my claim on Oct 27. It’s been six weeks and while a furniture repair man came to my house to inspect each item of damage, so far I have heard nothing about authorized repairs or insurance payments.

name: Dale Brooks
text: This is the second time I have had to use these guys to move. Hopefully it will be the last time I have to move, but if I move again I will choose Allied. They know how to get the job done and are fast and efficient. The crew that moved me this time were very nice and worked hard. Best movers in Madison!!

name: Jessica Holden
text: The beginning of my experience with Coleman was great. Patti and Thomas were phenomenal to work with but it all went downhill after that. The guys that loaded our stuff did not pack with care or wrap any of my upstairs furniture.  They stacked boxes on top of things the should not have been stacked on top of. A lot of our furniture got damaged and scratched. My brand new stainless refrigerator was scratched and dented. And my $500 Roomba robot vacuum just disappeared into thin air. They also tell you that you can keep items in dresser drawers but then flip them completely upside down inside of the truck so all of your items inside the drawers are in complete disarray. Yes we got the insurance but it is a pain to file a claim and wait for repair or reimbursement. Especially when a lot of damages could’ve been avoided if they would have taken better care of our belongings. I’ve expressed my complaints to our moving coordinator but have not been contacted by anyone from management with an explanation or apology. We are extremely disappointed for what we got for the $6500+ we spent.

name: MARVIN B RIVERS
text:
I SPENT ALL DAY IN MY EMPTY APPARTMENT WAITING FOR YOUR MOVERS TO ARRIVE. THEY NEVER SHOWED UP , NOR DID THEY CALL ME TO LET ME KNOW WHY AND WHEN THEY WERE COMING. SO I AM STAYING ,IN A HOTEL AT $160 A DAY UTIIL MY FURNITURE ARRIVES . I AM NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER . PLEASE LET ME KNOW WHY THEY DID NOT LIVE UP OUR AGREEMENT AND WHEN MY FURNITURE WILL ARRIVE. I CANNOT AFFORD TO LIVE IN THIS HOTEL, WHEN I AM PAYING RENT ON AN APARTMENT
,

name: Brian Hornsby
text: Coleman Worldwide Moving is a terrible company. From John Combs to Tanner Johnson, nothing but lies from the beginning to end. After receiving our belongings late, damaged and items missing, no one would return our calls. The ignorant males loading our belongings asked my fiancé to feed him after buying them lunch in hopes they would do a better job in handling our things. We were videoed in our home by the driver John Williams after confronting them for roughly handling and damaging our home and belongings during the loading process. Tanner Johnson threatened us with breach of contract after voicing our concerns that we did not feel comfortable moving forward with the move after seeing our dining room table legs broken during the loading process. Our couch was loaded in the rain, dropped in water and never cleaned or boxed as promised by Tanner Johnson. We received our items damaged and late. We paid for services we did not receive and we estimated roughly $7,500 in damages and losses after the move was completed by Coleman Worldwide Moving of Hammond, Louisiana. Our 10 month old washer, dryer and refrigerator were damaged during the move which was very upsetting. The saddest part is no one at Coleman really seems to care to reach out to us and make this right. Unfortunately for us, we now know who not to use.

resp.text: Brian, we regret to hear that you were not pleased with our moving services. We have shared this internally with our team for review. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to assist you. Thank you for your feedback. For further explanation, please email feedback@colemanallied.com.

name: Patty Tate
text: Very good experience. It was a tough move for me. I lost my husband in March and had to sell the house. The guys were so friendly and easy to talk to. They treated my stuff like it was their own. I can't say enough about the 3 men you sent to my home!

name: Rose Benton
text: Thanks for going above and beyond my expectations for a moving company. Stayed in close contact with me while moving from Alabama to Washington. We highly recommend Coleman American Moving Service to anyone looking to relocate. You can turn things over to them and completely relax..thank you for everything you have done to make our life easier durning our relocation.

name: Glenn Osborne
text: These guys handled my Allied move in from California last month.  My experience with them was limited to the crew of three that showed up at my storage unit to unload my things.  They were courteous and professional, and handled my belongings with care.

resp.text: Glenn, thank you so much for the kind words. We're glad we could make your delivery go smoothly!

name: Chris jones
text: As a past short haul driver with this company at the Huntsville AL office I got to say it was the worst mistake I made in my life the pay was so bad and you go and talk to the management about it they did nothing about it and at the time of the interview they said you will make so much a hour and so much per mile but no you make a dollar per hundred pounds and the operations manger Sarah Lauren and the warehouse supervisor Lloyd Hardy was the only 2 that helped the crew out and that kept their word to us but 200 a week for what we put up with is not worth driving for but it wont be long that this company will be going under the way they pay their employees

name: Bradley Starks
text: Packaging day and loading day went off without a hitch.  Each person i worked with was personable and if they had any questions or vice-versa, the answers were there.  Moving from Alabama to Tampa, so in between stages right now, but i expect it to be the same service down in Tampa that i received here.  Thanks.

name: JILL RODRIGUEZ
text: So far everthing work out smoothly with our Pcs move overseas! The 2 guys were friendly and handle our stuff very carefully. Keep up the good work!

name: Terrance Archer
text: Friendly and extremely professional!!!

name: Chris Baker
text: They dont pay by the hour

name: Jody Brown
text: The staff here is not very nice and also they have so much going on that it is hard to figure out what is going on. There were lots of promises by management that were not made, and they expected us to pay for our gas and all of the transportation expenses. Very upset about that and cancelled the contract I had with this company because of it.

name: Kari Lippert
text: Curteous staff

resp.text: Kari, we appreciate your kind words and the awesome rating. We hope you are enjoying your new residence! Thanks again!

name: David Mullins
text: The best ever

name: Tracy White
text: Friendly

name: Mari Stresemann
text: I work there so it's fine!

name: Beth Glazier
text: Beware of the fine print with the insurance of your goods. It's a ripoff to be sure! Have a 50 year old grandmother clock my mother left to me which the movers managed to destroy during the move. NAVL offered me $0.60 per pound and estimated it to weigh 80 lbs. That equated to $48. I just want it fixed but their measly $48 wont cover the damage they did. Read the insurance clause carefully because if you ever need it, it won't be worth your while. :( I will most definitely share this story with everyone I know.

resp.text: We're sorry for your negative experience and frustration. Please contact our Customer Service at 800-348-2111 or reach out to our claims department @ 800-348-3746 with your registration #. Call hours: M-F 8am-6pm EST, Sat. 8am-12pm EST

name: Hunter Norris
text: When speaking with this company 2 weeks ago I was told I couldn’t schedule an appointment more than 3 weeks out. I was told to call back and at a closer date. I called them back with a little more than 3 weeks notice as requested as well as sent a booking request as they previously instructed me to do. I received a return call from a very polite lady telling me the date had been reserved. I would be very hesitant booking from a company that doesn’t honor there previous comments and instructions. Either the person on the phone the other day wasn’t aware they could book me at that time or I was given the run around.Hope other find this helpful but don’t count on them as I did.

name: Regi Lorick
text: C&R Movers are my preferred movers of choice.  I have used this company several times for business and personal use. They are timely, handle items with care and are reasonably priced. I look forward to working with them in the near future.

name: Nancy Smith
text: I've moved several times but never experienced such experts as these. I highly recommend this company for moving and storage.

name: Laura Huckabee
text: We used C&R Movers when moving my elderly mother to a new house in Greenville AL. The guys took great care with all of her things, and were extremely efficient and professional.  I would highly recommend this company to anyone in the area.

name: MR. Truth
text: The person that answered the phone was professional in his response to my question

name: Ashley Copeland
text: We had Alphonzo, Chris, and Tony.  They were great.  They arrived a few minutes before start time and were very careful with our belongings.  Definitely glad we had them for the day.

name: David Benson
text: I could not have been more pleased with C&R Movers. We hired them for a local move between two locations that were not far apart, so the loading and unloading happened within a few hours of each other. They were timely, courteous, and responsible. They took better care of our things than I did and worked hard to make sure they met time. In fact, their work ethic alone was impressive, and speaks highly of the company and the team that was sent to support our move. Thank you so much!

name: Phillip K
text: I purchased a gun safe from a local store and contacted C&R Movers about delivering it to my residence and placing in selected room.  I called for a quote and then completed the required steps with my home computer.  The moving team showed up on time, were courtesy and professional and completed the move without any issue.  I was very pleased and HIGHLY RECOMMEND C&R Movers!!!!

name: Jamie Van Burren
text:
I have never hired movers before. Do I was clueless as to how all this works. I called 6-8 moving companies in Montgomery and they were the cheapest by a LANDSLIDE. That’s first off. Secondly the owner Chris spoke to me on the phone and answered my questions but after that it was tricky to get him to return my calls or texts in the same day. But regardless, he was always polite and helpful. A bit
Ore communication on procedures and when to expect emails and confirmations and a deposit would have been helpful if dealing with a new clueless person like myself but it still was fine. Then the movers: first: they were so punctual they were too punctual by about 30 minutes! Lol. That was awesome. Secondly DEVON was amazing. As far as customer service... super friendly and nice and I needed that. I was super stressed. DEVON is a priceless employee from what I saw. 3: BOTH Devon and Alex were SUPER FAST! very very careful with my things also but so fast! This company and these guys are not trying to ride the clock and charge you any more than you neeed to pay. Bottom line, INTEGRITY. From Chris and the movers. Just integrity all around. Alex was quiet but a very very hard worker too. Do to end the review; I am a tough one when it comes to customer service and I could not be more impressed with these guys and I will never use anyone else to move me, asking as I’m in Montgomery. My only suggestion would be from the Administrative side... if someone is not using the web sight to book and doesn’t know the routine... be a tad more communicative and call back sooner. But it all worked out and this , from a customers standpoint is a great company. With Integrity and not trying to rip you off. That’s huge. Thanks again to DEVON and ALEX for hustling like ya’ll did and making my move far less stressful!           Jamie Reisner.

name: Erin Billups
text: Very professional and time efficient. Price is affordable with great service. Will be using them again.

name: Wanda Berg
text: This move couldn't have gone better!! Lorenzo and Alphonso did an awesome job and were so nice to me. I will definitely use them again and recommend them to my friends. Thanks guys!!

name: Joseph Park
text:
Best of best ! Affordable price but still pursuing customer satisfaction...
Crews are very kind and professional. I'll work with them next year. It's good to see them enjoy their working even during hard work.
Thanks again

name: Yian Saephanh
text:
First and foremost, My experience with the company in a whole was not bad, BUT my personal experience with one of the female movers was just disappointing, after I pretty much befriended her and offered some of my unwanted things it came to my attention that she took advantage of my kindness, she was well aware of  the one spot I always place all of my jewelry of the day, as I finished packing in another room she proceeded to load up my bedroom. And as I went back into my room to put my ring on it was gone, but all other jewelry was there.

Making a claim with this company has been an absolute nightmare.

So in conclusion always be cautious of the people in your home whom you trust because THAT IS THEIR JOB.

resp.text: Hello, we sincerely apologize for your experience. We strive for perfection. Unfortunately, since you didn't notify us of a missing item and didn't submitted your claim until 3 months after your move, the claim process must take additional steps than normal, and this may take additional time on your claim.

name: DESTINIE LOWE
text:
They were very professional an polite while on duty. They were on time and completed everything perfectly. They have the best service and quality packing. This was by far my best experience.

Thanks Again!

name: Jessica DeAndrea
text: The movers were very professional and moved at a great pace. The movers arrived on time and were especially careful with my fragile items. I’d definitely use them in the future for another move.

name: Elizabeth Gordon
text: My best friend referred C&R Movers to me back in 2012, and I have used their services each time I've moved.  Thank you for making the process of moving a smooth transition.

name: Zy Rivers
text: I moved into my new home in May. C & R Movers were one of the best moving company l have EVER used. Everything was just the way it was when I packed it. C & R movers were sharp,  on time , and did exactly what was stated in the contract. C&R movers will also pack the entire house for you. I would have paid them to do it, if I didn't pack up everything  already. C&R movers are a MUST USE company when it comes down to moving.

name: shenna d
text: Horrible customer service. I first called and they had a slot available. The next day, they said they did not. Someone hung up in my face when I called. Then I called back I was told they would call me back. I never got a call back. Horrible, wish I could give zero stars.

resp.text: Sorry for any inconvenience you may have experience with our customer service department. We do book on a first come, first service basis. It seems like you called in on the first day and we were available. Then the second day u called back with intentions to book but your move date was taken. I’m unsure how we hung up if we told you the date is unavailable.

name: MC. Speirs
text: Very professional, friendly, and careful. I will definitely use them again.

name: sarai d
text: This is a very unprofessional place. I called and was told to book online. I followed the instructions and paid my deposit. On my moving date, no one showed up. I had to go through my credit card company to be refunded. Warning stay away from these scammers.

resp.text: You book through a third party company and unfortunately, we do not have control over your booking process. We advise when booking your service, book directly with the company. Sorry for this inconvenience.

name: Brenda J. Clausell
text: This was such a great group of guys. They were professional and took great care to wrap our furniture. They were hard working, wasting not one minute. Great Job !!!

name: Mello Jones
text: Terrible company to work for very unorganized they don’t maintain any kind of schedule. Worked with this company a week looking to receive pay but they give you the run around. Legal action seems the only way to get thru to such an unprofessional company.

resp.text: First we will like to apologize to the customers for having to read this. C & R Movers pride ourselves on providing a very detail employment hiring process. After reading this, additional steps will be added to the hiring process. To Mr. Jones thanks for the one week employment. Please make sure you put your current address and not your mothers address on payment information. Thank you and have great day.

name: Jalicia Vaughn
text: They were friendly and very hard workers. I was stressed about the move and they made it easy. They were wonderful!

name: Timothy Phillips
text: They did a great job. I was super grateful. Highly recommended.

name: karen cagle
text: I called and asked for rate and availability. The guy said they were available and quoted a price. They held the request, and just now replied they are booked after I called yesterday -- a week later! Now, I have to short notice find someone to move me. Very unprofessional.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience. The move date you initially wanted was (5/17/2017). Unfortunately we booked up for that date.  We are more than happy to provide you with moving services on the evening of Wednesday (5/17/2017) or before or after your requested moving date. Please keep in mind that until a deposit is made, moving services are not confirmed. Please accepted this 10% off coupon on our behalf. Sorry for the miscommunication.

name: Rickeyria Bennett
text: The gentleman were wonderful!!! They were pleasure to work with, hard working and focused on my needs.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing C  & R Movers, LLC

name: A Google User
text: They were great. Super fast, nice, quality service, would recommend and use again.

name: A Google User
text: Prompt, Professional, Friendly and Courteous. They made us feel very comfortable.

name: A Google User
text: Very helpful and courteous.  I would recommend them to others.

name: W Clausell
text: Hard working and great at doing what they do

name: Google User
text: Outstanding job. Thanks for everything.

name: Fran Jay (MooMawCoqui)
text: This company is top notch! John, David, and Scottie took great care unloading the rental truck I brought from Oklahoma. They were very professional, courteous, and respectful. I hope to have the same crew when I move to Florida! Great job, guys!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We appreciate your business!

name: Sarah Mitchell
text: Admiral Movers did excellent in moving our stuff to our new home.  They showed up on time went straight to work.  Stayed in communication with us through the process and had great attitudes.  They worked quickly and made sure that all of our items were packed safely for transport.  We had a wonderful experience with less stress due to Admiral Movers.  Would recommend and use them again in the future for sure.

resp.text: Sarah, thank you so much for the wonderful review! We appreciate your business!

name: John Schneider
text: A great move.  They moved us at the quoted price.  John, Calvin, Chris, and Miller did a great job quickly and efficiently.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating John! We appreciate your business!

name: Emily Keene
text: Great movers - quick, careful and efficient!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Emily. We appreciate your business!

name: Jennifer Clayton
text: I couldn’t have asked for better movers. My movers were very nice and patient with me, they got everything loaded in one trip, and I was extremely pleased with how careful they were. I definitely recommend this company for all moving needs.

name: Michelle Haston
text:
What an incredible team and such an easy process from beginning to end!
James helped us with the initial quote and helped us get everything set up.
The moving team arrived as scheduled and got straight to work. All three guys were so very polite, professional and hard working.
Charles, Calvin and Jederious worked continuously to get all our belongings moved.
We got to the new house around lunchtime and I asked if they were going to stop for a break, but they said they were going to work on..... I insisted they stop for a bit, so I went out and got lunch for us all.
After a quick lunch break, the guys got right back to it and unloaded everything within a few hours.
Thank you, thank you, thank you for such a great experience.... moving can be a very stressful time, but the Admiral Movers made it much easier. I highly recommend this amazing team.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and 5-star review Michelle! We appreciate your business!

name: edgeofthewind
text: Moving the heavy family antique piano required specialized care, which the movers were well trained in.  Great job.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review! We appreciate your business!

name: Sydney Smith Newell
text: Thanks so much for making a move so easy, and quick!

name: Kenya Harrington
text: JOHN AND SHAUN WERE AWESOME. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM. THEY WERE FAST AND CAREFUL. VERY EXPERIENCED WITH MOVING DELICATE ITEMS AND PLACED EVERYTHING WHERE IT NEEDED TO BE. I WOULD DEFINITELY USE ADMIRAL FOR ANY FUTURE MOVES!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review Kenya! We appreciate your business!

name: James Stegall
text: I used Admiral Movers to load a moving truck and they were phenomenal. Firstly, they were kind, gracious, and courteous. Secondly, they were efficient to the Nth degree. Even though I probably got too small of a truck for how much stuff I have, they made all of it fit like a perfect game of Tetris. It was seriously impressive. Had they not been consummate professionals, we would have been left desperate with stuff left unloaded. The two men who helped me had 35 years of experience each and it showed. I can't recommend Admiral Movers more.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words and your 5-star review James.
We appreciate your business!

name: Eric Dean
text: Admiral Movers was the ideal choice for my in-town move. I appreciate the courteous, responsive staff always ready and willing to respond. They made what could’ve been a stressful situation of moving to a new house a lot easier and they did it with smiles and great attitudes despite the Alabama heat! They took great care of my belongings and were extra careful when maneuvering items through the home. I am definitely pleased with this service!!

resp.text: Eric, thank you so much for the great review! We appreciate your business!

name: Steve Smith
text: Moving is just one of those things that can be a bit unsettling at times. But this group, namely, James, John, Calvin, and Charles certainly did their part to mitigate any uneasiness.  Much appreciated!

resp.text: Thank you Steve! We appreciate your business!

name: Thors Mjolnir
text:
John and crew were awesome
Got impossible heavy items from one location to the next professionally
Would not hesitate to use them for any move
First Class service
👍👍👍.
.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5-star review and for your business! Happy Holidays from Admiral Movers

name: Lori B
text: Exceptional experience! My military career has seen me move over 15 times, and this was by far the most pleasant. From the booking to the final billing and of course the wonderful staff I couldn’t be happier.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Lori! We appreciate the kind words and your business!

name: Jim Dunham
text: We had Admiral move us twice this spring and they were great in every way. Very friendly, respectful and careful about our items. On the first move there was slight damage to a wall and a man was out the next business day to fix it back to everyone's satisfaction. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Mr. Dunham.....Thank you for your business and your kind words!

name: Tom Roberson
text: Charles and Calvin were a great team of movers.  On time, very polite, efficient, made sure everything was just as my wife wanted, could not have asked for a better pair of movers.

resp.text: Tom, thank you for your review and the kind words. We appreciate your business!

name: MR. Truth
text: The person they answered the phone was knowledgeable

name: Kelley Rouze
text: My experience with Admiral Movers was great from the first phone call to the completed move. They were flexible in handling gathering my things from three locations, expertly wrapping the items for storage, then storing them for a couple of months. When I was ready to move into my new house all it took was one phone call. The movers were first class!

name: Joseph Strickland
text: We were very pleased with our move with Admiral, which helped us move a family member. The team assigned to us (John, Charles, Alonzo and Mike) were top-notch professionals and enjoyable to work with. It is obvious that they have many decades of experience among them, and they handled each of the fragile antique pieces with great care and expertise. We would not hesitate to recommend this firm to anyone needing moving services.

resp.text: Me. Strickland, thank you so much for choosing Admiral Movers! We appreciate your business and the kind words. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Jessica Norris
text: First time hiring movers and I would definitely hire them again. John and Charles moved a fully furnished apartment for me to the third floor. They didn't complain once that there wasn't an elevator. They were fun to work with as well.

resp.text: We're so glad your move went well Jessica! We hope to serve you again in the future!

name: Kayleigh Murphy
text: Its people.friendley amd great atmosphere during covud epidemic

name: Ben Farrow
text: They arrived on time.  Packed quickly and efficiently and had me moved very fast.  Unpacked on the other end and everything was in 1 piece.  Great team of guys.

name: Sherry Johnston
text: Best staff and very patient with us.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 start review Sherry. We appreciate your business!

name: LaToya Woods
text: The movers we're great! My only concern was they did not have on mask.

resp.text: Thank you LaToya! Due to the strenuous nature of moving, state guidelines do not require our guys to wear masks. Please contact us if you have any other questions or concerns!

name: AAron
text: They were awesome!  I thought I was about to have to cut up a couch to get it out of the house because it wouldn't fit through the new door I installed. They got it out through a second story window instead!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your review Aaron! So glad the guys were able to get it done!

name: Mary McCroan
text: The guys were efficient, took good care of my belongings, got the job done.

resp.text: Mary, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a nice review. We appreciate your business!

name: Mark Bunting
text: The guys were on time and wonderful to work with.  They worked hard to protect items that needed protecting....Fine representatives for Admiral Movers!

resp.text: Thanks Mark! It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Bob Delker
text:
My wife and I moved from Montgomery, AL to Huntsville, AL with Admiral. It wasn’t a normal move for us but James Potts with Admiral assured us this would a normal job for them. We had a trip to Germany planned and that’s when our house sold. Admiral worked around our schedule, we also needed storage for five months until our new house built. The crew packed, stored, repacked and moved us into our new house two weeks before Christmas. There were no problems and nothing damaged, and the cost was less than estimate.  Thanks for the great job Admiral.

Bob Delker, Huntsville AL - Dec 2019

name: S M
text: Admiral Movers is the TRUTH!! They were prompt and took care of business! Thankzzz Sean and Banister...you guys are AM8ZN!!! You made this move an  easy transition...now on to the unpacking 😘

name: Alabama Land copier
text: Was easy to setup and the customer service was tip of the spear. Mark DePlanche came out and priced our move, kept us informed as the scheduled date got closer, called again within an hour of the crew leaving to make sure everything went ok in our end. Was a easy and professional experience.

resp.text: James,  thank you for your business, the kind words and for taking time to write this review. It was a pleasure doing business with Alabama Land Surveyors.

name: Denise Gentry
text:
The three quotes that I received from various movers were pretty much in the same price range.  However, Mark's kind and professional attitude as he carefully checked everything I needed to be moved swayed me to choose his firm.

The packers (two of whom ended up being the movers, also) were so careful with my goods.  I am not finished unpacking yet, but everything that I have unpacked up to this point was perfectly safe and unbroken.  It is easy to see the care they took with each item, especially the ones I indicated were special to me!  When they came to get my goods, they protected the house in the same way, being especially careful with some of my larger pieces, so as not to scratch the walls, etc.  Finally, when they arrived in Florida with my goods, they were so wonderful about protecting my new home.  They placed every item where I needed it to be, and each box in the correct room for me.  The men were courteous, friendly, and professional.  I wish I could have tipped them more!  I have a physical disability and could not help them in any way while they were working.  In fact, they insisted that I just sit and point!  They have some fantastic people working for them!

name: Thomas Jean
text: Efficient, amiable fellows. A smooth experience altogether.

name: Brandon Bender
text:
Must read****
I got quotes from many movers in the Montgomery area. I must these guys were the cheapest. BUT, they miss led me and under quoted by over 60% and would not work with me on it. Original quote was for $1450 and the bill came in over $3400!!!!!! WHAT A SHOCK. Their reasoning was you just had too much stuff. Well you SHOULD HAVE known what I had because you WALKED the house with me. I even brought all the attic stuff down for you. BE WARNED DON'T USE this group. THey will rip you off and not quote you accurately. USE Motivated movers they moved my neighbor and did a great job.  ALSO to the person in charge over at Admiral, I told my real estate agent and he is sharing this experience with his whole office. SO you will be losing more business because of this. Thanks for NOT working with me.

name: Reatha Simonton
text: They did a very good job!

name: Jim Massey III
text: Scott and his entire team were very flexible and accommodating with our recent move. It was an office move, so I had to schedule the move in a way which would allow us to conduct business as normal, yet get the move completed ASAP. I wanted the move done during regular workdays to allow our office staff to be involved with the move. Scott worked with my schedule and his crew was very understanding with every request made by my-self and the office staff.

name: Rex Long
text: I have never been more impressed with movers than I am with these folks. Great people in the office and just as good of a staff that shows up to help you start a new beginning. These guys were prompt, prepared and ready to roll. They wrapped up glass and pictures with cloth protection and made sure they carefully reassembled my bed and placed everything in the right spot and the new location.

name: Carol Andrews
text: Scott and his folks do an outstanding job! We used them to move our office and they performed an excellent job just as promised. Their pricing is competitive, but their customer service is exceptional. Scott is very involved in his industry and supports the REALTOR® community. We would refer Scott and Admiral Movers to anyone whether it be an in-state or out of state need.

name: Mike Turk
text: If you are relocating, look no farther than Admiral.  From the very beginning of the process, to the completion of our move, the folks at Admiral were incredibly professional.  As with any business, people make the company.  From top to bottom, Admiral is run by and continues to employ the best people in the business.  Moving can be a very stressful time, but the folks at Admiral will help to make the process as stress free as possible.  Their attention to detail, along with the courtesy that is displayed by all the employees at Admiral, are what truly separate this company from any other.  Call them today!

name: Buehler Moving Companies
text: I hire Admiral whenever I have customers that need services in the Alabama area and they really do a good job. They are really professional and I haven't had any problems using them. They recently did a fairly decent sized office move for me in that area. We will send more work your way - Thanks for always doing an exceptional job :)

name: Lisa Silver
text: I wanted to share my experience from a move in February of 2018. First of all I had no idea what I was doing when I received my first quote and not realizing that each company in Alabama must follow the guidelines, I reached out to Admiral and was connected to Mark to estimate my move.  he not only educated me on the process, he made helpful suggestions to save money on the move. My estimate actually was higher than the actual freight cost which was an additional bonus!! Not only was I completely impressed with Mark's help, but the packer/movers (Mike, Perry and Jamal) were so considerate of my belongings and I felt they went above and beyond in how they handled my requests and helping me feel like I had been truly cared for. Moving an entire household 100 miles, not a single item as broken or damaged and I have way too much stuff, most of it breakable! Thank you Admiral Mover Montgomery and your terrific team! You will always be my moving choice!!

name: Steve Hughes
text: I have used Admiral Movers both personally, for a move to a new house, as well as moving our business.  All of their employees and energetic and friendly.  They are careful with all of your personal items, as well as your documents.  Cost is very comparable to other full service movers.  I would absolutely use them again and would recommend them to anyone.  Whether the move is large or small, Admiral can get it done!

name: Jean Wright
text: They have now moved us three times, exceptional service every time. Each crew member seems to go out of their way to make sure we are happy. I would not use any other company. I love that their folks appreciate antiques as much as we do.

name: Beth Pratt
text: This company did a FABULOUS job packing and moving  2 truck loads of household items for my family. From my first impression beginning with the timely and detailed estimate through the unloading of the last box has been absolutely top notch.  They were honest, hard working and very polite. I am still unpacking boxes, but I haven't found ANY damage so far.  You won't be sorry if you go with Admiral. We are retired Navy and have done a lot of moving and this has been my best experience so far. Thank you so much for making a very stressful task much less stressful!!

name: Ronald Hanusek
text: In November 2012, Admiral Records Management moved all of our companies records from a storage facility to their warehouse.  They moved hundreds of boxes from 10 storage units to their warehouse in a very timely manner.  They also shredded over 8,000 pounds of documents that were no longer needed.  By doing this our company has and will save alot of money on a monthly basis.  They were very courteous and any questions we had were answered in a timely manner.  Kevin and his group did a fabulous job moving it all in a very timely manner.  WOW!  When someone requests a box we just send Admiral Records a fax and we have the option to pick the box up and/or they can deliver the same day.  We look forward to our business with Admiral Records.  Thank You So Very Much Scott, Mark, Joe, Kevin and Sarah and to all the rest for a job well done.

name: Julie W DeYoung
text: These guys did a wonderful job helping us on a quick turn around commercial project. They assembled and installed interior and exterior furniture and were all very nice and easy to work with!! Jay Stembridge was great at following up, general communication and scheduling - thank you Admiral!!

name: Samuel Wrightman
text: Whenever I have a serious project with a data center or hospital facility these are the guys. They always figure out a way to solve any issue. Admiral always brings our projects in on time. Incredibly they have actually engineered equipment for our specific needs on certain projects.

name: Stephanie Rae Pinkham
text: Did not pack all that needed packing, smushed my ring, broke my sons toys, broke my mothers vase,left their tape,boxes,and paper at our house, mixed my apartment stuff with the storage stuff, and did not offer to pay what they broke, got here 1hour after they were supposed to be their on the first day and almost 2 hours late the second day.

name: TruckinWoman
text: As a truck driver who delivered for a home owner, in Montgomery AL, this crew was Fantastic! They were very professional, and Friendly! They took all the trash off my truck that the previous crew left on it! I'd give them 100 stars if I could. They were also very careful, and quick. :)

name: Kevin Shirey
text: Great initial visit and quote. Also nice and respectful 3 movers we had. I bought them all some power aide and water for the visit. However, several damages to most wooden items with scraping, marks and damaged dresser cabinet hardware. Little care was taken when using a hand truck down stairs, slamming on each stair. At the end of the day, they we not sorting the boxes into the rooms we had labeled, instead all boxes ended up in the wrong rooms. Pricing is competitive with other local vendors.

name: Kim McBrayer
text: I had the pleasure of working with Admiral Movers when I was called to task to coordinate a move for a Commercial Real Estate Brokerage. Appx 15 individual offices, conference rooms and lobby. Records, computers, printers, artwork and furniture all had to be moved in one day. The move was flawless. Scott McNelley and his staff were so well-organized and professional, they made the move a breeze. I would recommend Admiral to anyone... Residential or commercial. As smoothly as the commercial move went- I bet they could move a residential home in the blink of an eye...

name: Barbara DeMichels
text: I have known Scott McNelly for many years.  His superb leadership and community involvement have made a positive impact on the Montgomery area.  Admiral Movers is an outstanding organization in every respect.

name: Janet Nicoll
text: Dear Mr. Scott McNelly, President and CEO -   I need your help.  Your company damaged 6 pieces of custom made furniture during our move on Oct 30, 2015.  The specific piece of furniture I need your help with is our Parsons table.  The Parsons table was scratched in several places during the move and when your company attempted to have it repaired it looks like a belt sander was used and now the entire table top is damaged.  You shipped the table to the custom furniture maker in St. Louis where it was made to attempt to repair it and shipped through a freight company.  The table arrived with 3 legs because one was ripped off during transit.  It has been 5 mos and my custom Parsons table is damaged beyond repair and your employee is still giving us the run around.  Please step in and get this matter resolved.  I paid top dollar to have moving insurance and all I have is a 3 legged table, with a wavy gouged top sitting in St. Louis ( I'm at Lake Martin) and your employee running me in circles.  We came to you because of the reviews on this website; however, I am beginning to regret that decision.  Will you please help us get our custom Mahogany Parsons table that seats 8 replaced since it has been destroyed on your watch.  In addition, I am going to pay for all the other damage myself that your movers caused because I cannot have the rest of my custom made furniture gone for 5+ months and then have pieces of it ripped off while it is being repaired.  Thank you 3/18/16

name: peggy mussafer
text: I am an Interior Consultant in Montgomery, Al. and have used Admiral movers for most of my jobs and can say that they are great for both residential and commerical work..  They handle both with prompt and careful attention.

name: John Hails
text: Nine years of great experience of  moving furniture

name: Emily Flowers
text:
Admiral Movers to the rescue!
The Cloverdale Playhouse recently had to move from one storage warehouse to another on short notice, but Admiral made it a smooth, safe, relatively easy process. The crew members were polite, friendly, and professional, and the office staff was helpful and generous.
HUGE thanks to Admiral Movers from me personally and on behalf of the Cloverdale Playhouse!

name: Paul R.
text:
If you are in the market for a moving company to handle your professional and/or personal items in a highly professional manner, I strongly recommend Admiral Movers.  We have used Admiral over the past several years when moving offices, clearing offices for renovation and so on. Whenever we need large pieces moved we call Admiral.  Scott insures his crews are on time and thorough in their work.  Admiral has the know-how, professionally trained crews, and equipment that insure our moves are damage-free and have minimal disruption of our operations. Scott has extensive experience in the moving business and I welcome his advice and suggestions to help our office moves go smoothly.

Admiral Movers comes with my highest recommendation.

PAUL J. REDHEAD, IOM, MEd.
Vice President, Administration
Montgomery (AL) Area Chamber of Commerce

name: Gary Smith
text: I asked Mark to get a piece of industrial equipment crated up for my parent's business - the Admiral crew was on time and got it set up for a truck line to pick up. Buyer was happy with the way it was packed.

name: Becky Kirchner
text:
Admiral Movers is not just a moving company, they are a community supporter. When Alabama was devastated by Tornadoes in April 2011 many of us were wondering how we could help. I got a team of REALTORS together in the Birmingham area and we started putting a plan together. One of the things we kept hearing people needed were containers or boxes to gather what belongs they could find. Through our awesome network I turned to my other REALTOR and Affiliate friends around the state and asked for help. Scott at Admiral didn't hesitate when I asked for them to donate some boxes for the victims. Within hours we coordinated a pickup in Montgomery and delivery to Birmingham so we could get these distributed immediately. Thanks Scott for going that extra mile to help not just your local community, but those around the state!!!!
Keep up the awesome Service!!!!

name: Susie Wilson
text: Shout out to all the guys at Admiral Movers: Charles, Mike, Reggie, Sam, Arthur, and Curtis, who have helped me sooo many times with sooo many moves over the years! I trust Admiral Movers with fragile chandeliers, delicate furniture, china, crystal and even cars! Thank you for packing, storing, and delivering ON TIME!!  Thank you also for not scuffing any walls in the process and for hauling away all the boxes!  Happy 2015 to the team - including Sarahi and the office crew!  I wish you all continued success.

name: Jeff Bohman
text: We engaged Admiral Movers for packing and moving services from Maryland to Alabama and couldn't have been more pleased with the results. Mark Deplanche was extremely helpful throughout the process, from the initial inspection to the actual delivery. Everything (furniture, mirrors, pictures, paintings, bric-a-brac, etc.) arrived on time and intact, without damage. The price agreed to prior to the move was the amount invoiced too. I recommend Admiral Movers to anyone needing a professional mover.

name: Jml Swn
text: I work here and it's going pretty good I must say!!!

name: Connie Addie
text: We love the Admiral Movers crew!  Everyone is always friendly and professional.

name: Moore Company Realty Moore Property Management
text: Professional, punctual and reliable.  These guys know the moving business.

name: amy martin
text: These guys are pros and gentlemen. Accomodating and efficient.

name: JerryB22
text: Excellent service. Good price offered after higher initial price. They picked up furniture we bought from a store in addition to transporting all our stuff from one house to another. They stopped unloading furniture during intermittent rain storms and did not charge us for those inactive times. They were very professional and went out of the way to do what we asked. They were all nice men who interacted with us. They were top notch.

name: Kimberly Lochner
text: Over promise and under deliver. We were very excited about this company after the initial assessment which was 1.5 days to pack and up to 1 day to load but possibly done in 2 days. Plan was for pack on mon-tue and load Wednesday. So we were excepting everything to be packed Monday-Tuesday and finish late Tuesday early Wednesday. Despite reconfirming this 1 week prior, the Friday before we were called to confirm a Tuesday 1 day pack and wed load. After much back and forth and stating this was not the plan we were finally told movers would arrive Monday but packing would only take 1 day. I have moved multiple time with the military and it has always taken at least 1.5 days to pack us. They were there for 11 hours so yah I guess 1 day. They are supposed to do the load tomorrow but learned they will not arrive until between 9-11 and “ hopefully finish” between 5-6 pm. And we’re just told we can ask they to come back and finish the next day if not done by 5pm, which we were not offered yesterday. I can say their lead member on Monday Nichole was very good and professional. Another member of the team was not and walked out temporarily when I asked her not to pack glass with heavy workout equipment. She actually stated I could pack myself if I didn’t like how she packed. Furniture still hasn’t been wrapped/protected so who knows when they will finish.

name: Sheri Hearn
text: I would recommend this company to anyone looking to have someone help you with your moving needs. My family has used them twice and both resulted in good experiences.

name: Michael Souder
text: We hired Lambert Transfer & Storage to move my 85 year old mother from Alabama to Florida.  I had a terrible moving experience going across the country years ago, so my expectations were very low and in fact I almost expected a terrible experience.  Thankfully, my expectations were exceeded on every level.  Bo and his crew handled both ends of the move for us, and were simply outstanding.  They were all extremely professional and careful with mom's possessions, and maintained a positive attitude while working steadily and efficiently.  Bo was the leader of the crew, and was extremely prompt in arrival early each day for the packing, loading and unloading events.  The price was exactly in line with what was expected, and we feel we got a very fair deal.  The rest of the company, including John in the office and our moving coordinator Russ were also easy to deal with and extremely helpful.  I would recommend Lambert and this crew without any reservations to anyone looking for a fair, high quality moving company.  Best moving experience I have ever had or will ever have!   A++!

resp.text:
Michael, I want to thank you so much for this review and for your great comments regarding Bo and his crew!  And I also appreciate the comments about John and Russ!  We do appreciate you entrusting us with your mother’s move and allowing us to take care of her. I will be happy to pass this along to the team, and please tell all your friends about the Lambert team!

Thanks so much, Carlton IV

name: Aaron Strickland
text:
I called for estimated pricing. The person I talked to said he would come out and price.  I said I just need an estimate. He said he wanted to come out.  We set appointment for Tuesday.  He called on Monday and said they need to do on line/zoom type estimate.   So far, NOTHING and it is Thursday at 10 pm.  No follow up.  Nothing.  Do what you say say promptly or don’t bother.  DONE

Carlton followed up after someone dropped the ball.  That says a lot so thank you for trying to fix a misunderstanding.

resp.text:
Mr. Strickland, I am sorry for the poor communication that you received and that you have not been contacted. I looked for your information on our lead system and in our task organizer and I don’t see your name in the database. I would like to help you get a quote, would you mind if I contact you tomorrow?  You can email your information to my email address, carlton@golambertteam.com.

Thank you!

Carlton Hunley, President

name: Marcy Crouch
text: We move A LOT due to my husbands job, and this move was the BEST we have ever experienced. It was a cross country move from CA to Auburn, AL, with 6 weeks of storage. Carlton was amazing from start to finish and coordinated everything for us, from packing in CA, to loading, transport to storage, and then into the house. They went above and beyond taking care of our things, being flexible with drop off date, came back twice to get the debris and assemble furniture we weren’t able to do on moving day. AND to top it off, this was all during COVID-19 so we had masks and social distancing during a move in. His team and workers are professional, courteous, and hard working. Highly recommend. They are the best

name: Jennifer Braswell
text: Staff was very accommodating and willing work with my needs .

name: Melqwan 4life
text: Great company the owner is down to earth book them

name: Stafford Lewis
text: Great place nice people

name: jbstok1
text: Lambert Transfer completed our first move in 25 years today and I'm very pleased. The crew was professional, personable, polite and flexible. They called to let us know they were in they were enroute, their expected arrival time and worked hard all day to load our stuff, drive the 15 miles to the new place, then unload and set up the furniture as requested. I don't know what they could have done to provide better service. We did most of the packing of boxes ourselves ahead of time, and they provided  all but the wardrobe boxes ahead of time at no extra charge. They made a difficult experience more pleasant than it might have been.

name: Thelma Apicella
text: This is the first time I have used a moving company.  Their customer service is OUTSTANDING.  However, a company is made up of people, and the people assigned to our move made it a stress free process.  In my opinion, they went above and beyond what I expected.  I would recommend this company to anyone.

name: S W
text: If you want the best of the best you want Larry Smith.  I have moved a few times while my wife has multiple times.  Larry is the most professional, courteous, and accountable Owner Operator we've used.  Incredible that our tons of stuff made this long distance journey without any mishaps.  Never seen anyone pack a truck like Larry.  You will say the same once you use him and his nephew Mike.  What a tandem.  Don'f forget to stop by when you're coming through Texas Larry.

name: Todd Carpenter
text:
Just got a call from them and my move is going to cost me $3,000 more than my estimate!  If you're that far off, why even give an estimate?  They would have been more accurate drawing numbers from a hat.

$3,000 off is not just a little off.  That's moving into the realm of lowballing to get an account.

name: NJ. Willie
text: Outstanding company! This was the first time I have used a moving company for my household items. They made the entire process from the estimate to final delivery stress and worry free for my wife and I. They treated our items as if they were there own. I would recommend Lambert Transfer and  Storage to anyone.

name: paul brisson
text: This was the worse move we have ever experienced.

name: Alicia Davis
text: Professional, top quality operation in every respect! I would absolutely recommend them to anyone looking for a moving company who puts the customer first. Excellent customer service (thanks AJ!), with great attention to every detail.  We came to them on short notice, after being left in a bind by another moving company, and they immediately set to work to make this move happen on the schedule we needed. It was a long distance move with lots of challenges, and it came off flawlessly. Thanks so much for a job well done!

name: Trent Erwin
text: Family-owned business — they know how to take care of their customers from start to finish. If you're moving to or from Alabama, you have to choose them. Ask for Carlton! Evidence of their success and quality business - they now have locations in Huntsville & Mobile/Pensacola. Choose Lambert!

name: jon vancoille
text: These guys are supposed to be the white glove delivery for Costco Mattresses...My mattress has been in their hands for 4 days and they just keep giving me the run around! Now trying to tell me it's going to me 3 or 4 more days before they can deliver. Ridiculous at best! Can't even get them to call me back...

name: Michael Williams
text: I wish we would have gotten Two Men and a Truck to move my mother instead of this company!!! They scratched and mark up my mother's bed furniture and also lost the glass that goes in her antique china cabinet!! This place really sucks again Two Men and a Truck would be so much better than this crappy company

name: Brian Lynch
text: Brian and his team did an outstanding job. Communication was great, and the moving crew took good care of our possessions.

name: Karen H
text: We used Lambert Transfer for my mom. The men who moved her were quick, careful, and courteous.

name: Bret Law
text: Pretty good Company Great customer service Takes care of everything in a timely manner

name: jt nguyen
text: These guys are the absolute best! They were the only company that was available to move me before I leave for vacation on 2 days and at a great rate compared to their competitors. They were on time, very friendly, and listened to all my needs with no issue. There’s a reason they get all these rave reviews, they are the real deal and I’d recommend them to anyone!

name: Spencer Ellis
text: Nick and Shep were awesome! Came right on time, were quick, and had positive attitudes. They handled everything with care and were safe loading/unloading my furniture.

name: Mary Katherine White
text: I had a GREAT experience with MoveDaddy! David and Joshua were my movers and they were extremely helpful and professional. Everything was moved without a scratch, and in good time. I will definitely be using again!

name: M Mahan
text: 3rd time to use them for moving assistance and #4 is planned for next week. They were timely (told me 2-4 pm and they called at 2:08pm), professional and very polite/friendly. Charlie and Andrew did an exceptional job and I hope to have them on my crew next week. Big thank you!

name: Rob Pannell
text:
Nick, Phillip, Mark and Andrew were awesome! Very professional, knowledgeable, and efficient!

No task too large, but still careful with delicate items. We did not have ANY breaks or scratches and it was a huge move.

I would give 6 stars if I could.

name: Anna
text: David and Izaak did a fantastic job - very thoughtful and thorough. They took on challenges with ease and managed to squeeze everything in through old door frames. They did a great job of communicating about time. They even assembled two beds. Everything was well taken care of and they were super careful with all of my things. Highly recommend!

name: adam arendsen
text: I had Andrew and Spencer come out to help me move this weekend. Great guys. They showed up a little early, had a good game plan, very friendly and professional. Asked questions when needed and overall just a great experience. I'd get them again for when I have to move after this place.

name: Pam Corley
text:
We used Move Daddy recently for two moves.  Each time they were on time, worked very efficiently, did not waste time, were very friendly and respectful.  Our team was extremely professional.  I will use them again if needed and highly recommend them.

They were also able to accommodate us when our move date was pushed up which was a very big deal to us.

The men that worked at the storage facility even mentioned how hard and efficient they were working!

USE THEM FOR YOUR MOVE!  Their rates are very fair as well.

Pam Corley

name: Miss Ro
text: Hands down, the best movers ever! Exceptional would be an understatement. Chris and Nick were polite and professional. The care they took with my items was impressive especially considering the stairs I have in my home. Furniture delivery men have not handled the stairs as well. I highly recommended these guys and this company. Very happy with the service. The only thing I don’t like is that they charge you for their ride back to the shop. I feel like they should stop charging once the job is over.

name: Adrienne D.C. Brown
text:
Seth and Phillip were a great team!
Jared ensured they were cognitive of my budget and made sure it was done in that time frame. I hope to not move again soon but if I do, I’ll definitely use them again!

name: Evan Bailey
text: Great company fast moving and good at what they do!! Andrew and spencer handled my belongings with great care. They both are very professional! Highly recommended!! A++

name: Kathy Guest
text: David and Issac were AMAZING! They literally ran back up 2 flights of stairs to get the next load. Loaded it in record time! So nice and helpful! This is our second move with them and I highly recommend them. Will use them again for sure!

name: Joy DeShazo
text: I scheduled with Movedaddy for a long distance move after two other moving companies fell through. It was incredibly easy to schedule with them over the phone in comparison with the other businesses. Mark and Harrison did an excellent job even though the parking situation was difficult, it was pouring rain, and they had to climb a flight of stairs. They were very quick and professional and handled my things with care. The cost was also very reasonable. Overall, my experience exceeded expectations and I would highly recommend scheduling with Movedaddy if you want a smooth and easy move!

name: James Carter
text: Zack and Luke did a fantastic job of moving my family's furniture from Bessemer to Trussville. They were able to come out earlier than scheduled, and they worked tirelessly to get the job done quickly and professionally. I'd highly recommend these two amicable fellows to anyone considering hiring movers.

name: Sarah Russell
text:
I've used move daddy twice now and both times I had a 5 star experience.  Seth and Joshua had to problem solve and maneuver heavy furniture into an old apartment building with narrow hallways and doors. Unfortunately  they were unable to get my large couch in the door after trying everything possible, but I couldn't even be mad after the group effort and brainstorming. Joshua and Seth remained positive and professional throughout my entire challenging move.
A few days later when I had to move in my new couch, I called Jered for advice. He offered to send two movers to pick up the couch from the warehouse and bring it in for me! It wasn't easy but Izaak and McManus were miraculously able to fit a sectional in my new place. They set it up for me as well.
Move daddy's customer service is outstanding. A stressful move was made bearable because of them. This is easily the best moving company in Birmingham at a reasonable price.

name: Robert Hulsey
text: Jenkins, Zack, and David helped us with our local move and were fantastic. They were prompt, polite, quick, careful, and moved all our our furniture perfectly. I can’t recommend them enough, they were great. Well worth the money, which was fairly priced to begin with. Would definitely use them again.

name: Brian Phillips
text: I was VERY impressed! I shopped around and choose the company with the best price thinking that we might not get the best service but I was wrong. Mark and Izaak were amazing. They were there early, friendly, professional and fast! They were literally running back to the truck to grab boxes and did it all with a smile. I would absolutely use these guys again!

name: Elizabeth Martin
text: My office recently moved locations, and Izaak and Mark did such a brilliant job relocating our things. It took 2 large trips, and they were friendly, enjoyable to work with, and so incredibly efficient and safe. I highly recommend them for any moving needs!

name: Will Shafferman
text: Great experience. Would for sure use again. Mark, Will and David were sharp, professional, and punctual. They handled our things with care and diligence. No slacking - they would run back to the truck in between items to reduce time spent on the move. 5 out of 5 for me.

name: Jo Bailey
text:
Izaak and Mark did a great job running up the stairs after every load and moving fast, throughout the whole morning. They were very nice, polite and both had great attitudes. Thank them again for us.
Campus Outreach serve, Jo Bailey.

name: Tracey Dobbs
text: Movers were extremely slow and inefficient. I was pressured to hire a second crew during the move for twice the cost because they were unable to move the contents of a 3 BR house in 11 hours. Movers frequently carried only one small box at a time. Never utilized the hand trucks for multiple boxes. They broke my Christmas china and lied about it. I called to address the issues with management and was told there was no way I could have had a bad experience because they only have excellent reviews.

name: Anca Hanson
text: Our move was a success and progressed well and ahead of schedule thanks to the expertise and efficiency of the team from MoveDaddy. Mark and Izaak ran a smooth operation and brought a lot of ability and professionalism to every step of the process. Great job and awesome working with you 🙌

name: Laura Power
text: My company recently relocated to a different office building across town. Move Daddy sent us two guys, Mark and Izaac, who provided outstanding service! They were fast and didn't damage a single one of our office items. They moved everything from bookcases and desks to picture frames and vases. I recommend these two guys and this company 10/10

name: John Hunt
text: We were moving our business from one office to another. Lots of stuff! Mark and Izaac did a fantastic job of making this headache work smoothly. They were upbeat and worked hard. Impressed!

name: Kelly Plyler
text: I just moved from an apartment into a house, and probably called every moving company in Birmingham for a quote - Move Daddy was the least expensive and the quickest to get back to me, so I chose them based only on that. I was BEYOND impressed with the service they provided, and I was very skeptical since they were so inexpensive! Chris and Izaak arrived exactly on time and were very polite. When they got started, they were literally running back the apartment to get the next load. When they got to the house, I was a little nervous because we live on a narrow street and it is tricky to get into our driveway. The previous movers (different company) left tire tracks all over the lawn. Move Daddy maneuvered the truck in perfectly without touching a single blade of grass. They worked very quickly and efficiently moving everything in and making sure everything was where I wanted it. This was my first move with Move Daddy but next time I will definitely use them again!

name: Shelby Shepherd
text: Mark and Izaac helped our office move buildings IN THE POURING RAIN! They were kind, professional, but the most impressive thing is that they get paid by the hour and they RAN the whole time! They were so fast and helped us move in half the time we thought it would take!

name: Chablis Shultz
text: We moved from our apartment to our home on Monday with Jacob, Ryan, and Seth. Then on Tuesday we moved out of our storage unit with Jacob and Angel. Both teams were professional, on time, took great care handling our furniture at ALL times. They even took furniture for us that we no longer needed. This group of employees were excellent to work with, we could not have asked for better services. We have used other moving companies in the past and will never use a different company again. We loved Move Daddy. 5 stars without hesitation: prompt, polite, cautious, explained things well, great personalities, extremely kind and helpful. Thanks for everything!

name: brian camp
text: I have used Move Daddy for multiple moves over the last 5 years.   Every time is excellent.   I used them again today as well.   Very fast and efficient.   Actually running items to the truck.  Very courteous and asking to help move anything even items we wanted to put in our personal cars.   I am never disappointed.    I’m a realtor and builder so I use them personally and with my business customers.   Today’s Crew was Logan, Christian, Phillip, and David.  All excellent.

name: Kalyx Mcdonald
text: I had a local move within the same complex and Jacob & Phillip were promptly on time and quick! They took are off all my items as they were loading up and unpacking it into the new unit. I will definitely use move daddy again and recommend you all to my friends. Thanks Jacob and Phillip!

name: Mary Ann Duncan
text: Excellent service!  Christian and Phillip were great.  Very friendly and took care being sure furniture was packed well.  Had several pieces with glass shelves and glass doors and they took extra care in being sure they were safe.  Every time I talked with someone in this company they were both courteous and helpful.   I would most definitely use them again.

name: Ragan Butler
text: Great professional movers.  Izaak and Mark did a great job and were fast and careful. Very respectful.

name: Shawn Maye
text: My daughter scheduled this company to move her belongings from her apartment to our home, both residences are approximately 6 miles apart. My daughter had been quoted $108 per hour with a minimum of 2 hours. The guys were very personable and polite.  Upon arrival, I asked that they move a 1 couch, 2 chairs, and 1 recliner to a space in the basement.  Because I knew that this was in addition to the task of the move that they were hired for, I full well expected to pay whatever the charge for this additional work. They’d arrived at my daughter’s apartment at 8am and presented me with the contract at 10:08am...2 hours and 8 minutes.  Seeing that the charge was $378, I inquired if the extra had been to move the other items.  To my surprise the young man told me that there was no additional charge, as we were being charged by the hour.  I then asked if that were the case, why were we charged almost double the contracted 2 hours.  He nicely explained that they charge from the time that they leave their office until they arrive back at the office and then there is a charge for cleaning the vehicle.  It felt like I was being fleeced but I did not object, considering that they’d moved the other items.  I paid and provided a $50 tip for each of them and before going on their way, the young man with the paperwork asked that I please provide them a review on GOOGLE...Well here it is...After going down to the basement, I was beyond appalled and unsettled by the haphazard an uncaring manner that they left the items that they moved for me.  Both chars thrown above the couch, the cushions were scattered about the floor and the recliner had been taken apart.  For the life of me, I cannot understand why these items were placed in this manner,  It took more work to disassemble and place them in such disarray, that it would have to place them in a neat order.  Further, when my husband arrived home, he located the handle for the recliner in the street.  In all honesty, I fault myself for not going down into the basement while they were there.  I just never could have imagined that this is how they left things, especially after being asked to write a review. Just so we’re clear...I would never use or recommend this moving company.  I was fleeced and my personal belongings were disrespected, and I tipped for the favor!  Too bad I can’t give 0 or under a star!

name: Shelley Roman
text: This was my first time using a moving company and it  was so worth it! The guys were all profesional and polite. I have 0 complaints. The price was reasonable for the move. I definitely recommended Move Daddy and will be using them in the future.

name: van phan
text: Nick and Jenkins moved our older 300+ lb spindle piano into our upstairs loft from the downstairs garage. They were extremely careful not to damage the piano or our newly built house. They complied to wearing booties, mask and gloves due to the Covid situation and were extremely professional. After the piano move they  then moved an armoire to my sister’s house and were equally professional there. They were on time. I would highly recommend using this moving service and ask for Nick and Jenkins!

name: Sadie Goodman
text: I needed a baby grand piano moved in-house while some floors were redone. Along with this, moving of some other heavy items out of a room to accommodate the piano being moved. I then had Move Daddy come back 2 weeks later after a floor repair. They moved a lot of furniture throughout my house up and down stairs and outside on ramps to give my living spaces a fresh look.
