text: Second time I've used this location and both experiences the same representative had an attitude and came off as unapproachable. I will go out of my way to not use them again.

resp.text: We're so sorry to hear this, Shavawn Goley! Please call us at 1.800.462.8343 to discuss this further so we can provide you with assistance.

name: Terry Schultz
text: Friendly oriented and very helpful

name: Joy Steadham
text: Fair pricing, careful movers, and very professional. 11/10. I have used horrible moving services in the past, but these guys are top tier. I will never consider another mover again because I’ll be calling these guys!

resp.text: Thank you Joy! We look forward to moving you in future and more elevens.

name: Jeremy Coleman
text: They did very well came 10 min early👈

name: Annah Lauren Kelley
text:
Phil and his team were very professional. They respected our time and budget to make it the most efficient pack up/move as possible. We look forward to using Discount Movers again in the future!
Phil, Shawn and I both thank you for our recent move and can’t wait for you to move us into our new home! :)

name: Dee TooPretty
text: Very reliable, efficient and professional. They arrived on time, got everything out and packed safely. When my car wouldn't start and I became overwhelmed with all that I had going on they were very supportive and helpful. We got to the apartment and it was not a walk-in level as I had been told previously. They waited for a few and then we just went ahead and moved in. They worked with me during the entire move. All and all excellent service. I would most definitely recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Nothing like word-of-mouth! Thank you so much!

name: Joshua Daymean
text: This is a great moving company! Not only did they have great rates, they were on time, friendly, and they went above and beyond and took the time to hook up the washer and drier. Phil is awesome. I highly recommend discount movers!

resp.text: Thank you Joshua!

name: Bonderia Tabb
text: I looked at their reviews before moving and saw how everyone was satisfied with the price and move. I however, wasn't as satisfied. This was my first time using a moving company and I guess I was expecting more. Here is my honest experience. The first thing was the mileage to and from I wasn't expecting to pay for and I didn't hear about it until the day of my move. The second thing was that they started the clock when they pulled in the parking lot, not when they actually started moving. 3rd It took 3 hrs to move 2 beds,  breaking one down,  4 dressers, 2 bags,  pieces from bunk beds, a broken down table,  4 mattress,  2 box springs,  sofa and love seat recliners, and 7 seating chairs, washer and dryer and setting the bed back up. I still have bags left in my apartment,  that needs to be moved,  but I was already pushing almost $400 and I didn't want to continue paying. Maybe it's just me,  but I didn't think I would be out of that much money and still have to move some items out myself. It was two guys that came and Phil managed as they loaded and unloaded. I do think the younger guy was moving faster than the older guy and that could have played a big part as well. I have moved before and 3 hrs I would have normally been done with my entire apartment, but I've heard of people using companies and decided to try one. I give them 3 stars bcz I think they could have moved a little bit faster and completed an entire apartment move in less time.

resp.text: Bonderia,  I'm sorry that you were disappointed. I did tell you about travel time and I also discounted your travel time at the end of the job. This is the reason I record my conversations and I'll be glad to send you a copy of the audio if you wish. After reviewing the audio, I also estimated your job could be about $400. Also upon arriving I explained to you that if you wanted to keep your price low you would could get some of the smaller things and let us get the larger items. I hate to disagree with customers but you had an upstairs three bedroom apartment that had to go to another upstairs apartment. You also had full control over how much you wanted to spend on your job. We would have happily gotten everything in your apartment but since we are an hourly rate company it would have increased the cost of your job. It was your decision to stop where we stopped. We look forward to having your business in the future and I promise you we'll do our very best. Phil

name: Alexis Grace
text: Phil and his staff are awesome. This moving company went above and beyond. I highly recommend them for all your moving needs. They are very friendly, hardworking, helpful, and are an excellent team. Most definitely using them again!!! ☺

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we greatly appreciate your review.

name: Charles Lee
text: They were all so professional and down to earth. I had worked the night before my move and they were so helpful. They even connected my washer and dryer without me asking! They were quick, efficient, and affordable. I would refer them to anyone I know!

resp.text: Thank you Charles!!!

name: Lee Ann Grimmett
text: I had the pleasure of using Discount Movers on Friday, January 26th. Phil was excellent in helping me with this movie. Everything went as planned, on time, courteous, took great care with my furnishings, and reasonable. The guys went the extra mile to make sure I was happy. I gladly recommend them and would use again.

name: Dylan Jones
text: Excellent company that took care of all of my belongings while not wasting a second getting it done when moving apartments. Everyone was super friendly and even hooked up my washer/dryer at my new apartment. Great customer service. Will definitely recommend.

name: Kelly Woody
text: I will be using Discount Movers for my next move. The price was Awesome for what all I needed moved. Then it started raining I was looking for the guys to stop but no they keep moving and they had blankets to cover my items up to keep them from getting wet. I was really shocked when the owner Phil helped moved items. This is what you call dedication to the job at it's best.

resp.text: We're just so happy to have your business and your review.

name: Yeshea Harden
text: Quick! Efficient! Professional! The two guys that moved my things (I can’t remember their names) were great! They got my things moved in under the estimated time. They definitely know what they are doing. Phil, the owner, also keeps in touch with you up until the time of your move, which I love. I would 100% recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you so much.

name: Kristal Williams
text: Great service, highly recommended! Phil & his team got the job done in a timely matter. The price was reasonable and customer service was awesome. If you are looking to move, book these guys & you won’t be disappointed. Thank you discount movers!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Krystal. We we're happy to do your move. Your Dad kept us entertained the whole time. It was a pleasure to work for you.

name: Jennifer Lee
text: We just needed some muscle to help move a few things to our storage unit and these guys did great. They worked wuickly and efficiently to get things do e in less time that we thought. We will be using them again when we move into our new home.

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you so much for your business. We look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Chad Morrison
text: GAVE 4 STARS SIMPLY BECAUSE NO ONE IS PERFECT BUT THESE GUYS ARE CLOSE, THEY KNEW EXACTLY WHAT THEY WERE DOING AND DIDN'T WASTE ANYTIME, VERY PLEASED

resp.text: Thank you Chad for the very nice review. We look forward to moving you again in the future.

name: Ivan Trusler
text:
Great rates, great guys, great experience
I called Phil needing pricing and availability for a move the next morning and not only could they do the move, the rates were well within my budget. They were on time, courteous and no damages to my furniture or walls.

name: Matt Champion
text:
I was needing a moving company to move my three bedroom apartment into a three bedroom house, so I called several different moving companies.  When I called Discount Movers, the owner of the company Phil answered the phone, gave me a better quote then the other three major moving companies, and by the end of the call I had movers lined up on short notice.  I called on a Tuesday and was lined up for 8:30 Saturday morning.

The movers were great.  The owner of the company, Phil, even came on site to supervise his movers.  They did a fantastic job, in a time efficient manner, and carried themselves professionally.  If you are looking for great movers, for better prices than the major competitors, then Discount Movers is the company for you.

resp.text: Matt, thank you so much for the review. It was a pleasure to work for you.

name: Aquanita McClaney
text: Very efficient and professional.  Would definitely recommend their moving services.

resp.text: Thank you Aquanita. The best part of moving is getting to know new people and what a wonderful family you have. Phil

name: Fatima Bah
text: Very professional, quick and nice. The owner Phil even texts you updates if you prefer.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we appreciate your review.

name: yamika foy
text: I was in total disarray about my move initially. I contacted Phil 24hrs before I needed his service. Not only did Phil fit me in at last minutes notice, his crew was excellent. I will definitely utilize Discount Movers again!

name: Jacorria Bell
text: Phil and David were very courteous movers and did a very good job.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jacorria.

name: Dominic Medici
text: Mr Phil and crew did great work and fit us in his schedule on short notice. Thanks again Discount Movers!

name: James Smith
text: Had an apt on third floor. My appt was at 2p and they showed up on time. I knew these guys had already been working, but they were courteous, careful and got it done asap (still about 5 hours total). The price was reasonable - I'll never move my own stuff again. Just let these brutes handle it and save yourself a bad case of moving blues.

resp.text: Thank you James. We appreciate a compliment. There's no better advertising than Word of Mouth. Thank you again.

name: Darion S.
text: They were great!!!!! Very quick and nice and took great care of your things! Phil is the man!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Darion! Best of luck towards your music career.

name: Vijayanand Shenoy
text: Had very good experience with Discount Movers. They showed up on time and moved things carefully. I highly recommend Discount Movers :-)

name: Allyson Bedford
text: After the movers I hired backed out on me later than last minute, Discount Movers saved the day!  It was Friday evening and no other moving companies were even answering their phones.  But Phil and Solomon with Discount Movers showed up less than an hour after I got off the phone with them.  They loaded up all my belongings, drove across town and unloaded everything in less than four hours. At night.  In the rain.  These guys are fantastic and I would definitely recommend them to anyone in the Birmingham area!

resp.text: Thank you so much Allyson.

name: Shavonne Richardson
text: Couldn't have asked for more efficient and professional movers!! I had a last minute move and they were great!

name: Indy Roller
text:
Moving is never fun so thankfully Phil and his guys are around to make it easier.  Phil is very responsive, he answered every call and every question I had before booking.  The crew showed up early and ready to get my move done.  The team was careful with my belongings without riding the clock or over-packaging/wrapping things.
Discount Movers is a solid moving company for anyone in Birmingham.  I would recommend them to any of my family and friends.  Thanks, Phil!

Phil has moved me again and will be moving me into my new home soon.  I’ve used movers in different states and cities and can honestly say Phil is the only mover I’d write a review for.  Each time he’s helped me, it’s been less stressful and easier than I expected.  Thank you Phil, I appreciate your help!

resp.text: Thank you Shawn.

name: Sarah Ross
text: Thoroughly impressed with this crew - how quickly and efficiently they moved my belongings. I had several big items that the guys moved out quicker than I've had moved before. In and out in less than two hours for a two bedroom home. Price was just right - actually the most cost-effective I'd found so far (when comparing other B'hm movers and self-service uHaul). Thanks for all your hard work guys!

name: Jasmine Billingsley
text: Really good people and are very willing to help ! I recommend this company !

name: Jasmine Kay
text: Completed a move in pouring rain from third floor. Very skilled at moving and friendly service.

resp.text: Miss Kay, it was a pleasure to move you. You meet the nicest people in this business. And thank you for those cookies, they were delicious!

name: YonaPops
text: Great service, professional, fast and affordable.

resp.text: Thank you Keith, it was my pleasure to meet you, your wife, and your mother-in-law.

name: Marquetta May
text: Came early very proficient!

name: Jill Laminack Martin
text: We have used them twice and both times they completed the move underestimated time and actually gave us money back.

name: Anna Durham
text: This company did such a great job packing, transporting and unpacking our belongings.

name: caitlin carey
text: Armstrong moved our business for us and did an amazing job. They were professional, hard workers, and so easy to work with. Highly recommend for a commercial move!

name: Pinson Patriot
text: It is Very clean and professionally ran. Mr D Hayes, the manager, is a five star person and manager...

name: Evelyn Gray
text: These people were hired to move students out of a residence hall at UAB and they showed no care towards my things and threw them in boxes with no rhyme or reason along with trash and now I have broken dishes and a crumpled certificate and wrinkled posters that I have had for years and I am incredibly upset with the treatment given. Be on alert if you are not directly involved with them moving you, because they have ruined things that had no reason to be ruined.

name: Jami Burns Richards
text: I do not recommend this company for relocating anyone. They showed up late every day and left early, which resulted in a major time crunch and rushing on the very last loading day, in which we had a deadline to meet and needed to leave town. They dropped an entire cabinet shelf of spices on our stove and broke it- which they did replace. They wrote up that nearly every piece of furniture we own was damaged in some way or another then argued and got impatient when we were hesitant on signing off that our furniture was "predamaged", I'm positive that is to cover themselves when they damage your property. We opened boxes to many broken items, and I'm nervous to see what our Christmas decoration damage will be. The demolished a table, and we have a mysterious chip of paint in my brand new car from the day they rushed our unload in our driveway and were quickly maneuvering around it. This company is majorly disappointing.

name: T Beck
text:
We used Armstrong Relocation to pack and move my mom. I wish I could give them 10 stars! Our experience with this company was absolutely outstanding. The crew that came to pack/move my mom were all consummate professionals, extremely hard-working, had such a positive attitudes, handled my mom’s belongings with the upmost care, all while having a huge smiles on their faces.

The sales and customer service representatives were an absolute pleasure to deal with. We had to make a last-minute date change for my mom’s move, and the Armstrong Relocation team handled this last minute change as if it were no inconvenience or issue for them whatsoever. They were just eager to help with whatever we needed.

It was clear to me that this company has created a culture in which their employees are extremely proud to represent their brand and do it very well.
Without question, I would not only recommend Armstrong Relocation, I would use them again in a heartbeat.

Thanks for the great serving Armstrong Relocation!

#customerserviceexcellence

name: Marshall Mooney
text: We use their warehouse for storage .  They also provide shipping/receiving services.  The people are helpful and the facility is clean.  I just wish it were air conditioned. :)  If you like air conditioning, please like this review.

resp.text: Hi, Marshall! Thank you for your feedback!

name: Amy Self
text: The amazing team at Armstrong is wonderful.  We were treated like family from start to close. I highly reccomend using Armstrong.

resp.text: Hi, Amy! We strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience. Thank you for sharing your experience!

name: Craig Wilder
text: Lol... This is where I work...

name: Anastasia Beaverhousen
text: This group was awful. They were so unprofessional and incredibly rude. I wouldn’t recommend them to anyone.

name: Daryl Isbell
text: Great movers

resp.text: Hi, Daryl! Your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us. Thank you!

name: Dillroy Schmoot
text: Called these clowns again by mistake. Wanted junk moved on a Saturday. I was "long distance from the sacred headquarters." Extra charge. Set up the appointment. No show. Cats couldn't read a map. Couldn't find the place was their story. Look at my next review to learn about cool cats who can read a map. College Hunks was nice enough to set up an appointment for Sunday. Surprised me. They called Sunday morning to tell me that they didn't have an empty truck. Couldn't show up, could I reschedule. I said no. Then it dawned on me. I called the wrong company. I called the idiots. That's on me. Two appointments, two no shows.  $599 was their quote because I was long distance. Check out my next review for how you don't ever want to deal with these morons.

name: Brittany Wood (bwooderp)
text:
I have never been SO frustrated with a company that I left an angry voicemail, but College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving has proved that I am capable of doing so.

I had a Junk Removal Service appointment with a scheduled window of 1-3pm today. Per the appointment confirmation email, I was expecting a phone call “20-30 minutes before [my] scheduled arrival time to let [me] know when [they’ll] be there”; so, when I hadn’t received a phone call, text, or email by 1pm, I dialed the phone number provided on the appointment confirmation email.

The woman I spoke with confirmed that my appointment was correctly scheduled with my given phone number and address, and she suggested that if I don’t hear from the drivers within 20-30 minutes, to call them back.

Time passed, and at 1:30pm I called again, this time dialing the local number provided on the website. Again, I was redirected to customer service, but this time the man put me on hold to contact the local Huntsville office for further inquiry. The man returned to my call and stated the Huntsville office did not answer, so he had left a voicemail. He suggested to wait out the duration of my appointment window, and that it’s rare to have a no-show.

3:00 PM, no-show. I am beyond frustrated. I call again. Connected with customer service again, this time with a man named Bernard. Again, he offered to call the local office, but I told him that had been done already and I was not receiving any feedback on what was going on. I asked him for the number of the local office so that I could call them myself, and apparently this is not normally allowed and requires supervisor approval ??? He went ahead and left a voicemail with the local office during my time on hold, and once back on the line, he let me know he had received supervisor approval to give me the name and number of the manager at the Huntsville/Madison office.

How interesting that within 4 MINUTES of me leaving my honest voicemail that I received a phone call from the manager, John Smith. He apologized, said his drivers were hours behind on appointments “probably due to flooding”, that “their phones all probably died” and he wasn’t able to contact them and his hands were tied. I let him know that plenty of the reviews I had since read of his company were incredibly negative, so this situation most likely wasn’t due to flooding.

HE HAD THE AUDACITY TO INTERRUPT ME. “Well we have plenty of positive reviews-“ I told him I wasn’t interested in further service and hung up.

I warned him that I would be sharing my negative experience across all social media platforms, and I’m looking into filing a claim with BBB as well.

name: Susan Duthie
text: I love College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving.  They have helped me with two large moves, and two more times in between the large moves, with moving furniture from one floor to another, putting together beds, and helping me move stuff to the back door for a local charity to pick up.  They have ALWAYS been very nice and patient, from the owner, John, the manager, Eliot, to all the different movers.  Our last move in October, 2017, Mike, Jeremy, and David were very careful with our furniture, and they spoke to us very politely, and they never lost their composure and positive attitude during our 8 hour move.  I will continue to recommend College Hunks to everyone, along with continuing to use them for all of our moving needs.  They never disappoint.  Thank you very much, College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving.

name: Katherine Wolfe
text: First time I used them,really nice guys, showed up on time and we're very professional.  Not a problem.  Second time, no show no call, who I talked to was  in Florida and could not get an answer from the store here to find out why they didn't show or call.  I got my money back and called Two Men and a truck.  I will never use College Hunks again.  I see a lot of negative reviews.  Unprofessional.

name: Diane Neustadter
text: College Hunks comes through. We needed to move a hot tub down a steep, narrow driveway. They sent four men, including the manager because he said he "wanted to be sure it was done right!" They balanced the tub on multiple furniture dolleys and slowly walked it down the drive. They were so efficient, the entire move (loading, travel, unloading) took only one-fourth the estimated time. We were thrilled to have the job done so quickly and carefully... and at a lower cost than expected.

name: Linda Knowles
text: Devin and Blake were a joy to work with.  These two young men didn't waste any time and worked with a happy attitude.  They made quick work of the move and were very open to every suggestion I had which made me feel really good.  They did it "my way" and I didn't stress at all.  I will definitely use them again should the need arise.  Great job Guys; Thanks!

name: Travis Newby
text:
I recommend you avoid College Hunks for a whole house move. We had quite a few issues...

1. They called the day before our multi-truck, 2 day move and told us they didn’t have us on the schedule to drop off, and would we mind our stuff being a day late. Having two children and nowhere to go, I did mind. (To be fair, their reaction and patience to what I had to say about this was far better than mine.)

2. When they movers did show up, they were nice and worked hard. But they were not professional movers. They won’t totally wrap your furniture. You will have dings and nicks. They won’t respect your hardwoods or your doors.

3. When they dropped the furniture off, they did it with only 2 people. We have heavy hardwood furniture and this created a VERY dangerous situation for their workers, me (who had to help), and my furniture. And in fact, a heavy dresser tipped off the ramp and almost crushed one of their workers. If I were him, I’d have stopped work and demanded more workers come.

Because of all these things, I think you’re better off with a more professional moving company for whole house moves.

name: Shanna Ndong
text: Unprofessional! I requested a quote on their website. Within 30 minutes someone from Hunks called me for additional information. I spent 30 minutes answering questions about my move, but because my move includes packing I was told that I needed an in-person inventory. I scheduled it for the next morning (a Saturday). Instead of someone showing up for the quote as promised, I received a call from someone with Hunks saying they needed an inventory over the phone. I explained that I was told someone would come by to do the quote. The woman replied, “that’s just the call center”. (What?!) I said I provided a lot of information yesterday and she again said “I just need an inventory of your stuff. We only come out for haul-away or when there’s more than 2000 sq ft”. I told her I’m moving to a 3500 sq ft house. She replied “I need to know what you have now at your current place”. I told her I live in a 3 bedroom apt and we have 2 full storage units. My move qualifies as greater than 2000 sq ft. She replied, “I just need an inventory”. I told her I’d go with someone else and hung up. Poor attitude and poor customer service. That’s not how you run a business. They should honor what their call center tells customers even if it’s a Saturday.

name: Richard Sparks
text: I am a disabled veteran who recently built on to my house. I needed assistance to move all the old furniture into the garage so new flooring could be installed. I could not have asked for two more professional caring people as Larry & Devin. They moved 2400 Sq Ft into the garage in 3 Hrs and 45 Minutes. The were even creative in figuring out how to remove my granddaughter's trampoline from the great room and get it through all the door ways to the outside. Professionalism - 5 Stars; Pride in Work - 5 Stars; Knowledge of work - 5 Stars; Overall - 5 Stars. Great experience and I have requested these guys back next week to move it all back after the carpet is installed. Thank you so much for providing a great service to our community.

name: William Neville
text:
My movers MIKE, Ryan,Nick and Lucas were awesome!  Very courteous.  Moved everything where we needed it moved.  They were very careful not to damage the walls or furniture.  Great job guys!!!
As a customer it ended up costing more than we anticipated but we had a lot of loose items and they had to add a guy.  I'd recommend getting 4 guys it will cost you less in the end.

name: Jeff Bosonetto
text: This rating should be a NEGATIVE 1,000,000 Stars.  These movers are completely incompetent and unprofessional.  They dropped my $2500 900lb safe off their truck after telling me that they could move it even though they had the wrong equipment and not enough guys.  Their resolution was a measly $500 to replace the safe that is now out of warranty due to 100% of their incompetence, plus they failed to put it where it was supposed to go. When I confronted the owner on his inadequate resolution, the owner laughed and said that something will always get broken on every move so I should have bought insurance.  Really?!  A 900lb safe is not a box of china. So what he is saying is that they are so pathetic at what they do that they WILL break something on every move, and its on you.  Use these immature, unprofessional children at your own risk.   There is no doubt that this pathetic company will be out of business shortly and their owner will be back to flipping burgers.  Now, I'm going to hire real movers to finish their job and we'll let the court system decide exactly how much they are going to pay me.

name: Carol McDaniel
text: I give the movers 5 stars. They were very professional and super hard working guys. They called and arrive right on time. However my issue was with team that arranged the move. I specifically asked for a truck with a lift gate and that was no what arrived. My move involved heavy data center computer hardware.  I also was quoted one price and charged another because Friday is considered a 'weekend'.

name: Davis McKelvey
text: I totally agree with everyone else who has given the College Hunks five stars.  So courteous, so punctual.  They showed up exactly as scheduled and completed the job perfectly.  I'm one happy customer and won't hesitate to use them again in the future.

name: Stephanie Cockrill MD
text: Great guys, super hard workers and very nice. Managed to fit an entire house inside a PODS. I was so worried it wasnt all going to fit, but they stacked everything so well! Excellent service. I will definitely use them again and recommend them to my friends and family.

name: TERI CARLOSLE
text:
College Hunks moved appliances (refrigerator, stove, dishwasher and microwave) and household goods to a charitable organization for me. These guys arrived early, moved items quickly and nothing in my home was nicked, damaged or bothered. The estimates I was given was accurate: I wasn’t charged extra for movers or the company trying to exceed my estimated cost. A manager came with the Hunks to my residence for overnight: very professional and astute. I’ve used 2 Men and a Truck, Allied Movers, Northern Van Lines: after using College Hunks in Huntsville, AL; I’ll never use any of the above named companies again. These young gentlemen are in college and want to work: today’s youth isn’t geared in this direction. I’m proud to have met these fine young gentlemen with a work ethic I admire. Thank you as a company: most of all I thank the crew who eagerly assisted me.

Sincerely

Teri Carlisle

name: Tinia Barnes
text: Tabb and Chris were polite and worked very hard. They did not waste time. We had a lot of heavy furniture and it was 90+ degrees. I would highly recommend them!

name: Becky Russell
text: I can't say enough about Mike & Job. They did a fantastic job for us today. They were very professional, on time, & very courteous in every aspect. Everything was handled with care. I was quoted 4 1/2 to 6 1/2 hours for what we needed and they fell right in the middle at 5 1/2 hours. I can't say how much I appreciate them and all they did today.

name: Loronda Davidson
text: We needed help moving a treadmill and found these guys. They arrived promptly and moved it with ease! I highly recommend them for any job you need help with. If I need help again, they will be my first choice! Thanks again!

name: NitaBillS Schmidt
text: Roberto and Nick showed up on time, called to say they would be there about 15 minutes before they arrived.  They were courteous, professional, and fast.  We could not have done it without them.  They both deserve a raise!   Thank you so much.

name: Alisa Breen
text: Very quick and professional moving! Took a lot of care with my items and two very nice men. Thank you so much for your help!

name: Stacie M
text: College Hunks did a fantastic job moving a piano that I inherited from a family member. Mike and Marius showed up on time, worked quickly and efficiently, and moved the piano from Huntsville to Madison with no damage to the piano or either house. We were definitely pleased with this service and would use College Hunks again in the future!

name: Lora Cason
text: This is my experience with college hunks removal. After rescheduling twice you finally showed up to get your truck stuck in my driveway.  Your drivers used my landscaping rocks to attempt to move the truck and then threw them in my grass. After two hours a tow truck came to move the truck. Then your truck drove away without removing the furniture that needed removing because I had new furniture coming.  After calling the local Huntsville AL office they said they did not have time in their schedule to come back this week. This left me in a bind but ‘we haul junk’ came through later that day. I am so disappointed in the unprofessionalism i encounter with your company. I can assure you it was NOT STRESS FREE.

name: Isabel Evans
text: Very courteous and on time.  They were quick and packed the truck in a way that required the least amount of space possible.  Wonderful experience!

name: Drey Marlow
text: Absolutely 5 stars! Ameen and Jacob were quick and efficient! They beat the quote by 2 hours! They took extra care of my antique furniture and wrapped everything right. They took the time to ask me where I wanted the furniture in the new house. Would recommend 10/10 times!

name: D Igou
text: Chunk Junk was the best experience!  They were courteous, prompt, fair in their price, and the best part was the man handling our old 600 pound television from upstairs and out to their truck!  Couldn't have done it without them and we are so glad Chunk Junk exists!

name: Nathan Ford
text:
Mike and Mariuus did a fantastic job moving my family and me. Our house too longer than budgeted and actually took an extra trip. They were happy to do everything necessary to ensure we were totally happy.

We all had a great time working together. My two year old daughter has been asking where they went after they finished!

My only critique of Hunks was the estimation process. Felt a little rushed and I got conflicting info from the local and corporate systems.

name: Laura Priest
text: I could not have been any happier with my experience using College Hunks. I called for a quote at 2pm and they were at my house at 5:30pm that evening. Roberto and Jalen were incredibly respectful and they were so fast. They had our entire garage cleaned out in 1.5 hours. I would highly recommend this crew for the removal of junk or moving services. I also love that the workers are in college and if they receive a positive rating a portion of your total goes towards their tuition and books!!

name: russell lane
text: Mike and Devin were top notch, A+ guys! They were eager to get the job done, had a great attitude and work ethic, and moved A LOT of furniture and other household items FAST! Highly recommend these 2 for your next move.

name: Brianna Clark
text: I have used this service before and was pleased prior to this event. This time I used College Hunks the staff was very unprofessional. At times  one of the movers carried a pillow at a time to my moving pod. Both movers decided to place my solid oak table on top of boxes clearly marked fragile. Overall, there was a complete disregard for items marked fragile.  I expected more efficient work and attention to detail from the movers.

name: Tony Spinelli
text: Mike and Brian were extremely professional and got the job done quickly and safely. I would absolutely recommend these guys any time. I was in a bind and needed quick response, and they did not disappoint.

name: W W
text: Nothing but an excellent & easy experience from making the call to paying for my junk removal! The call & scheduling my estimate was a breeze. I love how you aren't obligated to pay unless you say, "Do the job." Eliot & Aaron came out & gave me an estimate which I felt was fair & they got to work. They were both very polite & accomodating to my needs and finished the job quickly. It was money well-spent as it saved me time & the headache of trying to figure out how I was going to remove the junk and where to take it. I highly recommend using College Hunks for your junk removal!!

name: Angela Howald
text: Erika is great to work with for scheduling and estimates.  Roberto and Nathan arrived early, were professional and efficient.  They moved my office quickly and without any damage.  I was very happy.

name: Karen Lee
text: Devin, Mike and David were AWESOME!! My move was difficult with numerous very heavy antiques and fragile pieces and collectibles. They carefully wrapped my furniture and got my things from house to house undamaged. They were real sports when I had them move furniture around after it was where I thought it was suppose to be! They are my team for future moves!

name: Kate Carson
text: Loved these guys! Quick, professional and helped easy to set up. Will definitely work with them again!

name: Rand Childs
text: The experience was excellent.  Very easy to schedule.  Truck arrived on time and the guys hauling away our old junk did an excellent job.  Glad Huntsville has this service!

name: Mary Cummings
text: The best men ever!  Second time with Michael Baker. They were on time courteous and very professional. I’ll call for them when I need movers again.

name: Ed Preston
text: Fast, friendly, courteous and professional service. Devin and Shannon did an outstanding job. We're there in time, took care of my furniture (even a huge 1800s antique piano) and made sure everything was exactly where I wanted it before they left. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Alexandra Griffin
text: Somehow they can’t do any moving in Madison (????) and when their “home advisor” connected me to a very expensive alternative, I then proceeded to get spammed with multiple emails a day from the Home Advisor. When I unsubscribed, it takes up to TEN DAYS for changes to take affect?? You can subscribe me immediately but not unsubscribe me? Terrible knock off of We Chunk Junk.

name: Kathy Rupert
text: The two gentlemen that came to get our junk were friendly and professional. This is the second time we have used this service and are very happy. We will use it again.

name: Melani Trexler Mooneyham
text: We had a great moving experience and are very thankful for the wonderful job that Shannon, Steve and Jo did for us!  We are thankful for their hard work and professionalism!  Keep up the great work guys!

name: CECILLE SAINSBURY
text: Wow, what a positive experience.   So efficient and courteous, probably, best contractor experience leading up to this move.  Highly recommend College Hunks Hauling Junk.

name: Christy Sanders
text: Would definitely use again! I had a company storage unit that had to be cleaned out and the guys were on time and super nice

name: Barb Benjamin
text: These guys were great! Professional, polite, on time and very helpful. Give them a call!

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Great experience!  Timely, hard working, friendly and priced reasonably.  Couldn't have asked for more!  Would definitely use them again!!

name: Myra Schroeder
text: Our move was a nightmare as most moves are but College hunks was the only positive in this entire move.  I do not say this lightly as we had tire problems with our rental trucks we had breakdowns etc.  College hunks were very patient and accommodating as we had to change our times a couple times due to the breakdowns. They were always there for us, called us many times to make sure everything was OK not to pressure us mind you and we’re so polite and very caring of our household goods. Their district leader even showed up to see what he could do when he realized all of our household goods were put on the truck carelessly and many things broken. All this was due to the company Penske hired to move all our household goods once the breakdown occurred.  My husband and I will never hire any other company if we need anything done we’re moving is concerned. I highly recommend them to anyone at all because we worked with them in Florida and worked with a different group of them in Alabama when we moved and in both states the company and its people were the same. College hunks in Alabama was wonderful and we will hire them again when we finally find a home.

name: Arlene LaFrance
text: They were friendly,  curtious and completed the task quickly. I would definitely use this service again.

name: Sarah Matthews
text: These guys saved the day and helped make my move possible  and timely.  THANKS SO MUCH

name: Steve Reed
text: Drake and Marius were our movers.  Great experience!  They were very professional, courteous, and responsive.  I would move with College Hunks again.  Thanks!!

name: Jeff Tate
text: We had a great move today with Mike & Maruius with College Hunks in Huntsville.  They were extremely professional and treated our items like they were their own.  We will certainly use them again for future moves!

name: matthew clemons
text: Great experience. Maruius and Lucas were fast, professional, and very polite. I will always use College Hunks for moving and would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Susan Spencer
text: Fantastic experience. The movers were experienced and did a great job.

name: Jonathan Walker
text: Michael and Tamar were quick, efficient and arrived during my scheduled window. Price was close to expected and both of them were nice and friendly.

name: Scott Dennis
text: They did a great job and made sure we got items where they were supposed to go.

name: Jo Ellen Reid
text: Great experience, could not have asked for more polite and respectful folks.

name: Walt Schumacher
text: Roberto and Remson were friendly and efficient.  They got rid of a bunch of my trash, and also helped me move some furniture.  Great job!

name: Christy Tate
text: Mike & Maruius were professional and  courteous.  They took extra care with our belonging and went above and beyond to make sure they did not damage anything in our new home.  I would recommend Mike & Maruius and College Hunks in Huntsville for anyone looking to move in the area.

name: Tom Zebal
text: I asked for furniture movers... I got the junk haulers... In fact one of the guys told me "this is the first time I have moved furniture for a customer who was moving, I usually just do the junk removal".. They were HORRIBLE on my furniture and the walls & doors of my home as they moved the furniture... Claim filed.. NEVER again.

name: Terri Knight
text: Great communication. DeForrest and AJ  were Great! Thanks for the help.

name: Caron Sykes
text: Very easy and affordable. Great service!

name: P S
text: Great communication. Efficient and friendly. Highly recommend.

name: Kim Coulter
text: Michael and Christian were so helpful. And did a great job.

name: Tiffany Taylor
text: In three separate moving days, the team was a minimum of 45 minutes late for arrival, with one of those days being hours late. With initial discussions we were quoted and paid for a team of 6, but on moving day only 3 were there, 1 of whom spent most of his time in the truck rather than helping move. After a sight visit and quote, we were told we would be cutting it close with 1 truck but that she thought we could get it all. So to ensure we would be okay, my husband and I rented, loaded and moved a 12 foot covered trailer from uhaul in advance. But they still couldn't fit it all in the truck. We have had to haul another 15 foot uhaul truck plus will have to make several more loads in our SUV or pickup to get the rest. No one in the company has been apologetic in the least, and in fact have responded rudely, untruthfully, and completely inappropriately to our petition for their consideration of the inconveniences that their misquote has caused us... Oh, and by the way, their inability to properly drive a truck resulted in relatively significant damage to our property. At first, my husband and I were willing to overlook their errors and their incompetence, however their dishonesty is what has resulted in this post. In our opinion, this is not a company that values integrity.

name: D Benel
text: Great experience! Mike and Nick were polite, professional and accomplished my moving efficiently.

name: sharon davis
text: Very professional, curious and considerate of your home. Thanks

name: Vicky B
text: Maruius and Mike were extremely professional movers!  I would highly recommend them for big or small moves!

name: Jakeyah Williams
text: Aiden😎 was the best guy for the job 😊😊😊. Truly a young professional and all around friendly little guy!!!

name: Phaedra Dugan
text: Mike B and Joseph did a great job moving some large fragile antiques.  Very professional and on time.  Thanks!!

name: Russell Finch
text: Friendly, efficient and well worth the price

name: Summer Smith
text: Great guys that do a great job! Thanks College Hunks Huntsville!

name: Kent White
text: Mike and Maruius were efficient, polite, and gentle with our furniture.  What a good experience!

name: Robert Kelley
text: Jalen and Roberto did a great job.

name: Jake Hill
text: Highly recommend for junk disposal.

name: Sara McNair
text: Wonderful experience and wonderful people!

name: EP Breeze
text: Roberto and Javier moved the contents of our Mom's apartment and took them to a charity for us. Our Mom had passed away suddenly and emptying her apartment was filled with emotion.  These young men were professional and extremely compassionate of our situation.  We would highly recommend them for any type of move.

name: David Browning
text: Could not have been happier. We had David & Maurius help us with the initial move and asked for them specifically for the second part of the move.

name: Amir Razani
text: Very professional. Thanks for the help!

name: Anthony Draper
text: On time and very professional!

name: Edgar A
text: Rented from them in the past.  Never had an issue.  They even waited 30 mins after the gate closed to let me come back and lock my unit one time.They drafted my monthly rental automatically and when I canceled they stopped.  Nice people in the office too.

name: Joel Bryant
text: Very nice staff and secure clean storage buildings

name: Lauren Humphrey
text:
Anyone in the Helena/Maylene/Pelham area. DO NOT use Helena 1st Self Storage! We went to get our stuff out of our storage building (that we had been paying for since March) and there was a hole in the roof through which water had leaked into our unit and a bunch of our stuff is ruined, including Rory's wooden play kitchen. When we got it home and opened it up, roaches spilled out of it. We contacted the owner and they said that it is not their problem, too bad. We have tried to work it out with them, but they don't care.
They said that one of the clauses says that they are not liable for tornado, wind or flood damage. My response was that this damage is not due to natural disaster or circumstances, but rather, failure to maintain their property. I paid 11 months of rent to keep my belongings safe, dry and protected. We are in the process of consulting an attorney. I had to throw out bedding which was moldy, the wooden play kitchen is warped, and all the wooden playfood is ruined. Not to mention the roaches that spilled out of it when we got it home.

name: Kimberly April
text: I had the best moving experience with Armstrong Relocation. From the personal coordinator to the moving crew, and the customer service rep were honest and took well care of my personal items. I really liked the fact that they inventoried all my items and made sure nothing was broken during the relocation. They took the stress out of moving for me. I will use Armstrong for my next move!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful move experience with us.

name: Diana Will
text: I was SO impressed with the quality of work Armstrong relocation provided for my family. They were prompt, funny, organized and communicative! I would HIGHLY recommend this company for your move. I hope I don’t have to move again- ever, but if I do, I’m using them again! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and positive review. Please let us know if we can be of any assistance in the future.

name: alisa Belcher
text: The team at Armstrong Relocation is the best of the best! I never had to worry about any details of my move - they came in and took care of everything ! The care and attention given to protecting my furniture was incredible! They were professional and made the move fun with such great attitudes! They had me packed and moved a day ahead of schedule because of their work ethic ! So worth every penny !!!

resp.text: We love being a part of such an exciting time in our customers’ lives. Thank you for sharing your experience, and if we can ever help you again, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

name: Darius
text: Very Friendly Staff, Nice Easy Unload Process

resp.text: Darius, thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are always so pleased to hear of another positive encounter with our team. Thank you for choosing Armstrong!

name: Trey Pollard
text: Armstrong Relocation was incredible. Nate and his crew were working from the time they showed up. They handled everything with care and worked quickly and efficiently. I recommend booking your next move through Susanna Moore with Armstrong Relocation in Birmingham. She was honest, responsive and quoted a very fair price. She also made sure to check on us the day of the move to ensure everything went smoothly. We cannot thank them enough.

resp.text: Hi, Trey! We’re happy to hear you had a great move. Thanks for sharing your feedback. We’ll be sure to share your comments with our team. Best of luck in your new home!

name: Keith Cooper
text: Always ready when I need them.

resp.text: We are always happy to help! Thank you for the kind review.

name: Valerie Hanson
text:
Armstrong Relocation did a fantastic job moving my family into our brand new home!  The customer service I received from Suzanna and her team was top of the line from start to finish.

On moving day, Jamal and his crew arrived on time, had a positive attitude, and eager to work.  I don't know how they did it, but they made moving seem fun!  I was very pleased with my entire experience, and appreciate Armstrong for making my move stress free.

Thank you, Armstrong!

resp.text: Valerie, Thank you so much for your kind words. It's great to know that Susanna and Jamal and our Armstrong people made your move stress free and enjoyable. It's nice to know their hard work is appreciated!

name: chris cochran
text: The movers were excellent. They were fast, professional, and helpful throughout the entire process.

resp.text: Chris, we're glad to hear everything went well and you were pleased with your move. We know that moving can be stressful and I'm glad our team could put you at ease. Thanks for the great review.

name: Pami Arthur
text: My first experience with this. I was not impressed. I was missing a box that was labeled tv. There was trash left all over my yard, they couldn't get my couch in. They were suppose to unpack,they didn't. Now I have to find a way to get rid of all these boxes. On the few things they did assemble he complained on how bad he hated that part of the job. It was just a terrible experience.

resp.text: Pami, we are sorry about the experience with your delivery, and as we discussed, will be back to pick up your boxes and debris on Monday. Please call me to discuss any future concerns.

name: Charles Sirna
text: My interstate move could not have been better, everything went smooth, everything arrived unblemished - [except for one flat screen that evidently got "bumped" - but this was handled with aplomb as well, with a check in the mail in 5 days]  - they were not the least expensive, nor were they the most, but based on my experience  - I would recommend them without reservation

resp.text: Charles, Thank you so much! We love to hear that our Van Operators and crews have made the moving experience a good one for valued people like you!

name: Graham Dougherty
text: We used this company for a commercial move and they did a great job. Very professional and they took their job seriously. They went above and beyond and even corrected my packing. 5 stars!

name: Bill McVay
text: Moving is stressful and Armstrong Relo made it easier. Our move was not easy involving gathering and moving between three different locations before making the long move to the final destination. It involved some unique issues and it was all scheduled without a hitch. We have done several moves and this one rates as the easiest even though we gave them a hard move to coordinate.

name: Ajay Kasi
text: I had to make a long distance move from the West Coast to the East Coast and I used Armstrong relocation. The senior move coordinator  contacted me and promptly scheduled a pre-move home survey. They provided a very reasonable estimate. The move date and time was also flexible and convenient. The movers came home and packed everything in boxes and were very professional. All my items arrived undamaged to my new home and the move-in team was very efficient and courteous. They set the boxes and furniture in the requested rooms. Throughout the process, the move coordinator, Truc Hayes, was always courteous, professional and accessible by phone/ email and would work alongside my schedule. Overall, I am very satisfied with their service and would recommend them to my friends and family.

name: Michael Wilkinson
text: Armstrong was professional, timely, and efficient. They packed, shipped, and delivered exactly according to our schedule which was a huge blessing when moving across the country. Highly recommend this organization.

name: Melisa Rhodes
text: The absolute best!!!  Professional and treated our possessions with the greatest respect.  They almost made moving pleasant.

name: Mary Bea Sullivan
text: We had a complucatd double move. The Armstrong team was amazing!! Accommodating and kind.

name: TruckinWoman
text: I'd give this company -100 stars if at all possible! As a truck driver, who delivered for this company to unload a homeowner's belongings. The crew was very unprofessional. And they lie. First off it was an 8 am delivery. I got there at the address at 8:05. Sat on the side street for about 30 mins, then called them. We are 5 minutes away they said. After another 45 minutes, I called again. We are 2 lights away now they said. 30 more minutes passed before they showed up, 2 hours late! The home owner asked them why you so late? Their answer, Traffic! Then the crew started bickering about one guy taking a break when the other 2 didn't, right in front of the home owner. Plus they hinted to me for a tip. Hell I'm the truck driver, it's not my place to tip them, so they got mad, and left all their trash, (which their SUPPOSE to dispose of themselves, including their water bottles and sweat rags) I called their boss and asked him to get back to me, on how unprofessional they were, but it's been 3 days and he hasn't and probably won't. Stay clear of this unprofessional relocation mover!

name: Amber Nicole
text: So helpful! And SUCH a clean warehouse. Thanks guys!

name: Johnny Fleming
text: Not to bad. Quick loading.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive rating and feedback!

name: Craig Wilder
text: Friendly People...

resp.text: Hi, Craig! Thank you for your kind review and happy holidays!

name: Daryl Isbell
text: Great company!

name: Sherita Gunter
text: Great

name: Joe L Gerald
text: attentive careful employees!

name: Paula Reagan McClure
text:
This was the absolute worst moving company. We hired Allied Movers who contracted our move out to Coleman Movers. We are extremely unhappy with both companies. Our move was terrible from the beginning to the end and as of right now neither company is willing to make it right and will not return any phone calls or emails. Do not use the two companies.
Our moving truck had a blowout due to the movers packing the truck so full, it was crazy how much of our things were crammed onto the truck to keep from having to use two trucks which they did have to anyway. The load was too heavy for the bald tires. After the blowout the moving truck was towed to the companies warehouse where there the warehouse workers unloaded all my items a lot of expensive nice furniture pieces and antique China that was mishandled and not with any care. When the second truck arrived at my home a day late it was terrible. Most of my items were broken or missing and very soiled due to not using blankets on the floor of the nasty truck. I can’t tell you what all I have that is broken and the worst part of it all is the two companies will not do anything about it. The workers were very careless and complained the entire time about how tired they were. My husband carried more boxes than all 3 of the movers together. The list goes on and on. The boxes were all crushed and most were opened on both ends.... how does this happen? It’s been 2 weeks and still I can’t get anything resolved with either company. They took our money and will not do anything about our horrible experience not even a phone call. I DO NOT recommend.

name: tammy beckham
text: This move was absolutely the worst move I have had in over 10 years of moving at least 5 times.   The company was completely misleading.  They sent a driver to load my house knowing his physical for his drivers license would expire within two days therefore he could not deliver on time.  I was promised a delivery day and they delivered three days later.  They also promised me they would cover my hotel and food and did not.   Now they have become completely unresponsive.  Not only this but when they did deliver my furniture has incredible damages to it that i am claiming through their process.  But nevertheless they destroyed several pieces that had sentimental value.  They took apart literally everything and at delivery did not put back together even 1/2 of it.  most of the parts to do so are lost and i cannot find them.    This is the worst company you could possibly use to move.  I have moved several times in the past five years out of state and NOT ONCE did I ever get treated this way nor was my furniture damaged to this extent.  DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.

name: Keith Cooper
text: Professional and very reliable way to ship your freight all-over.

name: Terrie Thomas
text: Driver was nice and efficient. Nothing was broken at delivery.

name: Adam Howell
text: This move was ideal. The salesman was very nice and came in to do a survey and was extremely helpful. I was out of town during the move, but my wife was there and said the move was simple and easy. The movers were professional and took care of our belongings. We did have one small scratch on an old coffee table that I could hardly see. The movers were honest enough to point it out and make me aware of there mistake. We will be recommending Allied and Coleman due to their honesty and professionalism.

resp.text: Adam thanks for the awesome review. We are happy you were pleased with your move and regret to learn about your scratch! Hopefully, you have been sent claims information to address that one small hiccup. Enjoy your new home!

name: Jim Loomis
text: The Coleman Moving staff were friendly and helpful throughout the moving process, from cost estimation to scheduling, pickup and delivery.  The pickup and delivery crews were friendly and had good teamwork.  We were impressed by the excellent packing skills and techniques of the Birmingham pickup crew.  Communication with the scheduler and drivers was good.  We experienced a smooth move. There were no surprises. Based on our positive experience, we recommend Coleman Moving.

resp.text: Jim, we are glad to hear that your expectations were met during your recent move. We hope to be able to assist you or anyone you know in the future! Enjoy your new home!

name: Brad Cole
text: Driver was great, unpackers were as well.  Packers were so-so.  Didn’t label well.

name: Roy Hudson
text:
We recently moved from Alabama to Louisiana and my experience with Coleman American Moving was remarkable. From coordinating dates, logistics, pricing, packing, loading and unloading, everything was first rate. The employees were friendly, professional and so easy to work with. They were on time, efficient, and took great care with all of our possessions.

Every aspect of the move far exceeded my expectations, and I have rarely seen a company that takes such pride in what they do. I would recommend Coleman to anyone who needs a mover and wants the job done right.

resp.text: Roy, thank you so much for the kind words. We're happy to hear that you experienced a great move!

name: Bri Hunnington
text: Great job! I was very pleased. I will be recommending them to everyone I know.

resp.text: Bri, we're happy to see you were fully satisfied with your service. We will share with local and regional management and look forward to serving everyone you send our way!

name: Emily Pope
text: Very satisfied with the move. The team was professional and fast! Got everything finished in no time. If I ever have to move I will use them again!

resp.text: Emily, thanks for the kind review. We're happy to hear that your moving needs were met!

name: Savannah Waldrop
text: Mr. Jimmy went above and beyond his required responsibilities. He is extremely organized, professional, considerate, trustworthy and a huge positive representative for the company! I would recommend Coleman if you are moving!

resp.text: Savannah, thanks for the kind review! We are glad to hear you were pleased with your service.

name: Kathryn Baker
text: First time moving went great! The movers had the best attitude and made sure my home was not damaged in the process.

resp.text: Kathryn, we're glad to see that your move met expectations! Thank you for the kind words!

name: Beth Wagner
text: We have moved over 20 times for work and the move with Coleman American was the easiest move we have ever done. Great care was taken for our belongings at every stage of the move. Awesome job.

name: Christian Hope
text:
I got 7 pieces quick unload 30-40Min.
Be careful little tight there.

resp.text: Christian, thank you for your 5-star rating. We hope you are enjoying your new residence!

name: James Fite
text: Fast, Simple, and Easy

name: Henry Bright
text: Guys were nice and respectful. I hope I won't need their services again, but if I do they will be the one's to move me.

resp.text: Henry, thank you for this 5-star rating and your kind words. We are glad to see that we met your expectations and we hope that we can help you and those that you know with any future moving needs.

name: Dan Mortimer
text: My family has moved 17 times in the last 27 years for work related reasons. Coleman Allied did an OUTSTANDING job moving my family's possessions from Florida to Texas on the days promised with great care and professionalism. We have seen the good, the bad and the ugly when it comes to movers but our GO TO company is Coleman American.

name: Sam Thompson
text: We used Coleman to move across Birmingham. Team moved fast and didn't break a single thing.

resp.text: Sam, we are pleased to hear that you are satisfied with your move. Thanks for your kind words and we hope you are enjoying your new residence!

name: Austin Sibley
text: Great hardworking workers!

resp.text: Austin, thanks for the kind review! We'll share with our team!

name: Suzanne Gunn
text: Do not use this company.  They are thieves and completely unprofessional. They don't stand behind their service and do not honor claims.  Please do not use them.

name: James Henry
text: Couldn't have gone better.

resp.text: James, we are pleased to hear that our services met your expectations. Thank you for your kind words and the 5-star rating!

name: Mi Amour Norman
text: Too high

name: Darien Escalona
text: Disrespectfully way to treat the people time, thanks a lot for your no cooperation!

resp.text: Jordan, we regret that you were not satisfied with our service. Can you maybe email us at feedback@colemanallied.com with more details?

name: pierre bernard
text: I have been moving around the world about 10 times and this was the worst experience ever : the crew was unable to deliver the good on the agreed date and did not even call, they came with an 18 wheeler when we asked for a small truck to enter the residence, several boxes were missing and the insurance reimbursed only 30% of the value ... It was the cheapest quote, for a move inside the usa, I know why !!!

name: Robert Templeton
text: Has to be one of the best pawn shops in Talladega county. Jeff is really reasonable on pricing.

name: Hoss Reyes
text: Jeff is a great guy .  He has reasonable prices and a pretty good selection.

name: Ben Dover
text: I have had a good experience here better then Kings for sure

name: Dwayne Netting
text: Jeff is a good guy just has some weird hours

name: S Hayes
text: Don't go near opening, currently sitting in the parking lot. 40 minutes late. Closes for lunch too but it's not posted on the door.

name: Becky Griffin
text: Great owner, reasonable prices and just all around a friendly place to do business

name: Jill Upchurch
text:
The guys were very professional, careful, and fast!!! Very pleasant experience!  They even were able to come the same day and help
me re-arrange and remove some furniture  I will use them again.

name: Josh Norton
text:
This company is absolute garbage. Their employees are inexperienced, clumsy, and unable to handle simple problems. If you have an issue, you will be directed to some call center down in Tampa, FL, who are absolutely incompetent as well. The Call Center can, and will only, call the local franchise owner to express your complaint. This franchise owner, never reaches out to his customers, despite the fact that my wife and I both got his cell phone number and left numerous messages.

Now on to what actually happened.

My wife's parents recently moved and we needed to move her piano out of their house, so we hired College Hunks to move the piano. We expressly told them that it was to move a piano and that was the only thing that needed to be moved.

The scheduled day approaches. They said they would be there at 4:30. When 5:30 eventually rolled around, so did they. ((Strike One))

They then moved the piano out of the house and down the first step for a total of about 15 feet. Then for some inexplicable reason, could not move it any further. Not only that, but it was ONLY THEN that they realized that they had no way of getting the piano up on their truck. So they came to a job knowing that they were going to move a piano without the proper equipment and without enough people.

Then comes the worst part of all. Instead of moving the Piano back inside where they originally moved it from. THEY LEFT IT OUTSIDE!

They Left the damn piano and said that they would be back tomorrow!

Wait, it gets better.....

The next day rolls around and again they say they will be there between 3:30 and 4:30. Well, 5:30 comes and goes and still no word from these stooges. That is when my wife and I started calling that call center and reaching out to the Franchise Owner and even the guy driving the truck.

They said they were running late and would be there at 6:30. We then asked them if they had a different truck or additional equipment. They told us what they were bringing and IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT THEY HAD THE DAY BEFORE.

7:00 PM comes along and still no word. We call that Call Center again, and this time they tell us that they had to reschedule and that they would be there the following day, which would have left this piano OUTSIDE for TWO Days!

I finally had enough of these inept morons and called up someone who also owned a moving service. He was able to get out to the house the following morning and move the thing in less than an hour.

To sum up:

This company absolutely sucks. Incompetent Employees + Incompetent Ownership and Service. They left my wife's piano OUTSIDE for TWO Days before we finally had enough of their nonsense and hired another company.

I will never use College Hunks again, nor will anyone that I know.

After I am done with this review, I will actually be looking into filing a claim against these morons for the scratches that they also put on the piano during their re-enactment of a Monty Python Sketch.

name: Jared Leader
text: This was our first time using a moving service and I was blown away with the amazing quality of service. Mark, Andrew, and Ja'mon were fantastic. They were professional, knowledgeable, and worked really well together as a team. Not only did they get the job done in a timely fashion; they also went out of their way to make sure our stuff was well taken care of. I will definitely be using this moving service again and requesting these three!

name: James Luker
text: Very friendly and efficient. Got the job done quickly. Price was great. 5 stars.

name: Courtney Evans
text: Very unprofessional. The college 'hunks' were very rude. As well as almost running us and our vehicle over. Very very childish. Please dont waste your time with this company.

name: Deborah Jones
text: I'm really satisfied with their service. They arrived an hour earlier than expected which was great! I was given a call beforehand to see if this was ok. They made short work of hauling out my junk and the team leader Eddie was very courteous and pleasant. The price was $250 lower than another junk hauling company in the area. I will be using them again for my moving needs later this month.

name: Clay Brooks
text: BRIAN, LUKE, AND MARK WERE SO GREAT THE ENTIRE TIME. IT RAINED ON THEM ALL MORNING BUT THEY WERE SO KIND AND HELPFUL DURING THE WHOLE MOVE AND NEVER HAD A BAD ATTITUDE. I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH HOW WELL THEY DID, AND THEY WERE ALSO SUPER FAST AND EFFICIENT. I WILL DEFINITELY USE YOUR COMPANY AGAIN, AND RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS BECAUSE OF HOW WELL THESE THREE GUYS DID. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

name: connie hartley
text: DEVON AND BRYAN WERE AWESOME AND WORKED HARD. GREAT PERSONALITIES, VERY PLEASANT TO BE AROUND, PATIENT WITH ME AS I FIGURED THINGS OUT! THEY SWITCHED FURNITURE IN 2 BEDROOMS ON OPPOSITE SIDES OF HOUSE WHICH INCLUDED A VERY LARGE FAMILY HEIRLOOM, KING BED, CRIB TAKEN APART & PUT BACK TOGETHER. SEVERAL CHEST, DRESSERS, CHAIRS AND MORE. PLUS BROUGHT 8 PACKED BOXES DOWN STAIRS ALL WITHIN 2 HOURS. WILL USE AGAIN😊

name: Spotted Turkey
text: The movers were going personable, patient and professional. Truly lived up to the acronym!!!

name: scott ferguson
text: Hard to do business with a company that doesn’t call you back

name: Jessica Johnson
text: The payment method I used wasnt accepted we manage to work it out. Thank You

name: Sarah Smith-Mohan
text: I had to call College Hunks Hauling Junk last minute after another Junk removal service had canceled on me because their trucks were full. The man who set up my appointment for College Hunks was very nice and made me feel like a priority. The Hunks came first thing on a Sunday morning. They called me 30 minutes ahead of their arrival, like they said they would.  The two Hunks were friendly and polite.  They worked fast and efficiently.  All my Junk was gone in a flash at a reasonable price.  I am very happy with their service.  I’ll only use College Hunks in the future.

name: Diana Lopez
text:
College Hunks these guys were fantastic. They were on time and very neat and courteous. They took care of all my personal and fragile belongings with no problems. They delivered my Furnishings from Alabama to Albuquerque New Mexico and everything arrived in perfect condition. I would recommend this company to anybody who cherishes there personal moving items. Thank you college hunks....
Respectfully Diana Auffant

name: Nathan Grimes
text: Outstanding service, attention to detail and professional in all facets.  The personal touch- was notified of any changes to my scheduled time.  Many moves in the past being in the military, this crew cared.  Most definitely recommend

name: Steven Mccornack
text: Called College Hunks to have them come clean out packing materials from our basement (an entire truckload of boxes, wrapping plastic, and styrofoam).  They were super professional, and FAST!  They left the basement CLEAN, whereas just an hour earlier it had looked like a landfill.  FANTASTIC service.  Thanks guys!

name: Chiquita Rudolph
text: The same-day service provided was great! Walter and Tyler called ahead to let me know they were on their way. They were polite, worked quickly, and cleaned excess debris when they were done. I’ll happily recommend this company to family and friends.

name: Jennifer
text: After setting up an appointment for an estimate, my husband, who works overnights, stayed up later into the morning in order to meet someone. There was NO phone call, NO show, and NO remorse when I called to get an explanation. When I asked for a manager to see what happened and why there was no phone call or any response, the call center rep, Bernard, assured me that a manager would call me back and they would go ahead and reschedule my appointment and someone would call me 30 minutes prior to arrival. Of course, I told him I wasn't rescheduling ANYTHING until I spoke with a manager and still have had no response. Even after another call where I left a message, there is still no response. It seems apparent that making the move "stress free" is the last thing on their minds and managers also don't seem concerned with making or losing new clients either.

name: Libby Loveless
text: Great experience getting rid of some large items that no other junk removal services would take. Kind and hardworking guys! Recommend.

name: Natalie Herrera
text: I the Hunks to move me from Birmingham to Alabaster. Wipe it went a little over quote they kept me informed and I felt like part of the team. Unfortunately the truck was too big to fit down the drive way at my new house. Thank you Garrett and Jerome they were awesome!!!

name: Lillian Whitley
text: They are the best. I had some heavy furniture and they also put my bed together. I had three guys helping they are friendly, courteous and very helpful in placing my things where I needed them to be. I recommend them highly and will use them again pretty soon for junk removal when ready.

name: Kara Ann
text: Tyler and Mario came to my apartment to pick up a few things to take to a donation center. I received a call the night before to confirm the appointment, and again 30 minutes before they got there! They were probably in and out in about 30 minutes!! They were super helpful and very careful not to scrape the walls. Ive used several different moving companies before, but Mario and Tyler were by the friendliest and quickest! I will never use anyone else EXCEPT College Hunks Hauling Junk!

name: Markedia Stafford
text:
If you are looking for reliable, these are NOT your guys.

Movers called two hours before my scheduled appointment to cancel. Next available appointment they offered was 3 days later.

Scheduled appointment was on a Friday, which is much too busy to schedule any other movers. This left me totally screwed.

The caller didn't even bother to apologize or offer any sympathy. Very poor customer service.

name: Micah Colley
text: I called this past Saturday around noon to inquire about the availability of a crew to haul off an appliance for me. Von and Tyler were in my driveway 2 hours later. They were professional and courteous and provided hassle free, AFFORDABLE service. I highly recommend these guys!

name: Kyle McDermott
text:
The movers were courteous, kind, and very quick. They get 5 Stars.

4 Stars given because I was unaware that there was a after hours charge of $100, otherwise I would have booked my service much earlier in the day. The movers were able to drop it down a bit, but still shouldn't be told the exact second they show up about it.

Would use them again. Just not after 5pm.

name: Douglas Burnette
text: We were really in a bind. On short notice we needed to empty our Mother's house with 60+ years of accumulated stuff. The Hunks showed up on time and were exceedingly polite and efficient. It took two days to finish the job but Tanner, DJ, Quincy, Marcus and Devaun did a fantastic job and we are very grateful to them. The more accurately you can estimate the amount of stuff you need hauled the better off you will be. I recommend their service without reservation.

name: Courtney Harper
text: The guys were polite and did a great job maneuvering large pieces downstairs and through the house and to the next location. They took care not to scratch the ceiling or floors. Our experience was great. Thank you!

name: Megan Eerqbist
text: These guys came out to remove a pile of trash from my curb that the city would not pick up. Connor and Jacob were very nice and thoughtful as the swept the street with a broom and dust pan to ensure nothing was left behind. The whole ordeal could not have taken more than a half hour iIwas back to work before my lunch was over.

name: Pamela Crowe
text: I want to say Thank You to Tyler and Vaughn (hope I got their names right).  They came and took all my big junk away, including a mattress set,  entertainment center, and even an old water heater. They worked quickly and efficiently, cleaning up everything as they went.  They were polite and professional. Now I finally feel like I can get the rest of the work done.  Thanks, guys!

name: laura silva
text: Had an awesome experience with this company. Guys showed up on time and took great care of my stuff. Would definitely recommend and will use their service again!

name: Mary Elizabeth Neal
text: Great crew of hard-working young men. Our quoted 12 hour move was finished in 9, and all our belongings were handled with care. Great overall experience and I will recommend in the future!

name: Zack D
text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!! I saw the bad reviews but they were the most affordable so I thought I would give them a chance and now I’m paying for it. You get what you pay for, right?! They were schedule for 9:30 but they say they have a one hour window, that’s fine but they didn’t show up for over an hour and a half! They called and said it would be 30 more minutes because they got lost and it ended up being right at an hour!!!!!! They showed up, looked at what they had to move, told me to sign something without explaining it to me and I asked what it was and they mumbled, “you can read it.” One guy made the comment to the other they didn’t have enough pads, right in front of us then had to ask us for supplies. Luckily we are in the middle of moving so we had tape but what would they have done if we didn’t?! I moved what I could to speed up the process because they were sooooo slow, seemed like it was the first time they had moved something. FINALLY, they got everything moved and my husband told them to follow him so they wouldn’t get lost again. Where my husband took a right, they kept going straight and didn’t show up for another 15 minutes when the other way is only 2-3 minutes longer. I called them to ask if they got lost again and wait for it...... THEY STOPPED ON MY WATCH TO GO EAT LUNCH! You don’t show up late when my entire day consist of this then stop and get food on my watch, guess what I haven’t eaten either! I called and spoke with the manager and he took $50 off the travel fee but I’m still not satisfied. When you call and speak with the company they tell you how professional the movers are, how they will come in and assess the home and go over a price with you beforehand, blah blah blah! None of that happened! They have completely ruined our day, our first day in our new home and I hope no one else has to deal with this!

name: Shelby Davis
text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!! I saw the bad reviews but they were the most affordable so I thought I would give them a chance and now I’m paying for it. You get what you pay for, right?! text:
