text: These gentleman were very energetic, courteous, professional and careful with our furniture. I will be using them in the future and my sister will be relocaring to the area soon.

name: Ann T
text: Jackie, Marvin and James were superb - highly recommend!

name: summer bennison
text: awesome service! highly recommend

name: Jonathan White
text: Elaine Williams had a five star move of success

name: Nelle O'Connor
text: L, David and Marvin we're professional and awesome.

name: Hannah Diamond
text: Guys were great helping Madeline move in!

name: Fly League
text:
Great job guys.
Heidi Banning

name: Rebekah Rein
text: Will, Percy, and David were fantastic! Great service.

name: Ivanna Williams
text: David and James did a great job.

name: jimmy hamilton
text: Percy and Will did a great job!

name: Curri DiChiara
text: Great service and very nice crew!

name: Theodore Connor
text: Really helpful, moved everything in a timely manner

name: Jay Trammell
text: Guys did good job today.

name: Marcus Kittrell
text: Great company !

name: Ben Blackerby
text: Park Moving and Storage is fantastic!

name: Andy Evans
text: Love these guys!

name: Hank Spencer
text: Professional Service

name: aaron banzai
text: They broke our bed piece and customer service was terrible.

resp.text: I believe this to be spam.  We have no record of a client named AAron Banzai.  We have contacted all of the customers the week prior to this review and can find no connection to any customer that we serviced.  While we are not perfect, we work hard to be the best moving option in Central Alabama.

name: Angel Wiley
text: Wonderful, very professional, fast, friendly.

name: Michelle Ward
text: Guys did a great job

name: Steven Carter
text: HORRIBLE - DO NOT USE!!   They do not answer phones. I took a complete day off to receive delivery, they never showed up or called. Called to check status, no answer - Still have not recieved delivery.

resp.text: We were given the wrong phone number for this customer and attempted to contact him over 30 separate times.  Once we received the correct phone number from Mattress Express, his item was delivered in 48 hours.

name: Lauren Murphy
text: Zippy Shell was amazing and the perfect choice for our move. Their customer service was fantastic and reliable. We had over vendors let us down during our move so it was very refreshing to have Zippy shell show up when they said they would and completely take care of everything! We will definitely be using them again!

name: DAC LeChat
text: Worked with Jarrod and not only did he deliver friendly and helpful customer service but great prices too! Thank you Zippy for making a stressful time easier and affordable! -KCD

name: Michael Carroll
text: Aweful experience all around.  When Zippy Shell delivered the container to my departing address, they accidently sent two trailers.  One from Atlanta and one from Birmingham, AL.  The customer service agent could not confirm which trailer to be used.  I forgave them for this under condition that they would let me insure my goods (they initially told me I could not do this after signing contract, but I insisted bc I didn't trust them to not screw this up on deliver to next city.)  I had lost confidence in them, and it was appropriately so.  Upon delivery, I requested 3 potential days.  I only had 1 day I could actually be at the destination as I am in medical residency and do not have many free days.  In GA, they do not deliver on weekends, so it was already narrowed down to Monday-Friday.  Turned out the customer service agent forgot to formally submit my requests.  Several days later I called to see what was going on and he simply said they forgot to submit my request, and would have to submit a new one.   No help, no apologies, and was completely unprofessional about the situation.  AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COSTS.  I will not recommend this place to anyone.

name: Alissa Padgett
text: Great experience with both the deliver of the zippy shell and the movers we hired for the process!

name: Michael Castro
text: Recently relocated to Birmingham, AL  from New Jersey. Bought a house but had to wait till closing. At the last minute closing was moved a week ahead and Zippy Shell of Birmingham was very accommodating. They also gave me a discount since I am a service member and continually thanked me for my service. Zippy Shell appreciate’s  the service members.Thank you to Mrs. Katrina and Mr. Leonard they were always very professional and prompt on what they promised.

name: Laura Allahiari
text: Doing business with Zippy Shell was one of the smartest decisions I have made in my life! Not only was the process simple and easy during a time when moving can be stressful, but the experience was joyful! Jarrod was great at helping my husband and I with our needs and it was one of the fastest moves I have ever made. Thank you Jarrod and thank you Zippy Shell for providing me with exceptional customer service and a wonderful product.

name: Emily Coe
text: We recently used Zippy Shell and absolutely loved their service!  We were able to store all of our belongings from our old house temporarily while we were waiting on renovations to our new home to be completed.  It was so nice (and convenient) to have them drop the container off at our old house to load and then deliver it to our new house when we were ready to unpack.  Jarrod was so friendly and was able to accommodate all of our needs.  Thanks Zippy Shell!

name: R Vaughn
text: From start to finish, the people at Zippy Shell took care of my moving and storage needs - very professional and accommodating.  They were also priced right compared to other portable storage units.  I can confidently recommend them and would use them again.

name: Patrick Nevins
text: Jarrod provided great customer service in all aspects of our storage needs. I my opinion Zippy Shell of Birmingham is the best value for storage needs. We moved out of state got almost a year and had our zippy shell delivered to our new  residence upon our return. The entire process was smooth...was able to sign contracts, ect online which saved me time, and billed via auto-pay which makes it easy also. The next time we need storage services we will definitely use Zippy Shell again.

name: Stephanie Breese
text:
Something tells me that my sister's friend Amanda and her husband wouldn't give a glowing recommendation......

Would you like to move to another state and be 3 weeks without your stuff? With no sign of getting your stuff in the future? 3 weeks in and still no sign of when their worldly belongings will get to them. They just CANNOT seem to get a truck to transport their stuff! Is this a joke?

Would you be happy to have to INITIATE conversations with said company for your belongings? You would think the company would reach out regularly as they are now well beyond their contract....cuz if anyone broke a contract with the company I am sure they would be nonstop reaching out.....bit hold a CUSTOMER'S life hostage and she has to beg you for updates?!? Excuse me!? What?

Would you be happy with a $150 refund over the whole thing? Week 1, eh, ok, week 3 time to step up the compensation.....perhaps zippy Birmingham should take a business class at the local college and get a clue?

Perhaps I shall see what the people of google think....or yelp maybe? 🤔

name: Brittany Stegall
text: Very impressed with this company.  Always responsive and went out of their way to make our move as easy as they could. Really nice people too!

name: Shane DeRossett
text: Zippy Shell of Birmingham is great! they provide professional service, the storage units are clean, and the price is great! You can't do any better for personal storage!

name: Bart Slawson
text: My experience with Zippy Shell is they are far better than their competition, clean, professional and lower rates than anyone! I recommend them to everyone for storage. Professional, courteous, and always on time.

name: Scott Coleman
text: Jarrod is great.  I got two shells and a regular storage unit (from somewhere else) for some short term storage and a move.  I wish I had gotten a third shell instead of the storage unit.  It is great loading and unloading your stuff from your door and not having to drive all over to put your things in storage.  Jarrod has always been there when he said he was going to be.  I will use him again if and when I ever need storage again.

name: Caitlin C
text: Great value, great price, and personal service! We moved into our parents' house to help out and Zippy Shell made our move much easier. Thanks, Jarrod!

name: Michael Lynam
text: Zippy Shell provided me storage and convenience. They were timely, professional and courteous. The cost combined with the level of service was a great value and highly recommend them.

name: jeff easton
text:
Great service, had to add additional pods. Jarrod was very helpful in providing. He even delivered on Sunday due to my schedule.

5 stars

name: Tiffany Barnett
text: I highly recommend Zippy Shell for all your moving needs.  This was the perfect solution for us when we couldnt move directly into our new home.  Jarrod was so accomodating and helpful. He was friendly and always available when I needed him. I felt confident that my storage items were in good hands.   I would definitely use them again.

name: Kerri Garner
text: Great service! Jarrod was friendly and prompt in answering emails and phone calls.  Delivery and pick up were right on time. Great pricing.  The main thing I like about the Zippy Shell over all of the other storage solutions is the fact that it is a wire cage!  I was able to zip-tie ladders to the ceiling rather than have them take up awkward space on the floor or against the wall.  Won't use anyone else.

name: Daniel Callins
text: Awesome Customer service. They were able to deliver the same day. You cant beat that

name: Jessie Tidwell
text: Let me tell you, when it comes to customer service and logistics managment this place can not be beat. Katrina coordinated our (complicated) zippyshell logistics perfectly, and the recoordnated it again when we had a change in plans. I never had a bit of trouble reaching the company about anything. The price is more than worth the experience.

name: Elizabeth Scribner
text: My husband and I had the pleasure of using with Zippy Shell during our big move last Christmas, 2012.  We were juggling the demands of trying to sell our old home, two careers, and a young child, and Zippy Shell couldn't have made it easier for us.  The owner was a great communicator, always responding quickly to any inquiries, and they responded in a very timely manner, always arriving when they were expected to drop off and pick up the shell.  The owner was also very instructive and helpful in explaining how the shell worked and certain do's and don'ts, like being to put a pad or towel down on the ramp in the event of rain (for safety).  I thought the price was very fair.  Also, I didn't worry at all about the security of my valuables as we were able to put our own lock on the shell before they picked it up for storage.  I will definitely use Zippy Shell again if I ever have to move again (which I hope I don't!), and I will also recommend it to any friend.

name: Steven P
text: All around great experience.  Friendly, helpful and timely!

name: Joe Nolan
text: Go through prompts, rings about 20 times then goes to a busy signal.  10AM on Monday morning.  Guess I won't be getting a quote.

name: Coach Jimmy
text: Great service!...Great price! Zippy shell is the way to go if you need storage in the Birmingham area.

name: Emily Kirkland
text: Very friendly! I will definitely use again!

name: sandra naylor
text: This was a cross country move. My initial delivery date was scheduled so I hired movers to unload the POD based on the delivery date I was guaranteed. 3 days prior to my initial delivery date I was informed that my POD would be delivered in 10 days. No apology, no reason whatsoever. Posted on PODS site, my container was sitting in their Chandler AZ warehouse and I lived 16 miles away. I've used them in the past, never again.

resp.text: We certainly don’t like to see this, Sandra. If you’d like to chat, please email socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details.

name: Mindy Moore
text: Great customer service!!!  Gave a discount on first month POD rental because the delivery fee was a little higher than estimated. Delivered on time and placed in exact discussed location.

resp.text: We're delighted to see this, Mindy! Thanks for stopping by and sharing your experience! And great picture of your PODS container!

name: Kevin G
text: Pods is awesome. I'm a driver for this company so I know first hand how amazing this company is.

resp.text: Thanks for your five-star review, Kevin!

name: Sherry Reese
text: Was on time, except for once and that was because of traffic. Parked it perfectly each time and made it very accessible.  All the guys were very polite and friendly.  Thank you.

resp.text: Kudos to our stellar team! And thank you, Sherry, for acknowledging their commitment to delivering exceptional customer care! We're looking forward to working with you again soon!

name: Katherine Gonzalez
text: Such good quality for a great price. Everyone was so helpful and kind.- from customer support to the drivers to the moving company that PODS recommended. Will only be using PODS for all of my moving needs from here on out.

resp.text: Hi, Katherine! Thank YOU for choosing PODS and sharing this wonderful review with us. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you!

name: jruff76203
text: I placed my things in storage in a pod in June 2020 to move home so I could have help during Covid with my newborn. I moved in my new place March 2021 only to find a rusted pod on the exterior and all of my possessions  ruined from a rat infestation. I contacted Pods immediately and still have yet to hear from them. I have no clothes, dishes, shoes or furniture except from what I had with me. I was devastated and have to start over with nothing. I even had content protection and still haven’t heard anything pods. It’s devastating thinking I paid 250 a month not including the transport cost for nothing. I thought I was taking the safest route but I was wrong.  Save yourself the trouble and choose a storage unit you can walk into that’s secure and not rat infested. I’m devastated and out of thousands as I have an infant and cannot salvage rat infested furniture.

resp.text: Hello, we're disappointed to read you've had this type of experience. We want to be able to have this looked into further. Please email socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID so we may best assist.

name: Gary Johnson
text: Everything about the Pod rental was great except for the driver running over and damaging my front yard. When contacted I expressed my displeasure with the yard and was told by the area manager that he would repair my yard the next day or the day after and was sorry but it’s been a week or so and I still haven’t had my yard repaired nor have I been contacted to give me an update or to tell me it was gonna be later when they will come because something came up. I just want communication from their part on the situation. The actual rental, storage and moving of the pod was great but the yard being damaged just overshadowed the good. Very disappointing. If Pods storage rectifies the situation I’ll use them in the future but if they don’t, I’ll never use them again.

resp.text: We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and would like to research this further, Gary. Can you please email socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID?

name: Robert Norton III
text: Funny thing. I have never used PODS. One of your customers either fat-fingered my phone number in or they did it intentionally. I call customer service to find out why I was getting phone calls from the company and to have my number removed. The woman that I spoke to was EXTREMELY helpful and apologetic for the inconvenience.

resp.text: Happy to hear we were able to get this resolved, Robert! We appreciate your kind words!

name: Jay Roberts
text: I would never use them again, charged me storage for a month I didn't use, never contacted me to let me know my container was here, never heard back from a senior team lead when I was told that one would contact me. To my military family that maybe on the fence about using PODS look elsewhere.

resp.text: This certainly isn't how we want you to feel, Jay. We've shared your concerns with our customer resolution team and requested that they review and follow up with you.

name: Nannette Smith
text: Did not deliver on time or pick up and overcharged us  Door was jammed and things fell out

resp.text: Hi, Nannette! We’re disappointed to see this. We encourage you to send us an email at socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details so we may best assist.

name: Gary Franklin
text: PODS staff were very helpful in making my long-distant move such a breeze.   I'd definitely will be using their service again as well as recommending my friends to use PODS.

resp.text: Moving is not easy, so we’re glad we were able to help ease some of the stress along the way! Thank you, Gary!

name: Marsha Bradford
text:
You are never able to keep your pod for the full 30 days that you have paid for.
I understand scheduling conflicts, however a refund for the days less than 30 should be refunded.

The first few reps I spoke with were absolutely wonderful!  They latest one...not so much. I had a difficult time understanding him. His English was poor at best.
I will recommend PODS.

resp.text: A big thank you for sharing your thoughts, Marsha. We rely on customers such as yourself to let us know how we can better meet their expectations. Your feedback will be shared with all of the appropriate groups.

name: Kristin Garrigan
text: I recently used PODS to move and they made the experience a lot less stressful with convenient delivery and pick up times, contactless service and very affordable pricing! I will definitely be recommending them to everyone!

resp.text: We'd be super appreciative of you spreading the word to your friends and family about our moving/storage services, Kristin! Thank you so very much for choosing PODS! It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Lee Witherington
text: Great concept. Had an issue with delivery dates but no harm done.

resp.text: We just love working with customers like you, Lee! Thank you so much for the feedback and super review.

name: Lance Huffstutler
text: I like that they pick up and drop off the pods. Customer service has always been good. They have left locks out of my order and set up the wrong delivery address

resp.text: Hi, Lance! Thanks so much for your review and feedback! If we haven't had a chance to connect about the locks you ordered but didn't receive, please email socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID.

name: Tom McDougal
text: AVOID! This was a HORRIBLE experience. I booked them and they said it was easy to change drop off and pick up reservations. WRONG! When I rescheduled they screwed up the pick up part of the reservation and the PODS are still sitting in the driveway and they are now 5 days late picking up. 6 phone calls and you never can reach anyone local bc they won’t return a phone call. The national call center is rude and no help - other than taking a reservation they have no impact on local operations. The worst part is THEY JUST DON’T CARE! I would give them a -5 Star review if it was possible. Run! Don’t do business with this company unless you want a hassle and to be treated with disrespect and experience the WORST customer service possible.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Tom. We certainly don’t like to see this. If you’d like to chat, please email socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details.

name: Lawrence Maske
text: Customer service is excellent.  Problems handled professionally,  quickly and completely.

resp.text: Thanks for putting a smile on our face, Lawrence! Glad we could help!

name: brittany west
text: I was trying to move so I rented a pod I called in my address, but it was put in wrong, so I changed it to the correct address because gods  only knows where it would have ended up. I noticed that my order was cancelled they day before it was scheduled to get picked up  just because i change the address to the correct one. When I called to ask why they cancelled my order they just blamed it on me! I even put the date back in when i changed the address. My stuff sat at the my old house that I sold for over 3 DAYS. I'm sure the new owner was upset over it it was more than likely in his way of moving in. I took vacation days to move which was a waste of my  time, I had to live without a lot of my stuff for that time, even my brothers asked for the days off to help unload it. It was five days before I was off again and had the help to unload my stuff. I  have recommend to other people to just rent a u haul!

resp.text: We appreciate you bringing this to our attention, Brittany, and we take your concerns very seriously. We'd like to learn more, please reach out to socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID so we can take a look.

name: GRACE LOVE
text: The driver refused to wait 10 minutes for me to get onsite to move a truck over 10feet. Then I was charged $54.50 re-pickup fee. No one told me about the fee until I got my final bill and called to inquire and was told that the local site made the decision to charge me the fee and they would have to issue a refund. WILL NEVER USE THEIR SERVICES AGAIN!!

resp.text: This is disappointing to see, Grace. We always aim for a seamless experience and we would like to learn more. Please reach out to us at socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID so we can look into this further.

name: Stephen Yeatman
text:
Worst experience to date. Driver called to say he would be on-site in 45 minutes at 6AM. He then called back 20min later saying he was leaving the house.
Claimed too many vehicles in driveway. There were 2 cars in a circular drive that can park 9 cars easy. He had an entire entrance to back in and drop the POD. He refused to let the people on-site move their cars out of the way and left. I have asked 3 different customer service reps to let me speak to manager of local branch. They refuse to give out info. Claim to have left a request for them to contact me. Still have not received any calls. Now having to wait until the end of the week for them to re deliver. Do not use.

resp.text: Let's connect, Stephen. Can you please send us your customer ID to socialmedia@pods.com so we can help?

name: Louise W
text:
This is absolutely the worst company I’ve ever dealt with. Not only did the pod get delivered late the day that it was supposed to show, On the day that the pod was supposed to be picked up they just didn’t show.  I had a confirmation email and when I called three hours after the window I was told that the date is not a guarantee?!? The POD was supposed to be gone before I closed, selling my house and they missed the date!!!! Then, they had the nerve to say they were doing me a special service to pick up the POD the following day.

Also, The POD is quite small.  I got the large one and it definitely did not fit a 2 bedroom home.

name: Jason Shafer
text: Excellent

resp.text: We're delighted to see this, Jason! Thanks for choosing PODS!

name: Richard Ferris
text: Well if I could give PODs a zero I would.  The delivery went fine, however when I called for the pickup I was told they only pickup in my area on certain days.  This was never mentioned when I ordered the POD.  The dates they could pick up and move to the new location were not available for me.  Therefore I had to empty the POD and move the contents to the new location.  They will be picking the container up at the same location they brought it to.  Total waste of  $400.

resp.text: We certainly don’t like to see this, Richard. If you’d like to chat, please send us an email to socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID.

name: Martha Storm
text: Very professional , dependable and on time .

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Martha! Take care!

name: Rachel Key
text:
Terrible! Charged my card even after the reservation was canceled.
Reservations must be canceled by 4pm the day before the POD arrives. Which I did, but my card was still charged and I've been told that I have to wait 5 to 7 business days to get my refund. Definitely lesson learned and the BBB has been contacted. Terrible way to do business.

resp.text: We'd be happy to look into this, Rachel. We encourage you to send us an email at socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details so we may best assist.

name: Mark Midyette
text: These guys were just great!  They were on time, took great care not to mess my lawn up and we were very pleased.  Although I REALLY don't ever want to have to move the stuff out of my house again, I'll call them in a flash I that happens.

name: Kewanee Fox
text: PODS is the best idea I have ever seen. I appreciated that we could pack and move at our pace. I had to pull items from the POD at least twice. I went online to set the time when I would be there and it went smooth. When it was time to move to our location we unpacked with ease as well. I cannot say anything bad about our experience. I will use PODS again should the need arise. I have already recommednded to family and friends.

name: Haley Capps
text: Pods made our move so much easier! They delivered/picked up the container exactly when they said they would. Our pod was in storage for 2 months, and all of our things came back exactly how we left them! No weird smell either! I will definitely use them again the next time we move.

resp.text: This is what we like to hear, Haley! We're glad we could assist! We certainly have your back when you need us again!

name: Michael Matthews
text:
The service that we received from PODS was great!  The drivers were very mindful of placement of the PODS and took great care when picking up the PODS.

As for their billing, it needs A LOT of help!  It is very confusing and once I thought we were paid in full, I received another bill about 6 months later.  The billing process is the only thing that would cause me to hesitate to use PODS in the future.  Other than that, I would recommend them.

resp.text: John, we are very glad to hear about your satisfaction with our drivers. However, we apologize for the troubles that you experienced with our billing. Please send an e-mail to podsrequest@pods.com if there is anything that we can do to help or any questions that we can answer for you.

name: Angie Beaubien
text: DO NOT use this company!!!! Terrible customer service! Made an appointment 2 weeks ago for a delivery with a pod pick up the next day. NO SHOW!!! Second time this has happened!

resp.text: Hello, Angie. We're disappointed to see this. We'd like the chance to connect and look into this further. Please send us your customer ID and additional details to socialmedia@pods.com so we can get started.

name: Justin Roberts
text: For the overall experience it was good. The only thing I will say about the Birmingham, AL location is that the building is not climate controlled. It is ventilated only. I had a cloth chair that had obvious mold due to not being a climate and humidity control environment.

name: Spencer Hedges
text:
I was trying to move household items i had inherited from Canada to my home in the USA. The pod was delivered on time during its specified delivery window.

The problem came with the lack of local support and the poor customer service with respect to the documentation required by the movers. Despite frequent efforts on my part to clarify which documents were required i came to the conclusion that dealing with this company long distance was not going to work for me. One of the documents for example was for the driver! Why was i receiving this and exactly what should i have filled in? I was simply told they all had to be filled in.

In order to avoid further aggravation i decided to switch to more traditional movers at a substantial price increase but peace of mind since they absolutely knew what import documents were required. To top it all off PODS charged me $400 for drop off and pick up of the pod i hadnt used due to their incompetence.

resp.text: Hi Spencer, we'd like to connect with you further regarding your experience. Do you mind sending us an email to socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID so we can chat further?

name: Alex Dendy
text: The young man that picked up our POD was FANTASTIC! His name is Brandon and is superb.

resp.text: We'll be sure to pass along your praise, Alex! Thanks for choosing PODS for your moving/storage needs!

name: Steve Loyd
text: Prompt, efficient, and polite. These guys were great. They made a challenging experience easier and less stressful!

name: Brandon Jones
text: I highly discourage anyone from using this incompetent company.  Worst customer service!  My story goes like this.  Ordered 2 PODS and realized the day of loading that I was going to need another one.  I called PODS and requested a new container and the call lasted for two hours and fifteen minutes.  I also scheduled the pickup for all the PODS after loaded and was assured all three would be stored in Montgomery, AL, which would be the closest storage facility that would deliver to my new address in Auburn, AL.  The technician told me to just call about three days before I needed them delivered to the new address and there wouldn’t be any issue.  There was a big issue.  They didn’t store my PODS in Montgomery, they stored them in Birmingham and claimed they needed five days for transit and three day for logistics.  I spoke to three or four supervisors and nobody could do anything to get my PODS on the day I requested.  They did say that if my PODS would have been stored in Montgomery like they said there would not have been any issue.  THEIR FAULT! So they put in an account review and some guy called and stated they lost the 2:15 min call I had with them.  He credited my account $100 dollars and said basically take it or leave it and he didn’t have to give me anything.  So I accepted I was getting my PODS on the earliest date they said.  I moved my entire family down the day prior because all three PODS were scheduled to be delivered.  They only delivered two of the three and stated the other one was never scheduled.  I asked if someone could just please contact the Birmingham facility and see if they can make an exception and deliver it the next day but was met with the standard “that is not our policy or procedure”.  I had to drive my family back to my parent’s house to stay with them for another week because the one POD they didn’t send is the one with all of our furniture.  It is taking them nine additional days to deliver my last POD and I’m having to take more vacation time off to unload it.  They also charged me for and extra month of storage because due to their mistake the PODS were in storage for more than 30 days and they don’t prorate monthly storage fees.  I will never use this company again.  They have ONE job, to deliver/store PODS and they can’t even do that right.  WHEN they make a mistake, and they will, they will not fix it.  They will tell you to submit and account review and someone will get back to you in 3-5 days.  Not one time did I call them and spend less than an hour on the phone.  If you ask for a supervisor, they put you on hold for half hour and then come back on stating they are busy.

name: Mayo Woodward
text: Great and so easy to use.

resp.text: This is what we like to see, Mayo! Come back and see us again soon!

name: Ronald Johnson
text: Took 4 months to get container picked up . Still charged me the whole time it was empty.   They did it just to get extra money from costumers . After 2 months of calling everyday and they came got container  . Shouldnt have to do this . DO NOT DEAL WITH THIS COMPANY .

resp.text: We appreciate you bringing this to our attention, Ronald. We encourage you to email your customer ID and additional details to socialmedia@pods.com so we can sort out this situation.

name: Leah Olszewski
text: Do not go through PODS period. I'm not specifically complaining about the Bham location. PODS as a whole is a rip off. They completely messed up my billing also. AND, they charged me rent on a POD I wasn't even using (never to get that money back)! An entire month of it at over$200!!!  It was the worst experience ever as I was trying to move. Horrible service. Find a company that actually cares.

name: Kevin Lee
text:
On our recent move to Birmingham, we chose your carrier to be our movers  to help us unload the U-Haul we had driven from our home in Georgia.  We had scheduled them for the afternoon of a Saturday. However our U-Haul broke down on the way and we were unable to be there with the big truck at our scheduled appointment time. They helped my father-in-law unload the smaller U-Haul trailer on Saturday, and they made arrangements to meet us the following morning to help unload the big trailer.
They sent  for able-bodied gentleman who were courteous, well mannered, and strong. I will also give them great credit for being industrious since  we were on able to get the U-Haul up our driveway. They subsequently used one of their cars and our van to transfer our  furniture and boxes from the bottom of our driveway to the top parking area and then unload from there. They worked quickly and safely. They finished the job in much less time than I anticipated it would take them.
My one critique is that some of the boxes marked "fragile"  had things stacked on top of them, and a few boxes with "this side up" arrows  were facing the wrong direction.
Overall – this was perhaps the most positive experience I've had with a moving company! We will definitely use them again to meet are moving needs!

resp.text: Hey Kevin. Thank you again for choosing Your Carrier! It was our pleasure providing the muscle. We are happy we were able to make everything work out.

Well that didn't last, the office/mgr sent me a invoice for 4 and 1/2 hours and other charges that where not discussed.  Now the movers were very nice and polite, but after I explained the discussion and what I was told I was going to pay for 475.00, instead of original quote of 380.00 and my allowance of paying up to 400,00.  They said no.  So my wife said just pay them, I disagreed but  reluctantly paid them the amt of 475.00.  Not cool in my book .........

resp.text:
Mr. Morris

We apologize about any misunderstandings. Our estimates are always subject to change which we state whenever we give an estimate. We were unaware of any lengthy breaks and this discussion with your movers. We will be calling you to follow up.

name: Jasmine Jordan
text: If there was a way to give 0 stars I would. We had a terrible experience with this company. We called 3 weeks prior to move and set up the appointment for 8 am. We get a call 3 days before move in saying “we don’t think we will be able to make it to you”. Which is an  absurd excuse when we were the first people of the day. Do not book with this company because this is terrible business. We chose this company because we heard great things and that impression was not left. They then proceeded to ask if we could move the next day as if we don’t work full time jobs and can just take off when we want to. I cannot express how disappointed I am in this company and their ways of handling such ordeals. Please re consider before booking with them if you don’t want your plans canceled last minute. And please don’t hit me with sorry for the inconvenience cause that’s absolute bull. Be a better company and live up to your google reviews cause the service was trash.

WOW...The crew (Jay, Terrence aka Tee, Rom and Kenny) that moved us were AMAZING!!! I will name them the Fantastic Four :)  They had the best attitude and all worked so hard! They were also very polite and very neat!
When we get ready to move our items from storage to a new home, we will definitely use All My Sons Moving and ask for the Fantastic Four.

resp.text: Hi, Lynette. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: Steve Newsom
text: This is by far the best moving experience I've ever had. Very professional. No hidden fees or add on type BS. The 3 guys they sent (Terrence, Devonta, and Imani) worked fast while still paying attention to detail. Definitely ask for that team by name.

resp.text: Steve We are so happy to hear that!

name: Alisha Shearer
text: First and foremost the movers showed up without masks on.we have a toddler in the house and the business website specifically states that they adhere to covid 19 regulations. I'm here to tell you that this business does not have any regard for your health or your possessions. There is a lack of leadership at the office and the manager/supervisor Brad is a waste of space. He did not care about the problems we were having with his team.. I would have recieved better customer service from a brick wall. All my sons is a horrible and SOCIALLY IRRESPONSIBLE company. If you value yourself then you will not call these overpriced charlatans. This company has zero customer service and really deplorable movers. I had to ENLIST the help of my FAMILY to help the HIRED MOVING COMPANY to move things out of my home. Please stay away from this company.All my sons should be called ALL MY FAMILY because that's who had to move my things. The only person on that team who is a hard worker is Tawne. He really carried his team today. I feel like I just wasted my hard on money on this con of a company.

name: Jan Baker
text: Fabulous guys: Jacob in scheduling and 4 movers to load truck including Garret, Will, Kaleb and Kenny.  All were extremely hard working, very professional and personable, worked hard and fast the entire time and made sure everything was done exactly right!  Best movers I have ever used and I highly recommend them!  All My Sons moving is extremely fortunate to have such hard working and professional men representing the company!  Sincere thanks to these 5 guys for outstanding service!  Jan

resp.text: Hi, Jan. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Jeremy Atchley
text: Josh Edison and his group did a great job getting us moved. The guys stayed focused, never complained about the three drops I requested, and moved fast. I want to commend Josh on his ability to stack and pack sensitive household items in climate storage. This is expensive and hard to find space but Josh made it happen. Best gift of the trip was there were no surprises at the end of the move. Overall, I was pleased with the value of this service.

resp.text: Hi, Jeremy. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Tiffany Williams
text:
I wasn't ale to use this company. But what I can say, they have GREAT stellar customer service reps. They were very friendly and nice. Made me feel comfortable during our conversation. I received my  quote and it wasn't in my budget because of my location. I still received a follow up call the following day. And even though I still couldn't use them. They recommended another moving company who may be able to help me and within my budget and closer.

The customer service was so AWESOME, just think how your moving experience would be. You said it AWESOME yet again.  I recommend
ALL MY SONS MOVING & STORAGE.

resp.text: Hi, Tiffany. Thank you so much for leaving us a stellar review!

name: Shena Gazaway
text: Terrence, Will, and Celeb were professional, timely, and were great with unpacking our pod. Highly recommend the service. Will use again.

resp.text: Hi, Shena. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Bonnie Whitener
text: The movers I had--Garret, Gary, and Sam--were excellent. I had nothing broken and they set some of my furniture up for me. Garrett even carried my geriatric 60lb dog up two solid flights of stairs for me. All of them were respectful of my things and how difficult a move it was. They were very kind to me and I recommend asking for them by name. They make a great team and  deserve 5+stars. The biggest difficulty I had was with management. I needed my whole house packed. I commute 300 miles a week for my job and the biggest reason I contacted movers was for packing help. For whatever reason, this message did not get across to those who set up the move. This caused my move to be delayed for a day. It was only because Garret, Gary, and Sam came the following day with extra materials that I was packed up and moved out so efficiently. I recommend this company, these three movers in particular, but be crystal clear about your expectations when speaking to management.

name: Raven Miller
text: I would never recommend anyone to this unprofessional company! My husband and I were moving from our apartment to a temporary location. A mover named Will came in my home. I advised him what was and wasn’t supposed to go on their truck. He walks out calls his manager and tells him my home isn’t ready, and pulls off. Didn’t say anything to me and left his manager to call me to tell me he didn’t feel the home was ready. This is after I specifically told this boy what was to be moved and what isn’t. They don’t tell me how I should have my home set up for a move, I’m paying them!!! Move and focus on only what I tell you to focus on, simple! Luckily we had another moving company to help us, which was less expensive! I would never use or recommend anyone to use this careless company for moving purposes!

name: Laura Morris
text: We have used alot of moving companies in our time for major moves. We had a small move needed of basically one bedroom of furniture, dressers, TV, etc. All My Sons Moving far exceeds any company we  have ever used. Jay and Tommy were terrific and if we ever need moving services again we will surely hire All My Sons and request these two gentlemen.

name: Tikaya Moore
text: I was convinced to pay for a 3 mover crew to save time. When they arrived, the 3rd crew member did hardly anything. That person spent 15 minutes walking back and forth with some glass from a table, only to put it down. That person walked in circles in every room. That person was on their phone MULTIPLE times until they saw I was watching and they would put it down. I called the office while they were driving to the new place and told them about my problems and they told me they would tel that person to “pep it up” as if my money wasn’t being wasted. They also stopped at a gas station for 30 minutes and ended up behind us because they were thirsty. I understand the importance of hydration, but not while I’m paying for the time. Once they finally arrived, the  crew member did NOT “pep it up” and they lost a bottom part of one of my shelves so it sits crooked. I used this company in the past and had no issues but I will NEVER use them again after this experience and their unwillingness to make it right.

name: Fraser Mills
text: I will never be using this service again and would not recommend it to any one!! It was an absolute scam, as I have moved multiple times and have NEVER been charged this much for movers. Last week, I hired 2 movers for 2 hours and told it would be $129 for these 2 hours. When the move was complete I was then charged a total of $380 for 1.5 hours of work. When I called to verify why I was being charged $250 more than originally promised, they claimed it was a “travel fee” for the movers to travel to my apartment in downtown Birmingham. This was never explained to me and it’s absolutely ridiculous that I paid ~$400 for 1.5 hours of work for the movers to load 15 items into the uhaul that I provided!!! And I I tipped the movers $40 without knowing about these extra “travel fees” so my total was $420. Absolutely ridiculous!

name: belinda murphy
text: Joshua was professional, courteous and quick. He and his partner wrapped my upholstered pieces to avoid getting them dirty and padded my wooden pieces to avoid scratching them. They took great care with everything. As a safety measure, they were masked the entire time of the move. Hassle free move....highly recommend!

name: tori horton
text: Please read before you consider doing business with this company. They do not wear proper PPE(masks completely off, etc) when entering homes. This company lacks professionalism and decency. They do not value your time either. I hired this company a week in advance to move big items out of my home. I called first at 10am to get a time frame on when they’d arrive and they said within an hr. That hr turned into close to 6hrs. The only explanation i could think of is they were traveling on the other side of God’s back to get to my home. When they entered my place, they did not have on masks and they smelled like they took a lengthy break to get high. They entered the home briefly, asked a question, then left out saying they were getting the truck ready. There I was waiting for an hr or so for them to return and they did not. I spoke with their manager over the phone and he said they wouldn’t be returning with no explanation. I explained to him that the guys did not say anything other than they’d be back after getting the truck ready. The manager was uncooperative and hung up in my face. This whole process has been a nightmare. Please avoid this company when moving, it’ll save you a lot of time and energy. If i could give 0 stars i would.

name: Bernadette Mitchell
text: Mr. Garret Allen and his team of movers were on time and made me have a great moving experience. I was treated courteous and they told me they were there to take the worry off me. They loaded my things going to my new home and stopped at my storage unit and unloaded. They did not break or scratch anything. I will definitely use them in the future. The crew was very efficient and keep me on my toes. Thank you so much Mr. Allen for the flow thru before and after my move.

resp.text: Hi, Bernadette. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Jared Cooper
text: Save yourself some trouble and do not use this company. They were supposed to show up yesterday to move us into our new home and called the morning of to inform me that the crew who was supposed to move us “did not show up.” Things happen, so I said okay and was told that another crew may be able to come later in the day after performing their first job. About 6 hours pass, and I have to call back again to find out that there would be no other crew coming, “we can reschedule to tomorrow morning between 8:30-8:45” so I said okay. Tomorrow morning arrives and the movers are an hour late. I call again and am told that they’re “on their way, probably just getting gas.” After waiting another hour and still not having movers, I call again. This time it’s “well there was a mix up and your movers were sent to a different location, but they can be there in about 3 hours.” At that point, I canceled because I wasn’t about to be burned again, and there was no real effort being made to reconcile on the part of the company. I will say that the people of the phone were pleasant enough, but every time you call you wait on hold and are connected with someone different. I will certainly never attempt to use All My Sons again.

name: Courtney Vaughn
text:
My movers were Tommy and Skye, and I couldn’t have asked for anyone better! They called me about 30 minutes before arriving, and got to work as soon as they got there. They were both super friendly and professional. I am moving out of a basement unit, so I was afraid the stairs would be a challenge. They handled my furniture carefully and were sure to load it up in the right order. I had (key word: HAD) a couch that was going to be a beast to get up my stairs, and I asked them to take it apart so I could get rid of it. They got that thing apart in no time!

When we got to my new apartment, they were quick to unload everything and get it situated exactly how I wanted. They even offered to help put my bed and kitchen table back together for me! These guys are awesome!

Also, the pricing of All My Sons is incredible. These guys worked in the July heat for right at three hours and I could not believe how low the cost was, considering the work! I compared several moving companies and decided on All My Sons after one conversation with Hannah. Everyone I have dealt with has been both professional and nice, which is a rare combination these days!

I definitely give this experience an 11/10 and will recommend All My Sons to anyone I know who needs a hand! Thanks!

name: Melynda Buck
text:
I called about 30 days in advance to schedule my move for August 8, 2020.  I was told I would have four guys to move a three bedroom apartment fourteen miles down the road.  My package included all blankets and wrapping material to protect my furniture.
Needless to say this move was anything but pleasant. The moving crew showed up 45 minutes late.  The moving crew supervisor quite before the furniture was completely loaded.   I repeatedly call Brad (owner & manager) with every negligent action that occurred with the remaining moving crew.  I had damage to my new hardwood floor, busted freshly painted door frames, knocked a hole in my ceiling, broken dresser handles, strap indentions on bedroom dresser and slid my leather couch across the cement front porch shredding the side corners. Beds were made to look like they were put together but not one single crew was installed.  I found this out when I went to but sheets on the beds and they fell apart.  I was also told all furniture was off the truck when I discovered my bedroom nightstand was missing.  I found this and a busted chest of drawers with clothes spread out under blankets so I would not find them. Brads response was for me not to worry about it that he’d take care of me.
All boxes, TV’s, and hanging clothes were moved independently.  They were strictly moving furniture.
I did everything I was instructed to do to file my claim and have yet to hear back from the insurance company.  My confirmation email stated it would take 30 days to process.  It has now been 60 days and I haven’t heard a word.
I will say Brad was very pleasant every time I called and listened to all my complaints but the downfall in any business is lack of action in customer service.

name: Madeline Goodwill
text:
****EDIT TO ADD****
Motivated movers was able to get the same size truck in with no problem! They were great to work with and very professional. Give them a call instead!!

I scheduled to move with All My Sons a month in advance for a move this morning. The crew pulled up to my house, and with out attempting to use the back access drive, calls me and says the 26 foot truck they brought wouldn’t fit due to a power line. The driver said he would speak to his manager, pick up a 13 foot truck, and call me back with an update shortly. After an hour with no call, I called the customer service line. I spoke with the manager who apathetically said they didn’t have the truck needed to move me, so they could refund me my deposit but they couldn’t move me within the next three days. Unsatisfied with his response and lack of customer service ask to speak with his supervisor. His supervisor is the owner of the company and basically gave me the same regurgitated answer the manager did. They didn’t even bother to call me and let me know my move was cancelled, I had to call them. I wouldn’t even recommend All My Sons to even my worst enemy. They can expect a call from the Better Business Bureau.

Moving is stressful especially Out of state/distance moves..but they made it stress free and painless. I would highly recommend using them for your move.

name: Carla Shirley
text: I used all my sons to move from one house to another. The gentlemen in the office were great, and worked with me on my closing and delivery of my son in the midst of scheduling the movers. They showed up on Saturday the 26th of December and one of them had on house shoes. It was 2 males and one female, they worked fast, but once we arrived at the new house for them to unload the truck they walked around and looked lost. I watch the female drop my bedside table, then they hurried and left without putting my kitchen table back together that they took apart, or putting my tv back on the stand they took it off of to move it. I’ve called and spoke to Larry about the matter at hand which was of course all my fault, and I have yet to hear from customer service on the damages done to my belongings. I will not recommend using this company unless you have the ability to micromanage them the entire time they’re there. Half of my boxes are missing, and no one at the company cares to help find the boxes or help with my belongings. Also I was quoted one amount, and charged double that amount, even with the damages and missing items.

name: Danni Freeman
text: So not happy with this business. Would Not recommend them. Will never use them again!! We moved 5.6 miles down the road. They had no boxes to move only furniture. We took the bed apart and the mirror off our dresser. There was no sofa to move.  This still took them 8 hours to complete! They took multiple smoke breaks. Moved at a turtles pace. Argued with each other. Bad mouthed my husband when they did not realize I was standing right behind them. Took an hour lunch break when they are only allowed 30 minutes. When we called to ask where they were they stated they had to stop and run a few errands. They scratched up multiple pieces of furniture. Put dents in the floor and walls. But what really really was the final straw and what prompted me to post this review was the fact we are about to paint so pulled out dresser out and found a huge hole in the back!!!! Instead of being honest about it they thought they could hide it bc how often to pull out large furniture. You can't miss it either it is right by where the mirror attaches. Refer back to where I stated we took that mirror off ourselves.. that is how I know it was not damaged prior. The bedroom set is only 1 year old. Super upset by the entire experience.

name: Maine E
text: They will say anything under the sun and will be extremely nice and attentive to get your business, but if you have any issues after your move don't expect any results. Movers didn't put my headboard on. I didn't notice because they made it look like they did. Sent email with pics and asked someone to come back out. No response for a week. Finally spoke with manager and requested a refund of deposit. He agreed. It's literally been over a month, and I still have not gotten my refund and now the manager is completely ignoring all my calls, VMs, and texts. Customer service is awful, I will literally never use them again. Would not recommend. And to think I was considering recommending them for our office relocation. Nope. Not to mention they sweet talked me into the higher package with more movers because it would "save me money" but it took 3 guys almost 5 hours to move a 1 bedroom apartment that was already packed up.

name: Will King
text: Kebarius & Shane were to two movers that arrived and helped us move our furniture on today. They got to our apartment around 8:30 a.m. and once they packed up everything ok the truck and went to the furniture store and picked up some furniture and bought it to our new house. These two young men put together both our beds and they were so professional and respectful. I recommend that these two you men get a raise because you don't find people doing this kind of hard labor and able to do it all in decent time. They're a GREAT asset to your company.

resp.text: Hi, Will. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Erin Baumgartner
text: The moving experience was great! Jay, Chris and Gary went above and beyond in my move to Atlanta during these extraordinary times it COVID19. Even though the move required transporting everything  up three flights of stairs, they took this in stride. To top off, they then moved a number of heavy furniture items to a loft via a wrought iron staircase. They did all of this with a sense of good humor and grace, even though they did not leave until nearly 11:00pm. I cannot speak highly enough of their ethic. A heartfelt thank you to each of them!!

name: T “TA2543” A
text: Jay and Tee did a great job moving me across state lines. They worked efficiently and carefully and there was no damage to any of my stuff!

resp.text: Hi, T. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Andrew Dean
text:
Brad, Ben and Hannah did a great job managing my expectations of the move. They were great in response to any questions or concerns that I had. Josh and the crew that moved us in did a great job as well. They worked hard and efficiently. They did have an issue with one of my entertainment centers but Brad and his team helped make it right.

Call Brad or Hannah today if you need to move.

name: Heath Hood
text: Damaged multiple pieces of furniture including damaging a book case. They took the book case and then refused to replace it. Damaged walls, dented and damaged both refrigerators. Offered $104 as settlement for thousands in damage. DO NOT USE!

Thank you!

I was amazed at how quickly they moved everything and they even handled every special request and stop that I needed them to make quickly and efficiently. I 100 percent recommend them and will be using them again the next time I need movers.

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Mr Smith
text: Chipped few glass pieces and said nothing.... in fact they Hid them. Did not reassemble anything and rushed out at end.  Will not be using again

name: Valerie Boyd
text: WOW!!!! I am so happy to write a 5 star review for All My Sons Moving! My family and I have moved 3 times in the past few years and we have NEVER had the experience like we did with AMS!!! From the very first phone call in talking with Nate to the 4 men crew that came while it was pouring down raining and their can do fun attitudes, it was just awesome! They were so careful with our belongings and made sure we were happy the whole way through! Thank you team Nate, Colin, Tommy, Dustin and Adam!!! Y’all made us feel like family!!!! 😀👏🏼

name: James Schauer
text: Thomas Hart and his crew showed up on time , worked hard, and did a fine job during our recent local move.

resp.text: Hi, James. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: William
text: Didn’t put me on schedule.  Just charged me for deposit and sent conf email. Waited 3 hours with moving truck at storage unit for a scraped together crew. Packed poorly resulting in damage, paid over $500 to load 1 26ft truck. Took 3 of them 3 hours to load.  Movers didn’t load all furniture instead filling 1/2 truck with random boxes.  Asked for discount due to their errors in scheduling and was given $50 off.  In contrast, a different company with 3 men unloaded the 26ft truck, 2 12ft trailers, and 2 pickups in under 3 hours including placing items and building beds. The cost for unloading was $400.  All my Sons really dropped the ball on my move.

name: Andrew Cain
text: 10 minutes prior to scheduled arrival they cancelled on me. I can not express enough the logistical bind this put me in. So incredibly disappointed in the way this was handled and how helpless this left me. I would not recommend using this company.

name: Tanisha Foster
text: I would NOT recommend this company!  A representative called me every day for a week until I pledged my business during our recent move.  A sales manager named Hannah apparently wanted to "sweeten the deal" and offered a sale rate they were running.  A call was made to us just 2 days before our move. Nate, the local store manager wanted to adjust our rates higher.  Furthermore, he was not professional in his interactions with me.  When I asked for a corporate phone number, I had to ask 3 times and he gave me a number that was not working.  I canceled a company just moments before to give this company our business.  I hope no one else has to deal with this hassle.

name: Ella Speed
text: Moved us in the rain. Made sure our furniture was wrapped and protected. Work efficiently even through difficult weather. I was impressed with the guys, Colin,  Andrew and Tommy.

name: Chocolate Kisses
text: I just recently used All My Sons on the June 18, 2020 to move my apartment. When I say they completely damaged my entire bedroom set and destroyed my carpet in my new home! I’ve reached out to management on several occasions to get the issue resolve! The sad part is that they offered me way less than a 1/4 of what I paid for my brand new furniture for all the damages! I definitely will not recommend to anyone!

name: Katie R
text: We had a great experience with All My Sons. They were punctual, friendly, quick, and professional. We were given a couple of calls before they arrived to confirm the appointment and again for a 20 min heads up before they arrived. We were given a two hour estimate, but the finished the job at least half an hour early. We will definitely be calling back next time we need to move.

name: Alicia Stallworth
text: As some one who just  had open heart surgery and wanted to make it as easy as possible this move was a nightmare the workers were standing around not doing anything a 2 hr move took 4 hrs they literally were standing around instead of moving stuff....my DVD stand was missing I asked about it and they said they didn't move it when I saw it being loaded  other things were missing and this move was $800 for  a crooked company and a bunch of thieves....don't use them look elsewhere...total crooks

name: Drew Holmes
text: They worked fast, efficient, and made sure that my money was well spent. They had great attitudes and were constantly smiling and joking with the family. Definitely will use again!!!

resp.text: Hi, Drew. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Roy Kennedy
text: Showed up 4 hours late. Poor management ,manager got an attitude with me when I asked why they were late, movers  broke several glasses, scratched up furniture and our $3000 washer and dryer set. My wife and I were at our new house while they were packing the old one and once they were done we went to our old place to clean up and we noticed many items were left behind that we specifically asked them to load up on the truck. my wife goes to get her food out of the fridge and we realized one of the movers ate her food and used our condiments. I called the management, this dude didn't even apologize  and just asked if we wanted some gift cards to pay for the food the movers stole. Do not hire this company, I paid over $800 for terrible service. I'm not one to complain, really. But guys you have to get better management. If managed properly this would be a great company.

name: Jhavalen Brown
text:
I typically don’t leave reviews unless I am completely blown away or utterly dissatisfied. This company has been nothing more than a headache. My wife and I met a very professional man who guaranteed our furniture and home would be taken care of from the move. We were blown away and felt like this was the obvious choice from other companies. On move day they were hours late. To the point where we were rushing to get off the property before the new owners arrived. Only one of the 3 guys worked the whole time and the others were constantly on their phone sitting in the truck. As you can imagine this made the move out considerably longer. They damaged a wall in the staircase multiple times. It looks horrible. The new home owners were upset with what they were left with. My wife and I contacted the office and informed of the damage in which they made it seem like they would take care of it. Well it’s now 3 weeks later and they have just advised we need to provide them an estimate. Why was this not stated weeks ago. They have attempted to give us $180 to repair a desk, bed, and dresser, and wall. That is ridiculous. Now it’s to the point where I just want the wall fixed and that not enough to pay a handy man to drive out to provide an estimate and then have to go back for the repair. I could not be more disappointed and dissatisfied. You could do better to hire literally anyone else.

Ps. The driver/mover was the only positive thing about the move after it started. Luckily we got him as he did make sure to take care not to damage the new house.

name: Blaine Rosenberg
text: Thomas and his team did a great job! Quick and efficient and very personable

resp.text: Hi, Blaine. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: Jordan Merklein (Jordan M.)
text: Absolute TRASH! Our movers called us an hour before our move and told us they were at our storage unit and we needed to be there to let them in. I told them we signed up for 9:30 not 8:30 and we were in our closing and couldn’t be there for another hour. They then hung up on us and called back 3 more times while I was in my closing and couldn’t answer. My husband called them at 9 when our closing was finished and told them he’d be there in 30 minutes and they yelled at him and hung up. We called customer service to complain and they said they didn’t have anyone else to send out other than that crew and they were sorry. We ended up cancelling because why would we pay a company over $1000 and trust them with all of our belongings when they were so rude and yellowing/hanging up on us before the move even started?!?! Please, do not give this company your money!!

name: Bleanneh 10
text: Matt, Randy, and Antone is a hard working crew. They did a great job moving an entire house full of furniture in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend this crew to others.

name: Mary Dodd
text:
We cant say enough good things about our experience with the location in Pelham, Alabama. From my first conversation with Nate and the three (3) wonderful guys that moved us, it couldn't have gone smoother. I waited a few days to check my furniture before leaving a review and everything looks great. I highly recommend them. You will be very fortunate if you get this team; Joshua E., Quinton W., and Tommy H. All day is was yes sir, no sir, yes ma'am, no maam. They were so kind and courteous. Thanks guys for taking such good care of our furniture and belongings!

perience.

text: These guys were absolutely incredible. Very fast and efficient. Super friendly. Can handle big items like nothing. Would 100% use them again!

name: Caroline Bundy
text: Our move was absolutely seamless thanks to our four guys! All four had a can-do attitude and great senses of humor! I highly recommend All My Sons!

name: Thomes Stewart
text: Let’s start at the beginning! The men showed up with no TOOLS! I was being charged $175 per hour and they showed up with no tools. Then when they came back they took forever! I moved 5 minutes down the street out of a two bedroom townhouse to a 2 bedroom apartment and it took 4 hours with three men! I was charged $895 to move 5 minutes up the road with only two beds, couch, washer dryer, chest drawer, desk and deep freezer. I moved majority of the my personal belongings on my own so it shouldn’t have taken that long! They also installed my bed incorrect now my $2200 kings size bed is on the floor because the panel on the side is split in half because it was set up properly.

name: daniel smith
text:
Was told they would send two trucks, sent one and jammed most of a 2400 square foot house into it.  Paid for a full pack, and the jokers who showed up didn't even know they were supposed to pack it up.  Were three hours late, so they were late leaving out and caused us to use a vacation day bc we had to overnight at the destination.  Broke my king bed and big screen TV.  Tried to hide the broken bed; didn't find out about the TV until we plugged it in. Scuffed a bunch more of our wooden furniture.  Soaked a queen mattress...who knows how?  Now has stains and mold on it.
Was told by "Brad" that we'd be compensated for the stuff they destroyed.  No dice.  Tried to get the reimbursement claim, but didn't even get one sent to us.  They left a quarter of our stuff still in the old house the day before the house had a final walkthrough before sell date.  Had to send the second truck (was told two trucks from the start!), and one of the guys they sent sassed me when I asked him if he would wrap some loose items.  Asked for a tip after they busted our stuff.  Tried to call Brad multiple times without answers or recompense.  Stay away.  Would give negative stars if I could.

name: jill garrett
text: I had a great experience with all my sons. They were very courteous and really listened to my needs. I highly recommend them. Ask for Nate. He’s a beast. Very fast yet respectful and mindful of moving your items.

Good Job All My Sons!!!

name: Anna Winingham
text: Very responsive and professional. We had a great experience with this long distance move. The price I was quoted was exactly what was owed in the end!

name: Michelle Davis
text: We have used All My Sons twice in the past 3 weeks. Everyone was very helpful and professional. Josh, Quinton, Jerome (and 3 more guys whose names I can’t remember - so sorry) worked very hard and efficiently which I really appreciated since they charge by the hour. I would definitely recommend them!

name: Michael Hubbard
text: Wonderful job!  All My Sons Moving was on time, professional, and focused. We will use them again. Thank you.

name: Kylee Tinney
text:
The All My Sons Pelham office should be AVOIDED AT ALL COSTS. I have never written a negative Yelp/Google review, BUT I have also never been treated so poorly (thank you Nate) as a paying customer of a business. We booked with All My Sons for our Saturday move a few weeks in advance. My husband spoke to MULTIPLE different reps, male and females, confirming that movers would be at our house at 8:00am. On the day of our move, we got a call saying, “the crew never showed up” and they were going to be late. 9:00am rolls around, and we get another call saying they won’t be there until 9:45am. Frustrated that we have now lost 2 hours of moving time (moves are already high-stress to begin with without the added frustration of movers not showing), I call the office to express my concerns. Enter the ever-so-lovely “Nate”, who I HOPE does not have a “Manager” title to his name. If so, you should seriously reconsider. Argumentative, rude, arrogant…the list goes on. Nate probably needs a refresher in Customer Service 101, “the customer is always right”. Nate tells me that their moves start from “8-10am”, so “technically” they weren’t late and “no one would have told us they were going to be there by 8am”. I explained that we spoke with MULTIPLE people and that was not the case….we were assured they would be there at 8am. After a few LOVELY back and forths with this Nate character, he says, “Alright, I’m cancelling your move and you can find someone else.”
*Click*
He hangs up the phone. If you are the owner of All My Sons, please know that you have someone representing your business in the POOREST way. I have already submitted a complaint to the BBB. This business needs to be INVESTIGATED and management needs to be reevaluated. My experience is NO WAY to treat a paying customer. Cancelling someone’s day-of service because they receive a VALID complaint is beyond me and I hope there are repercussions for Nate treating people the way he does. Based on Google/Yelp reviews, this is not an isolated incident.  Luckily, the bright spot in the day was calling MOVEDADDY who completely rearranged their moving schedule to accommodate us and did so with the most POSITIVE attitude. And they were $50+ less expensive/hour. SO all-in-all crisis averted in doing business with All My Sons, and I’m glad they did not get a PENNY of my money. What a joke.

resp.text:
Hello Kylee, I would like the opportunity to speak with you about the experience that you had with us. If you could please give me a call or send me an email, so we can set up a time to discuss your move in further detail.

Corena Edens
Customer Relations Manager
All My Sons Business Development, LLC
Office: 469-461-5000 Ext. 1070
